anya-e0401n:161_4: Sabhāvākāro nāma nīlapītādiko agambhīro ārammaṇa sabhāvo ca ārammaṇassa nānā pavattākāro ca.
anya-e0401n:161_10: Tathāhi vicāro ghaṇḍassa anuravo viya vuttoti.
anya-e0401n:161_11: Daṇḍakena ghaṇḍassa abhighāta kiriyā vā ghaṇḍābhighāto.
anya-e0401n:161_12: Tathāhi ārammaṇe cetaso pathamābhi nipāto vitakkoti ca,
anya-e0401n:162_3: “Pakkhato muccanavasenā”ti evaṃ nu khoti eko pakkho,
anya-e0401n:163_3: So ca kāyavacīmano kammesu paccu paṭṭhitesu sītuṇhādi dukkha bhayato alīna vuttivasena pavattoti āha “kammasūrassā”ti.
anya-e0401n:163_17: Tameva vidhānaṃ kammesu netabbattā nayoti ca,
anya-e0401n:163_18: upetabbattā upāyoti ca vuccatīti āha “nayena upāyenā”ti.
anya-e0401n:163_21: “Kicca sampattiyā”ti ārammaṇa vijānana phusanādi kicca sampatti atthāya.
anya-e0401n:163_24: “Thūṇūpatthambhana sadisaṃ”ti jiṇṇassa gehassa apatanatthāya sāratthambhena upatthambhanasadisaṃ.
anya-e0401n:163_26: “Sabba sampattīnaṃ mūlaṃ”ti sabbāsaṃ lokiya sampattīnaṃ lokuttara sampattī nañca mūlaṃ. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:163_27: puññakamma sampattiyā ca pārami puññasampattiyā ca patiṭṭhānattā.
anya-e0401n:163_28: Satihi puññakammasampattiyā sabbā lokiya sampatti sijjhati.
anya-e0401n:163_29: Sati ca pārami puñña sampattiyā sabbālokuttara sampatti sijjhatīti.
anya-e0401n:163_30: Etena hīna vīriyo nāma sabba sampattito paribāhiyoti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n:164_13: Khuddikā pīti nāma lomahaṃsa na mattakārikā pīti.
anya-e0401n:164_14: Khaṇikā pīti nāma khaṇe khaṇe vijjuppādasadisā pīti.
anya-e0401n:164_15: Okkantikā pīti nāma sarīraṃ okkamitvā okkamitvābhijjantī pīti.
anya-e0401n:164_16: Ubbegāpīti nāma kāyaṃ udaggaṃ katvā ākāse ullaṅghāpentī pīti.
anya-e0401n:164_17: Pharaṇā pīti nāma kappāsavattiyaṃ pharaṇakatelaṃ viya sakalakāyaṃ pharaṇavasena pavattā pīti.
anya-e0401n:165_6: “Atthiko”ti asiddho hutvā sādhetuṃ icchito attho assāti atthiko.
anya-e0401n:165_10: Usuṃ saraṃ a santi khipantīti issāsā.
anya-e0401n:165_21: “So na yujjatī”ti so attho na yujjati.
anya-e0401n:165_24: “Hatthappasāraṇaṃ viyā”ti loke kiñci icchantassa janassa hatthappasāraṇaṃ viyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:168_9: Evaṃ tassa tamassa cakkhussa andhabhāvakaraṇaṃ viya.
anya-e0401n:168_11: Tameva aṭṭhakathā nayaṃ dassetuṃ “tathā hesā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:168_12: Abhidhammaṭīkāyaṃ pana micchā ñāṇanti micchā vitakko adhippeto.
anya-e0401n:168_13: So hi micchā saṅkappo hutvā nānappakāra cintā pavatti vasena ñāṇagatiko hoti.
anya-e0401n:168_18: “Upāya cintāvasenā”ti katakammassa siddhatthāya satthāvudhādividhānesu nānāupāya cintāvasena.
anya-e0401n:168_23: Lobho ñāṇa gatiko māyāsāṭheyya kammesu vicittappavattikattā.
anya-e0401n:168_25: Tathāhi so jhānaṅgesu vicikicchāya paṭipakkhoti vutto.
anya-e0401n:168_26: Cittassa ñāṇa gati katā vicittatthavācakena cittasaddena siddho.
anya-e0401n:168_27: Te ca dhammā sabba sattesu ñāṇa gatikā na honti.
anya-e0401n:168_31: Aññappaṭi sandhikāpi bodhisatta bhūmiyaṃ ṭhitā vā paññāpasuta bhavato āgatā vā.
anya-e0401n:168_32: Sutapariyatti sampannā nāma dvihetukappaṭi sandhikāpi imasmiṃ bhave bahussuta sampannā ca pariyatti kamma sampannā ca.
anya-e0401n:169_6: “Ruciṃ uppādetvā”ti gāmasū karassa gūtharāsi dassane viya cittarocana citta khamanaṃ uppādetvā.
anya-e0401n:169_7: Attānaṃ pāpakamma limpato cittassa alīnatā ajigucchanaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:169_8: Attānaṃ asappurisa bhāvapattito cittassa alīnatā alajjā nāma.
anya-e0401n:170_7: Anuttāso nāma pāpakamma hetu cittassa akampanaṃ. Gāthāyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:170_16: Salabho pāvakamhā abhīrū viya anottavvī pāpato abhīrūti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:172_5: Makkaṭaṃ ālimpati bandhati etenāti makkaṭā lepo.
anya-e0401n:172_11: Ratti divaṃ pavattanaṭṭhena taṇhā eva nadīsotasadisattā taṇhā nadī.
anya-e0401n:173_2: “Dassanaṃ”ti parikappanā siddhesu micchā sabhāvesu viparīta dassanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:173_7: Bhūtasabhāvo hi yathā dhammaṃ avati rakkhatīti atthena yāthāvoti vuccati.
anya-e0401n:173_10: Paramaṃ vajjanti daṭṭhabbā loke mahāsāvajjaṭṭhena taṃ sadisassa aññassa vajjassa abhāvatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:174_2: “Maññatī”ti bhūtasabhāvaṃ atikkamma adhikaṃ katvā ahamasmītiādinā tena tena abhūtākārena maññati.
anya-e0401n:174_6: “Attānaṃ accuggataṃ maññatī”ti puggalaṃ mānena abhinnaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:175_7: Idañca taṃ samuṭṭhāna rūpānaṃ pharaṇa vasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:175_11: “Visasaṃsaṭṭhapūtimuttaṃ viyā”ti yathā muttaṃ nāma pakatiyā eva duggandhattā paṭikulattā dūre chaṭṭanīyanti ahitameva hoti.
anya-e0401n:175_16: Evaṃ dosopi taṃ samaṅgīno tasmiṃ khaṇe paresaṃ amanāpiyataṃ āpādeti.
anya-e0401n:175_18: parammaraṇā apāyañca pāpetīti sabbaso ahitarāsi hoti.
anya-e0401n:176_2: Duvidhā issāladdhasampatti visayā calabhitabba sampatti visayā ca.
anya-e0401n:176_3: Tattha laddha sampatti visayaṃ tāvadasseti “paresaṃ pakatiyā”tiādinā.
anya-e0401n:176_4: Laddha sampattiggahaṇena atīta sampattipi saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0401n:176_5: Issāpakatikāhi keci asuko nāma pubbe evaṃ sampattiko ahosīti vā,
anya-e0401n:176_6: ahaṃ pubbe evaṃ sampattiko ahosinti vā sutvā nasahantiyeva.
anya-e0401n:177_5: “Avipphārikatāvasenā”ti aññena taṃ sippavijjādikaṃ vā dhanadhaññādikaṃ vā mayhaṃ dehīti vutte parahitatthāya
anya-e0401n:177_7: parahitappharaṇāvasena taṃ cittaṃ vipphārikaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0401n:177_8: Dehīti vacanampi sotuṃ anicchanto parahitatthāya avipphārika citto nāma hoti.
anya-e0401n:177_9: Evaṃ avipphārikatāvasena carati pavattatīti maccharañca kārassa cha kāraṃ katvā.
anya-e0401n:177_14: Sādhāraṇanti ca dvisantakaṃ vāti santakaṃ vā bhavissamānaṃ,
anya-e0401n:177_17: Attanā laddha sampatti nāma issāya avisayo.
anya-e0401n:177_19: Tasmā tattha ubhinnaṃ viseso vattabboti taṃ dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:177_20: “Yassa lābhaṃ na icchatī”ti attanā labhatu vā māvā,
anya-e0401n:177_21: kevalaṃ para sampattiṃ asahanto yassa parassa lābhaṃ na icchati.
anya-e0401n:177_23: “Attanā laddhuṃ icchatī”ti paro sampajjatu vā māvā,
anya-e0401n:178_3: Evaṃ vacanatthaṃ dassetvā abhidheyyatthaṃ dassento “atthato panā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:178_6: “Kusala dhammesū”ti puñña kiriyavatthu dhammesu citta pariyādānāya eva saṃvattati.
anya-e0401n:178_7: Kukkucca samaṅgī puggalo puññakammaṃ karontopi citta sukhaṃ na labhati.
anya-e0401n:178_8: Bahujana majjhe vasitvā nānākiccāni karonto nānā tiracchāna kathaṃ kathento citta sukhaṃ labhati.
anya-e0401n:178_9: Tadā tassa puññakamma karaṇatthāya cittaṃ pariyādīyati,
anya-e0401n:178_18: Etena paṭimukhaṃ saraṇaṃ cintanaṃ paṭisāroti dasseti.
anya-e0401n:178_19: “Akataṃ na karotī”ti akataṃ kātuṃ na sakkotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:178_28: “Yena ca kāraṇenā”ti katākataṃ paṭicca niratthaka cittappavatti kāraṇena.
anya-e0401n:178_30: navibhāvaniyaṃ viya katākata duccarita sucaritanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:178_31: Nanu vibhāvaniyampi so cittuppādova upacāra nayena gahitoti ce.
anya-e0401n:178_32: Yutti vasena ca aṭṭhakathāgamena ca mukhyato siddhe sati,
anya-e0401n:178_37: Idāni saddasatthanayena aparaṃ vacanatthañca adhippāyatthañca dassetuṃ “api cā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0401n:178_41: Te ca atthā cetaso vippaṭisāro mano vilekhoti evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vuttehi kukkuccapariyāyehi samentiyeva.
anya-e0401n:178_42: Tasmā ayaṃ aparonayo idha avassaṃ vattabbo yevāti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n:178_43: Vippaṭi sāripuggalo ca taṃ taṃ puññakammaṃ karontopi vippaṭi sāragginā dayhamāna citto puññakamme cittappasādaṃ nalabhati.
anya-e0401n:178_45: Kiṃ iminā kammenāti taṃ pahāya yattha citta sukhaṃ vindati,
anya-e0401n:178_47: Evaṃ vippaṭisāro puññakammato saṅkocanaṃ nāma hotīti.
anya-e0401n:178_48: Kilesasallikhanaṃ nāma santuṭṭhi sallekhappaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitassa tadaṅgappahānādivasena taṃ taṃ kilesappahānaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0401n:178_50: Saṅkocatīti vatvā tassa ubhayaṃ atthaṃ dassento “kusalakamma samādāne”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:178_52: Kuto samādātuṃ vā vaḍḍhetuṃ vā dassatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:178_57: Keci pana kukkuccaṃ paccuppanna sucarita duccaritā rammaṇampi anāgata sucarita duccaritā rammaṇampi kappenti.
anya-e0401n:178_59: Mahāniddesapāṭhe dvīhākārehi uppajjati kukkuccaṃ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekhoti pāṭho.
anya-e0401n:178_62: Keci pana ayaṃ vippaṭisāro nāma kadāci kassaci kenaci kāraṇena pubbekata sucaritampi akata duccaritampi ārabbha uppajjati.
anya-e0401n:178_65: So pana kesañci vāde vippaṭisāro nāma domanassaṃ hoti,
anya-e0401n:178_69: “Na aññesaṃ”ti sucarita duccaritaṃ ajānantānaṃ amanasikarontānañca na hoti.
anya-e0401n:178_71: Sucaritaduccarita nāmena anusocanākārassa dassitattāti vuttaṃ “akataṃ me”tiādi.
anya-e0401n:178_72: Yāthāvamāno nāma seyyassa seyyo hamasmīti sadisassa sadisohamasmīti hīnassa hīnohamasmītiādinā pavatto bhūtamāno.
anya-e0401n:178_76: Idaṃ pana pubbekatā katakāle eva ayāthāvaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:178_88: na nu kho kappatīti evaṃ vinaya saṃsayaṃ uppādentāti attho.
anya-e0401n:178_91: Āṇācakka sāmino buddhassavisayattā attano sāvaka bhūtassa avisayeti attho.
anya-e0401n:178_92: Ye pana karontiyeva kukkuccāyantā pīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:179_2: “Cittaṃ mandamandaṃ katvā”ti cintana kicce atimandaṃ paridubbalaṃ katvā.
anya-e0401n:179_3: Cittaṃ gilānaṃ milātaṃ katvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:179_5: Ārammaṇa vijānane vā javanakicce vā parihīnathāmabalaṃ karoti.
anya-e0401n:180_2: “Cikicchanaṃ”ti rogāpanaya natthe kitadhātuvasena siddhaṃ saṅkhata kiriyā padanti āha “ñāṇappaṭikāroti attho”ti.
anya-e0401n:180_10: Tañca kaṅkhāyaṃ vattatīti dassetuṃ “vicikicchati vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:180_21: idappaccayatā paṭicca samuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhatīti evaṃ vuttesu aṭṭhasu saddheyya vatthūsu.
anya-e0401n:180_22: Tattha “buddhe kaṅkhatī”ti itipi so bhagavā arahaṃtiādinā vuttesu buddhaguṇesu asaddahanto buddhe kaṅkhati nāma.
anya-e0401n:180_23: Svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammotiādinā vuttesu dhamma guṇesu asaddahanto dhamme kaṅkhati nāma.
anya-e0401n:180_24: Suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅghotiādinā vuttesu saṅghaguṇesu asaddahanto saṅghe kaṅkhati nāma.
anya-e0401n:180_25: Tissannaṃ sikkhānaṃ vaṭṭa dukkhato niyyānaṭṭhesu asaddahanto sikkhāya kaṅkhati nāma.
anya-e0401n:180_26: Attano atīta bhavassa atthi natthibhāve kaṅkhanto pubbante kaṅkhati nāma.
anya-e0401n:180_27: Attano parammaraṇā anāgata bhavassa atthi natthibhāve kaṅkhanto aparante kaṅkhati nāma.
anya-e0401n:180_28: Tadubhayassa atthi natthi bhāve kaṅkhanto pubbantā parante kaṅkhati nāma.
anya-e0401n:180_29: Imasmiṃ bhave attano khandhānaṃ paṭicca samuppāde ca paṭicca samuppannabhāve ca kaṅkhanto idappaccayatā paṭicca samuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhati nāma.
anya-e0401n:180_32: Vicikicchā paṭirūpakā nāma sabba dhammesu appaṭihatabuddhīnaṃ sabbaññu buddhānaṃ eva natthīti vuttaṃ “asabbaññūnaṃ”tiādi.
anya-e0401n:183_5: Kalyāṇa kammaṃ nāmapakatiyā cittassa ratiṭṭhānaṃ na hoti.
anya-e0401n:183_7: Tasmā kalyāṇa kamme eva appamajjituṃ visuṃ satināma icchitabbā.
anya-e0401n:183_8: Pāpakamme pana visuṃ satiyā kiccaṃ natthi.
anya-e0401n:183_9: Sabbepi cittacetasikā dhammā apamatta rūpā honti.
anya-e0401n:183_11: “Satiyeva na hotī”ti visuṃ sati nāmako eko cetasikoyeva na hoti.
anya-e0401n:183_13: Tattha katassa appamajjanaṃ nāma kesañci anumodanavasena kesañci anusocanavasena appamajjanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:183_14: Kattabbassa appamajjanaṃ nāma niccakālampi kātuṃ abhimukhatā.
anya-e0401n:183_20: Sā hi chasu dvāresu cittassa ārakkha kiccā hoti indriya saṃvaraṇa dhammattā.
anya-e0401n:183_21: Tasmā chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe lobhamūlacittassa anuppajjanatthāya sā icchitabbā,
anya-e0401n:183_24: bojjhaṅga bhāvanā ṭhānesu idaṃ sutta padaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:183_25: Tasmā bhāvanā cittassa līnaṭṭhānepi sā icchitabbā līnapakkhato cittassa nīvāraṇatthāyātiādinā yojetabbā.
anya-e0401n:184_3: Tāni hīnakammāni lāmakakammānīti hīḷetvā tato attānaṃ rakkhituṃ icchati.
anya-e0401n:184_13: Yasmā pana sappurisā attānaṃ pariharantīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:184_14: “Hiriyā attani gāravaṃ uppādetvā”ti attano jātiguṇādikaṃ vā sīla guṇādikaṃ vā garuṃ katvā mādisassa eva rūpaṃ pāpakammaṃ ayuttaṃ kātuṃ.
anya-e0401n:184_16: pacchā attānaṃ asuddhaṃ ñatvā dukkhīdummano bhaveyyanti evaṃ hiriyā attani gāravaṃ uppādetvā.
anya-e0401n:184_17: “Ottappena paresu gāravaṃ uppādetvā”ti parānuvādabhayaṃ bhāyitvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:184_18: Tattha parānuvādabhayaṃ nāma paresaṃ sādhu janānaṃ garahā bhayaṃ.
anya-e0401n:184_19: Aññampi apāyabhayaṃ saṃsāra vaṭṭabhayañca ettha saṅgayhatiyeva.
anya-e0401n:185_4: Paṭiviruddhatā ca pahāyaka pahātabba bhāvena veditabbāti dassetuṃ “sohī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:185_5: Tattha so nekkhammadhātuvasena hutvā pavattatīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:185_6: “Hita saññitesū”ti idaṃ me atthāya hitāya sukhāyāti evaṃ saññitesu.
anya-e0401n:185_9: “Bhavabhoga sampattiyo gūtharāsiṃ viya hīḷetvā”ti idaṃ bodhisattānaṃ vasena nidassana vacanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:187_7: Tathā cittassa ati lūkhatā eko visama pakkho.
anya-e0401n:187_9: Tatra majjhattatā pana sampayutta dhamme ubhosu antesu pātetuṃ adatvā sayaṃ majjhimappaṭipadāyaṃ daḷhaṃ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0401n:188_0: 104. Passaddhādīsu. “Tattha taṃ vīndantī”ti tesu puñña kammesu taṃ citta sukhaṃ paṭilabhanti.
anya-e0401n:191_6: Yā pana pāpa viramaṇākārena cittassa pavattīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:191_7: “Samādiyantassa vā”ti musāvādā viramāmītiādinā vacībhedaṃ katvā samādiyantassa vā.
anya-e0401n:191_8: “Adhiṭṭhahantassa vā”ti vacībhedaṃ akatvā citteneva tathā adhiṭṭhahantassa vā.
anya-e0401n:191_9: Imehi dvīhi padehi samādāna viratippavattiṃ vadati.
anya-e0401n:191_12: Sā pana kattunā ca kriyāya ca sahabhāvinī hutvā samādāna kriyaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ sādheti.
anya-e0401n:191_13: Tasmā sā karaṇa sādhanaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0401n:191_15: Bahūsujavanavāresu pavattamānesu purima purima javanavārapariyāpannā sammāvācā pacchima pacchima javanavārasamuṭṭhitāya samādāna kriyāya paccayo hoti.
anya-e0401n:191_16: Sā pana tāya kriyāya asahabhāvittā karaṇalakkhaṇaṃ na sampajjati.
anya-e0401n:191_20: Sammāvācāti padaṃ pana kitasādhana padattākaraṇatthe evasiddhaṃ.
anya-e0401n:191_21: Na hi akāraka bhūto hetu attho sādhanaṃ nāma sambhavati.
anya-e0401n:191_25: Idañca sabbaṃ sammāvācāti vacane vacībhedavācaṃ padhānaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:191_26: Sampattavirati samuccheda viratibhūtāya pana sammāvācāya vacībhedena kiccaṃ natthi.
anya-e0401n:193_4: “Samādiyantassa vā uppannā”ti pāṇāti pātāpaṭiviramādhītiādinā samādiyantassayā samādānakkhaṇe uppannā virati.
anya-e0401n:193_5: “Sā pana paccuppannārammaṇā hotī”ti ettha kathaṃ paccuppannā rammaṇā hotīti.
anya-e0401n:193_6: Pāṇāti pātāpaṭiviramādhīti vadantassa cittaṃ anukkamena pāṇasaddādīnaṃ atthaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattati.
anya-e0401n:193_9: So ca satto tañcajīvitindriyaṃ loke sabbakālampi saṃvijjatiyeva.
anya-e0401n:193_10: Evarūpaṃ jīvitindriya sāmaññaṃ sandhāya paccuppannārammaṇāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:193_12: “Anāgatā rammaṇāvā”ti ettha ekadivasaṃ niyametvā samādiyantassa tasmiṃ divase dharamāna sattāpi atthi.
anya-e0401n:193_17: Ahaṃ asukadivasato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvampi pāṇātipātā viramādhītiādi.
anya-e0401n:193_18: Evaṃ samādāna virati anāgatā rammaṇāpi hotīti.
anya-e0401n:193_19: “Paccayasamucchedavasenā”ti taṃ taṃ kilesānusaya saṅkhātassa paccayassa samucchedavasena.
anya-e0401n:194_4: “Pāpekali parājaye”ti kalisaddo pāpe ca parājaye ca vattatīti attho.
anya-e0401n:194_5: Sattehi kaliṃ avanti rakkhanti etāyāti karuṇā.
anya-e0401n:194_6: Sattehīti ca rakkhaṇatthayoge icchitasmiṃ atthe apādāna vacanaṃ. Yathā-
anya-e0401n:194_8: Sattevā kalito avanti rakkhanti etāyāti karuṇā.
anya-e0401n:194_9: Kalitoti ca rakkhaṇattha yoge anicchitasmimpi apādānavacanaṃ. Yathā-
anya-e0401n:194_11: Ekasmiṃ satte pavattāpi appamaññā eva nāma honti.
anya-e0401n:194_12: Yathā taṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe pavattampi sabbaññutaññāṇameva hotīti.
anya-e0401n:197_8: Idha pana cittāni eva cittuppādāti vuccantīti āha “cittuppādesūti cittesu icceva attho”ti.
anya-e0401n:197_10: “Bhāvanā balenā”ti vitakka virāgasatti yuttena upacāra bhāvanā balena,
anya-e0401n:197_11: vuṭṭhāna gāmini vipassanā bhāvanā balena ca.
anya-e0401n:198_11: tasmā te sabbesu tesu labbhantīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:198_15: “Tathā tathā āmasitvā”ti diṭṭhi khandhesu nicco dhuvo sassatotiādinā āmasati.
anya-e0401n:198_16: Māno ahanti vā seyyo sadisotiādinā vā āmasati.
anya-e0401n:198_22: Sakkāya diṭṭhi eva gati yesaṃ te diṭṭhi gatikā.
anya-e0401n:198_25: “Na hi mānassa viyā”ti yathā mānassa attasampaggahaṇe byāpāro atthi,
anya-e0401n:198_26: na tathā diṭṭhiyā attasampaggahaṇe byāpāro atthīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:198_27: Ettha ca attasampaggahaṇaṃ nāma parehi saddhiṃ attānaṃ seyyādivasena suṭṭhupaggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:198_28: “Na ca diṭṭhiyā viyā”ti yathā diṭṭhiyā dhammānaṃ ayāthāvapakkhaparikappane byāpāro atthīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:198_29: Tattha ayāthāvapakkho nāma attā sassato ucchinnotiādi.
anya-e0401n:198_30: Macchariyaṃ attasampattīsu lagganalobhasamuṭṭhitattā lobhasampayuttameva siyāti codanaṃ pariharanto “macchariyaṃ panā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:199_5: “Tasmiṃ asati pī”ti dutīyajjhānika maggādīsu tasmiṃ sammāsaṅkappe asantepi.
anya-e0401n:199_8: sammāājīvo,ti ime tayo dhammā sīlakkhandha dhammā nāma.
anya-e0401n:199_11: sammāsamādhī,ti ime tayo dhammā samādhikkhandhā nāma.
anya-e0401n:199_13: “Eko ekassa kiccaṃ na sādhetī”ti tesu sammāvācā sammākammantassa kiccaṃ na sādheti.
anya-e0401n:199_15: Sammākammanto ca sammāvācāya kiccaṃ na sādhetītiādinā sabbaṃ vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:199_16: “Sīlesu paripūrakāritā vasenā”ti sīlappaṭipakkha dhammānaṃ samucchindakāritā vasenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:199_21: Kusala dhammo ca nāma sabbassa akusala dhammassa paṭipakkho.
anya-e0401n:199_22: Ekasmimpi kusala dhamme uppajjamāne tasmiṃ santāne sabbāni akusalāni pajahituṃ sakkontīti vattabbāni.
anya-e0401n:199_23: Atha ca pana musāvāda virati musāvādameva pajahituṃ sakkoti,
anya-e0401n:199_26: Pajahituṃ sakkotīti idaṃ pañcasu pahānesu tadaṅgappahāna vacanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:199_27: Tadaṅgappahānanti ca tena tena kusalaṅgena tassa tassa akusalaṅgassa pahānaṃ tadaṅgappahānaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:199_29: idha sappuriso pāṇātipātā paṭiviramāmītiādinā visuṃ visuṃ sikkhāpadāni samādiyitvā pāṇāti pātavirati
anya-e0401n:199_30: saṅkhātena kusalaṅgena pāṇātipāta saṅkhātaṃ akusalaṅgaṃ pajahati.
anya-e0401n:199_31: Adinnādāna virati saṅkhātena kusalaṅgena adinnādāna saṅkhātaṃ akusalaṅgaṃ pajahatītiādinā vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:199_32: Ekasmimpi kusala dhamme uppajjamāne tasmiṃ santāne sabbāni akusalāni na uppajjantīti ettha pana anokāsattā eva na uppajjanti,
anya-e0401n:199_34: Na hi tasmiṃ santāne tasmiṃ khaṇe tāni akusalāni eva na uppajjanti.
anya-e0401n:199_35: Athakho sabbāni aññāni kusala cittāni ca na uppajjanti.
anya-e0401n:199_36: Sabbāni abyākata cittāni ca na uppajjanti.
anya-e0401n:199_37: Tāni anokā sattā eva na uppajjanti.
anya-e0401n:199_39: Tadaṅgappahānādi vasena pana pahānaṃ sandhāya idha pajahituṃ sakkoti-
anya-e0401n:199_43: Na itarānīti idañca suṭṭhu upapannaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0401n:199_44: “Ettha cā”tiādīsu kāyaṅgacopanatthāya vācaṅgacopanatthāya ca pavattāni kāyavacīco pana bhāgiyāni nāma.
anya-e0401n:199_47: Kāmabhūmiyaṃ uppannesu eva kāmāvacara kusalesu sandissanti.
anya-e0401n:199_49: Ettha ca kuhanaṃ nāma vimhāpanaṃ lābhasakkāra silokatthāya manussānaṃ nānāmāyāsāṭheyya kammāni katvā acchariyabbhuta bhāvakaraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:199_53: Tattha mahicchoyeva samāno appicchākāraṃ dassetvā ādito āgatā gate catupaccaye paṭikkhipitvā pacchā bahuṃ bahuṃ āgate paccaye paṭiggaṇhāti.
anya-e0401n:199_55: Pāpicchoyeva samāno ayaṃ jhānalābhīti vā abhiññālābhīti vā arahāti vā jano maṃ sambhāvetūti sambhāvanaṃ
anya-e0401n:199_56: icchanto attānaṃ uttari manussa dhammānaṃ santike te vā attano santike katvā vañceti.
anya-e0401n:199_58: Pāpicchoyeva samāno ayaṃ santavutti samāhito āraddhavīriyoti jano maṃ sambhāvetūti sambhāvanaṃ icchanto iriyā patha nissitaṃ nānāvañcanaṃ karoti.
anya-e0401n:199_59: Idaṃ iriyā patha saṇṭhāpana kuhanaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:199_60: “Sikkhāpadassa vatthūnī”ti surā pāna vikāla bhojana naccagītavādita dassana savanādīni.
anya-e0401n:199_61: Surāmerayapānā viramādhīti samādiyantassa surāmerayapāna cetanā viramitabba vatthu nāma.
anya-e0401n:199_62: Vikāla bhojanā viramāmīti samādiyantassa vikāle yāvakālika vatthussa paribhuñjana cetanā viramitabba vatthu nāma.
anya-e0401n:199_65: ‘Sabbathāpī,ti ca ‘niyatā’ti ca ‘ekato vā’ti ca tīṇi visesanāni.
anya-e0401n:199_66: Lokiyesu pana ‘kadācī’ti ca ‘visuṃ visuṃ’ti ca dve dve visesanāni.
anya-e0401n:199_67: Tattha lokuttaresu ‘sabbathāpī’ti idaṃ samucchedappahāna dassanaṃ lokiyesupi tabbiparītaṃ tadaṅgappahāna
anya-e0401n:199_68: dassanaṃ adhippetanti katvā “ekeka duccaritappahānavasene vā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:200_5: Thāmagatā karuṇā dosa samuṭṭhitaṃ vihiṃsaṃ pajahati.
anya-e0401n:200_6: Thāmagatā muditā dosasamuṭṭhitaṃ aratiṃ pajahatīti vuttaṃ “vihiṃsā aratīnaṃ nissaraṇa bhūtā”ti.
anya-e0401n:200_7: Ettha ca arati nāma suññāgāresu ca bhāvanā kammesu ca nibbidā.
anya-e0401n:200_9: Nissaraṇañca nāma paṭipakkha dhamma saṇṭhānena hoti.
anya-e0401n:200_10: Tasmā pubbabhāgepi appamaññāsu niccaṃ somanassa saṇṭhānaṃ veditabbanti adhippāyena “domanassappaṭipakkhañcā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:200_11: “Aṭṭhakathāyapi saha viruddho”ti aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ upekkhā sahagata kāmāvacara kusala cittesu karuṇā muditā
anya-e0401n:200_12: parikammakālepi hi imesaṃ uppatti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ anuññātā evā-
anya-e0401n:200_17: vattabbameva natthī”ti paṭikūlā rammaṇāni nāma somanassena dūre honti,
anya-e0401n:200_19: tasmā tadā rammaṇāni asubha bhāvanā cittāni ca karuṇā bhāvanā cittāni ca ādito upekkhā sahagatā nevāti vattabbameva natthi.
anya-e0401n:200_26: Ettha siyā “taṃ paṭikkhittaṃ hotī”ti kasmā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:200_27: Na nu tampi upekkhā sahagata cittesu karuṇā muditānaṃ sambhavaṃ sādheti yevāti.
anya-e0401n:200_29: Tena pana paricaya vasena tesu tāsaṃ sambhavaṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0401n:200_30: Idha pana “ettha cā”tiādinā “paṭikūlā rammaṇesū”tiādinā ca paricayena vinā pakatiyā tāsaṃ upekkhā vedanāya eva saha pavatti bahulatā vuttāti.
anya-e0401n:201_3: Heṭṭhā ca vutto ‘kadāci sandissanti visuṃ visuṃ,
anya-e0401n:201_5: Upari ca vakkhati ‘appamaññā viratiyo panettha pañcapi paccekameva yojetabbā’ti.
anya-e0401n:201_6: Issādīnañca nānā kadāci yogo upari ‘issāmacchera kukkuccāni panettha paccekameva yojetabbānī’ti vakkhati.
anya-e0401n:201_7: Mānathina middhānaṃ pana nānā kadāci yogo idha vattabbo.
anya-e0401n:201_15: Kicca virodhe vā ārammaṇa virodhe vā nānābhāvo.
anya-e0401n:202_1: “Yogaṭṭhānaparicchindana vasenā”ti sabbacitta sādhāraṇā tāva sabbesupi ekūnanavuticittuppādesu,
anya-e0401n:202_2: vitakko pañcapaññā sacittesūtiādinā yuttaṭṭhāna bhūtānaṃ cittānaṃ gaṇanasaṅkhyāparicchedavasena.
anya-e0401n:202_4: mahaggate pañcatiṃsātiādinā yutta dhammarāsīnaṃ gaṇana saṅkhyā pariccheda vasena.
anya-e0401n:204_8: Appanāpatta kamma visesehi nibbattā appanāpattakamma visesa nibbattā.
anya-e0401n:206_1: “Bhūmi jāti sampayogādibhedenā”ti phassotāva catubbidho hoti kāmāvacaro,
anya-e0401n:208_0: Chattiṃseva vipākā ca, vīsati kriyā matā.
anya-e0401n:209_5: “Cittena samaṃ bheda”nti attanā vā sampayuttena cittabhedena samaṃ bhedaṃ.
anya-e0401n:209_7: Ettha ca vicikicchā cetasikaṃ ekasmiṃ citte yuttanti ekameva hoti. Doso, issā,
anya-e0401n:209_9: kukkuccanti ime cattāro dvīsu cittesu yuttāti visuṃ visuṃ dve dve honti.
anya-e0401n:212_8: Etena ‘vedanā bhedena cittacetasikānaṃ saṅgaho’tiādīsupi vedanā bhedena pavatto cittacetasikānaṃ saṅgahotiādinā sambandhaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0401n:212_10: kathaṃ dassitoti āha “vedanā bhedena cittacetasikānaṃ saṅgaho”tiādi.
anya-e0401n:212_13: Etena ayaṃ saṅgaho citta cetasikānaṃ eva saṅgahoti siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:212_16: Etena upari vedanā saṅgahotiādīsu vedanāto saṅgaho vedanā saṅgaho. La.
anya-e0401n:212_17: Vatthuto saṅgaho vatthu saṅgahoti siddhaṃ hoti,
anya-e0401n:212_18: vedanātotiādīsu ca vedanā bhedatotiādi atthato siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:212_22: “Saṅgaho nāma niyyate”ti vuttattā “nīto nāma atthī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:212_24: Nanu tesaṃ “saṅgaho nāma niyyate”ti vuttattā dvīhi citta cetasikehi eva ayaṃ saṅgaho netabboti. Na.
anya-e0401n:212_25: Cittena nīte cetasikehi visuṃ netabba kiccassa abhāvatoti dassetuṃ “citte pana siddhe”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:213_2: Vedanā bhedaṃ nissāya imassa saṅgahassa pavattattā “nissaya dhamma pariggahattha”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:213_10: tasmā vedanā anubhavana lakkhaṇena tividhā eva hotīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:213_12: Upekkhaṃ sukhe saṅgahetvā sukhadukkhavasena vā dve vedanā vuttāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:213_13: “Santasmiṃ esā paṇīte sukhe”ti jhānasampayuttaṃ adukkhama sukhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:213_14: Pañca bhedādīsu vitthāro vedanā saṃyutte gahetabbo.
anya-e0401n:213_15: Vedayitanti ca vedanāti ca atthato ekaṃ.
anya-e0401n:213_16: “Sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhasmiṃ”ti sabbaṃ taṃ vedayitaṃ dukkhasmiṃ eva paviṭṭhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:213_17: Saṅkhāra dukkhataṃ ānanda mayā sandhāya bhāsitaṃ saṅkhāra vipariṇāmatañca,
anya-e0401n:213_27: Tattha sukhasampayuttā dhammā kāyika sukha sampayutta cetasika sukha sampayutta vasena duvidhā.
anya-e0401n:213_28: Evaṃ issaraṭṭhānabhūtānaṃ sampayutta dhammānaṃ duvidhattā anubhavana bhede tīsu vedanāsu ekaṃ sukha vedanaṃ
anya-e0401n:213_33: Cakkhādi pasādakāyā nāma cakkhu sota ghāna jivhā pasādakāyā.
anya-e0401n:213_34: Tesu nissitā nāma cakkhu viññāṇa cittuppādādayo.
anya-e0401n:213_35: “Sabbhāvā”ti santabhāvato saṃvijjamāna bhāvato duvidhā hontīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:214_3: Suppatiṭṭhita bhāvasādhanaṃ hetu kiccaṃ nāmāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:214_6: Tasmā suppatiṭṭhita bhāvasādhanaṃ hetukiccaṃ nāmāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:214_7: “Apare panā”ti paṭṭhānaṭṭha kathāyaṃ āgato revatatthera vādo.
anya-e0401n:214_8: “Dhammānaṃ kusalādi bhāvasādhanaṃ”ti sahajātadhammānaṃ kusalabhāvasādhanaṃ akusalabhāvasādhanaṃ abyākatabhāvasādhanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:214_10: “Yesa”nti mohamūla citta dvaye moho ca ahetuka cittuppāda rūpa nibbānāni ca.
anya-e0401n:214_11: “Na sampajjeyyā”ti sahajāta hetuno abhāvā tassa mohassa akusala bhāvo,
anya-e0401n:214_12: itare sañca abyākata bhāvo na sampajjeyya.
anya-e0401n:214_14: Hetu nāma sahajāta dhammānaṃ kusalādibhāvaṃ sādhetīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:214_16: so moho sampayutta dhammānaṃ akusala bhāvaṃ sādheyya.
anya-e0401n:214_17: Attano pana akusala bhāvaṃ sādhento sahajāto añño hetu natthi.
anya-e0401n:214_19: Tathā ahetuka cittuppāda rūpa nibbānānañca abyākatabhāvaṃ sādhento koci sahajāto hetu nāma natthīti tesampi abyākata bhāvo na sampajjeyya.
anya-e0401n:214_23: Soca moho attano dhammatāya akusalo hoti.
anya-e0401n:214_24: Tāni ca ahetuka cittuppādarūpa nibbānāni attano dhammatāya abyākatāni hontīti.
anya-e0401n:214_27: Tathā aññepi dhammā attano dhammatāya eva kusalā kusalā byākatā bhavissanti.
anya-e0401n:214_29: yenakāraṇena te eva dhammā attano dhammatāya akusalā byākatā honti.
anya-e0401n:214_30: Aññe pana dhammā attano dhammatāya kusalā kusalā byākatā na honti,
anya-e0401n:214_32: Tasmā tesaṃ sabbesampi kusalādi bhāvatthāya hetūhi payojanaṃ natthi.
anya-e0401n:214_33: Tasmā so theravādo na yutto yevāti.
anya-e0401n:214_34: Na kevalañca tasmiṃ theravāde ettako doso atthi.
anya-e0401n:214_35: Atha kho aññopi doso atthīti dassetuṃ “yāni cā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:214_37: Sace dhammānaṃ kusalādi bhāvo sahajāta hetuppaṭibaddho siyā.
anya-e0401n:214_39: hetu paccaye kusala hetuto laddha paccayāni rūpāni kusalāni bhaveyyuṃ.
anya-e0401n:214_40: Akusala hetuto laddha paccayāni rūpāni akusalāni bhaveyyuṃ.
anya-e0401n:214_50: Pāpa dhamma pāpā rammaṇa virodho nāma kāmarāgaṭṭhānīyehi sattavidha methuna dhammādīhi pāpa dhammehi
anya-e0401n:214_51: ceva pañcakāmaguṇā rammaṇe hi ca cittassa virodho,
anya-e0401n:214_53: Muyhanakiriyā pana ekanta akusala jātikā eva hoti.
anya-e0401n:214_54: Ettāvatā mohamūla citta dvaye moho attano dhammatāya akusalo hotīti imamatthaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0401n:214_56: Idāni ahetuka cittuppāda rūpa nibbānāni attano dhammatāya abyākatāni hontīti imamatthaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ “yoca dhammo”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:214_59: Attano dhammatāya eva siddho. Ettāvatā- ahetuka. La.
anya-e0401n:214_63: Idāni sabbopi moho attano dhammatāya akusala bhāveṭhatvā aññesaṃ icchā nāma atthi,
anya-e0401n:214_64: akkhanti nāma atthīti evaṃ vuttānaṃ icchā akkhanti dhammānampi akusala bhāvaṃ sādhetīti dassetuṃ “tattha moho”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:214_66: Na kevalaṃ so lobhādīnaṃ akusalabhāvaṃ sādheti,
anya-e0401n:214_67: atha kho alobhādīnampi kusalabhāvaṃ so eva sādhetīti dassetuṃ “alobhādīnañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:214_68: “Avijjānusayena saheva siddho”ti tāni sattasantāne avijjānusaye appahīne kusalāni honti.
anya-e0401n:214_70: Idāni lobha dosānaṃ alobhādīnañca hetu kiccaṃ dassetuṃ “tāni pana lobhādīnī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:214_73: Arajjana adussana amuyhanānaṃ nissandāni arajjanādi nissandāni.
anya-e0401n:214_75: “Hetumukhenapī”ti ahetuka cittuppāda rūpa nibbānānaṃ abyākatabhāvo attano dhammatāya siddhoti vutto.
anya-e0401n:214_76: Sahetuka vipāka kriyānaṃ abyākata bhāvo pana attano dhammatāya siddhotipi sahajāta hetūnaṃ hetu kiccena siddhotipi vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:214_79: Atha tesaṃ kusalādi bhāvo sesasampayutta hetuppaṭi baddho siyāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:214_84: Idāni ‘yāni ca laddhahetu paccayānī’tiādi vacanaṃ paṭikkhipanto “yathācā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:214_89: kasmā te rūpa dhammā jhānapaccayuppannesu vuttāti āha “te panā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:214_91: “Taṃ pana tesaṃ”ti tesaṃ haṃsādīnaṃ taṃ vaṇṇavisesaṃ.
anya-e0401n:214_93: “Abyākatānaṃ panāti sabbaṃ”ti abyākatānaṃ pana abyākatabhāvo niranusaya santānappaṭi baddho,
anya-e0401n:214_95: avipākabhāvappaṭi baddho cāti daṭṭhabbanti idaṃ sabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:214_96: “Vutta pakkhepatati yevā”ti tasmiṃ pakkhe antogadhamevāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:215_5: “Bhavantarādippaṭi sandhāna vasenā”ti bhavantarassa ādikoṭiyā paṭisandhāna vasena.
anya-e0401n:215_8: “Avicchedappavatti paccayaṅgabhāvenā”ti avicchedappavattiyā padhāna paccaya saṅkhātena aṅgabhāvena.
anya-e0401n:215_22: “Ekāvajjana parikamma cittato”ti maggena vā abhiññāya vā ekaṃ samānaṃ āvajjanaṃ assāti viggaho.
anya-e0401n:215_25: gotrabhū,ti ettha parikamma javanacittaṃ idha parikamma cittanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:215_28: “Dīghaṃ addhānaṃ”ti sakalarattiyaṃ vā sakala divasaṃ vā niddokkamana vasena dīghaṃ kālaṃ.
anya-e0401n:215_31: Kālohi nāma visuṃ cittassa ārammaṇa bhūto eko paññatti dhammoti etena kālo nāma sabhāvato avijjamānattā
anya-e0401n:215_32: kathaṃ kiccānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānaṃ nāma sakkā bhavitunti imaṃ āsaṅkaṃ visodheti.
anya-e0401n:215_33: “Itarathā”ti tathā aggahetvā aññathā kiccaṭṭhānānaṃ abhede gahite satīti attho.
anya-e0401n:215_34: “Sayaṃ somanassa yuttaṃpī”ti kadāci sayaṃ somanassa yuttaṃpi.
anya-e0401n:215_37: “Āsevana bhāva rahitaṃ pī”ti āsevana guṇa rahitampi.
anya-e0401n:215_38: Tañhi āsevana paccaye paccayopi na hoti,
anya-e0401n:215_40: “Parikamma bhāvanā balena ca pavattattā”ti idaṃ phalasamāpatti vīthiyaṃ phalajavanesu pākaṭaṃ.
anya-e0401n:216_5: “Kammavisesa mahābhūta visesa siddhenā”ti ettha kammavisesena ca mahābhūta visesena ca siddhoti viggaho.
anya-e0401n:216_10: “Visaya visayī bhāvūpagamanassā”ti ettha rūpa nimittānaṃ visayabhāvassa upagamanaṃ nāma cakkhu maṇḍe āpātāgamanaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0401n:216_11: Āvajjanādīnaṃ visayī bhāvassa upagamanaṃ nāma tesaṃ nimittānaṃ ārammaṇa karaṇaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0401n:216_13: Evaṃ dvāra saddassa karaṇa sādhanayuttiṃ dassetvā idāni adhikaraṇa sādhana yuttiṃ dasseti “athavā”tiādinā.
anya-e0401n:216_15: “Cakkhumeva cakkhu dvāra”nti etena cakkhumeva dvāraṃ cakkhu dvāranti avadhāraṇa samāsaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0401n:216_17: Sabbaṃ ekūna navutividhaṃ cittaṃ manodvārameva nāma hoti.
anya-e0401n:216_18: Tathāhi vuttaṃ aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ ayaṃ nāmamano manodvāraṃ nāma na hotīti na vattabboti.
anya-e0401n:216_23: “Tattheva taṃ yuttaṃ”ti tasmiṃ pāḷippadese eva taṃ sādhaka vacanaṃ yuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:216_25: “Manañcāti etthā”ti manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇaṃti vākye manañcātipade.
anya-e0401n:216_26: Tattha pana javana manoviññāṇassa uppattiyā catūsu paccayesu manañcāti ettha dvārabhūtaṃ bhavaṅgamano ca āvajjana mano cāti dve paccayā labbhanti.
anya-e0401n:216_27: Dhamme cāti pade dhammārammaṇa saṅkhāto eko paccayo labbhati.
anya-e0401n:216_31: “Sannihita paccayānaṃ eva tattha adhippetattā”ti paṭicca saddasāmatthiyena āsanne dharamānapaccayānaṃ eva tasmiṃ pāḷivākye adhippetattā.
anya-e0401n:216_32: “Dvārabhāvārahassā”ti visaya visayīnaṃ vutta nayena pavatti mukhabhāvārahassa.
anya-e0401n:216_33: Etena ārammaṇāni āpātaṃ āgacchantu vā, māvā,
anya-e0401n:216_36: Pabhassarappasannabhāvena dvārabhāvā rahatā eva pamāṇanti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n:216_38: Dvāravikāra mūlakāni tādisāni kiccāni yesaṃ tāni taṃ kiccavantāni.
anya-e0401n:216_41: Vibhāvani pāṭhe “manodvāra saṅkhāta bhavaṅgato”ti manodvāra saṅkhāta bhavaṅga bhāvato ca.
anya-e0401n:216_42: “Ārammaṇantaraggahaṇavasena appavattito”ti paṭisandhi cittena yathā gahitaṃ kammakammanimittādikaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:216_43: muñcitvā pavattikāle chasu dvāresu āpātāgatassa ārammaṇantarassa gahaṇa vasena appavattito ca.
anya-e0401n:216_44: Heṭṭhāpi pañcadvārā vajjana cakkhu viññāṇa sampaṭicchana santīraṇa voṭṭhabbana kāmāvacarajavana tadā rammaṇa vasenātiādinā kiccasīseneva. La. Vutto.
anya-e0401n:216_45: Etthahi āvajjana sampaṭicchanādīni kicca visesānaṃ nāmāni honti.
anya-e0401n:216_48: “Tathā assutattā”ti ekūna vīsati dvāra vimuttānīti ca,
anya-e0401n:216_49: cha dvārikāni ceva dvāra vimuttānīti ca,
anya-e0401n:216_50: mahaggata vipākāni dvāra vimuttāne vāti ca, sutaṃ.
anya-e0401n:217_2: “Dubbala purisenā”ti gelaññābhibhūtattā vā jarābhibhūtattā vā daṇḍena vā rajjukena vā vinā uṭṭhātumpi
anya-e0401n:217_3: patiṭṭhātumpi aparāparaṃ gantumpi asakkontena dubbala purisena daṇḍakaṃ vā rajjukaṃ vā ālambiyati.
anya-e0401n:217_8: “Āgantvā”ti ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena tato tato āgantvā.
anya-e0401n:217_12: Tāni ettha āgantvā ramantīti etasmiṃ atthe sati,
anya-e0401n:217_15: Evañca sati ekaṃ padaṃ dvīhivākyehi dassanaṃ na sundaranti.
anya-e0401n:217_21: “Anāgataṃ”ti ettha na kāro avatthā vasena paṭisedho.
anya-e0401n:217_22: Yo dhammo paccaya sāmaggiyaṃ sati āgamana jātiko uppajjana sīlo.
anya-e0401n:217_26: nāgacchati nāgacchitthāti iminā atthena so anāgato nāma.
anya-e0401n:217_27: Nibbāna paññattiyo pana āgamana jātikā na honti.
anya-e0401n:217_31: Te yadā vattabba pakkhe tiṭṭhantīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:217_34: “Na tathā imesaṃ”ti imesaṃ dvāra vimuttānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ pana tathā na hotīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:217_38: “Ekavajjana vīthiyaṃ aggahita bhāvo idha na pamāṇa”nti cha dvāraggahitanti idha appamāṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:217_40: “Kālavimutta sāmaññaṃ”vāti yaṃ kiñcikāla vimuttaṃ vā na hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:217_47: “Cha hi dvārehī”ti karaṇa bhūtehi chahi cakkhādi dvārehi.
anya-e0401n:217_48: “Maraṇāsanna javanehī”ti kattu bhūtehi maraṇāsanne pavattehi cha dvārika javanehi.
anya-e0401n:217_51: “Kenaci dvārena aggahitameva hotī”ti ettha asaññī bhavato cutānaṃ sattānaṃ kāmapaṭisandhiyā kammādi ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0401n:217_52: bhavantare kenaci dvārena aggahitanti yuttaṃ. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:217_54: Arūpabhavato cutānaṃ pana kāmapaṭisandhiyā gati nimitta sammataṃ ārammaṇaṃ kathaṃ bhavantare kenaci dvārena aggahitaṃ bhaveyya,
anya-e0401n:217_55: manodvāraggahitameva bhaveyyāti imaṃ codanaṃ visodhetuṃ “ettha ca yasmā paṭṭhāne”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:217_60: Paresaṃ payoga balenāpi kammādīnaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma hotītiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:217_61: “Suṭṭhu āsevitānaṃ”ti cirakālaṃ saṅgha vatta cetiyavatta karaṇādivasena taṃ taṃ bhāvanā kammavasena ca suṭṭhu āsevitānaṃ kammakammanimittānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:217_64: Tadāpi nirayapālehi dassitaṃ taṃ taṃ gati nimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cavanti.
anya-e0401n:217_66: Nanu nirayapālā nāma tāvatiṃsā bhavanaṃ gantuṃ na sakkuṇeyyunti.
anya-e0401n:217_72: “Kāmapaṭisandhiyā ārammaṇaṃ”ti tehi nimittārammaṇehi aññaṃ upacāra bhāvanā kammaṃ vā yaṃ kiñci anurūpaṃ gati nimittaṃ vā.
anya-e0401n:217_73: “Tāneva nimittāni gahetvā”ti vacanena tāni nimittāni maraṇāsanna javanehi gahitānīti dasseti.
anya-e0401n:217_74: Tāni ca paññatti dhammattā kāmapaṭisandhiyā ārammaṇaṃ na hontīti.
anya-e0401n:217_75: “Paccuppannagati nimitte siddhe siddhamevā”ti tasmiṃ bhave gatassa tattha yāvajīvampi anu bhavitabbaṃ
anya-e0401n:217_76: ārammaṇaṃ nāma tasmiṃ khaṇe dharamānaṃ paccuppannampi atthi.
anya-e0401n:217_78: Tattha paccuppanne upaṭṭhahante paṭisandhiyā ārammaṇaṃ sampajjati.
anya-e0401n:217_79: Anāgataṃ pana anupaṭṭhahantampi paccuppanne antogadhasadisaṃ hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:217_80: Vibhāvani pāṭhena ca paccuppanna gatinimittaṃ viya āpātamāgataṃ, kasmā,
anya-e0401n:217_87: Yaṃ kālamakarīmunīti vuttattā sabbaññu buddhādīnaṃ parinibbāna cuti cittaṃ santi lakkhaṇaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karotīti.
anya-e0401n:217_88: Taṃ sabbathāpi kāmāvacarā lambaṇā nevāti iminā apanetabbanti dassetuṃ “tā nihi sabbaññu buddhānaṃ uppannāni pī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:217_90: “Tānī”ti dvādasā kusala cittāni aṭṭhañāṇa vippayutta kusala kriya javanāni ca.
anya-e0401n:217_91: Ajjhāna lābhino puthujjanā mahaggatajjhānānipi ālambituṃ na sakkontīti vuttaṃ “paññattiyā saha kāmāvacarā rammaṇānī”ti.
anya-e0401n:217_92: “Tāne vā”ti ñāṇa sampayutta kāma kusalāni eva.
anya-e0401n:217_94: Heṭṭhima phalaṭṭhānaṃ tāneva attanā adhigata maggaphala nibbānā rammaṇāni.
anya-e0401n:217_95: “Jhānāni patthentī”ti āyatiṃ jhānalābhino bhaveyyāmāti patthanaṃ karonti.
anya-e0401n:218_3: Tāni nissaya vatthūni yesaṃ tāni tabbatthukāni.
anya-e0401n:218_4: “Tesañca saddo na yujjatī”ti tesaṃ vāde ca saddo na yujjati.
anya-e0401n:218_5: Na hi alutta ca kāraṃ dvanda padaṃ nāma atthīti.
anya-e0401n:218_6: “Pubbapadesu ānetabbo”ti cakkhu vatthu ca sotavatthu cātiādinā ānetabbo.
anya-e0401n:218_8: Na hi samāsa padato eka desaṃ aññattha ānetuṃ yujjatīti.
anya-e0401n:218_9: Avibhattika niddeso nāma cakkhuṃ, sotaṃ, ghānaṃ, jivhā, kāyo, hadayaṃ,
anya-e0401n:218_10: vatthu cāti vattabbe pubbapadesu avibhattika niddeso.
anya-e0401n:218_11: Evañcasati vatthu saddo ca saddo ca pubbapadesu ānetuṃ labbhantīti.
anya-e0401n:218_12: Kāmataṇhāya adhīnena āyattena kāmāvacara kammena nibbattā kāmataṇhādhīna kamma nibbattā.
anya-e0401n:218_18: Sabbesaṃ dassana kiccānaṃ majjhe buddha dassanā divasena anuttaraṃ dassanaṃ janetīti dassanānuttariyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:218_19: Evaṃ savanānuttariyepi catusacca dhammassavanā divasenāti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:218_20: “Ajjhatta bahiddha santā nesu pī”ti ajjhatta santānepi bahiddha santānepi.
anya-e0401n:218_21: “Suddhe”ti kenaci ālokena ca andhakārena ca virahite.
anya-e0401n:218_27: Tañca vijānanaṃ tīsu manodhātūsu natthīti vuttaṃ “vijānana kiccābhāvato”ti.
anya-e0401n:218_30: Sampaṭicchana kiccañca pañcaviññāṇehi yathā gahitāneva pañcārammaṇāni sampaṭicchana mattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:218_31: Tenāha “visesajānana kiccāni na hontī”ti. Dassanaṃ, savanaṃ, ghāyanaṃ, sāyanaṃ, phusana,
anya-e0401n:218_32: nti imāni kiccāni thokaṃ visesa jānana kiccāni hontīti vuttaṃ “paccakkhato dassanā divasenā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:218_35: Avasesā pana santīraṇādayo manoviññāṇadhātuyo nāmāti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:218_36: Nanu mananaṭṭhena mano ca taṃ vijānanaṭṭhena viññāṇañcāti vuttepi pañcaviññāṇehi viseso natthīti āha “atissaya visesa jānana dhātuyoti attho”ti.
anya-e0401n:218_37: Evaṃ santepi so attho saddayuttiyā siddho na hoti.
anya-e0401n:218_38: Yadicchā vasena vutto hotīti āha “pariyāya padānaṃ”tiādi.
anya-e0401n:218_39: Etena so attho saddayuttiyā eva siddho.
anya-e0401n:218_41: “Visesana samāse”ti mano ca taṃ viññāṇañcāti manoviññāṇanti evarūpe kammadhāraya samāse.
anya-e0401n:218_42: “Padaṭṭhānaṃ”ti ettha padanti ca ṭhānanti ca kāraṇattha vacanāni,
anya-e0401n:218_44: Padañca taṃ ṭhānañcāti vutte atissaya kāraṇanti attho viññāyati.
anya-e0401n:218_49: “Katthaci dissati yujjati cā”ti na hi katthaci dissati ca.
anya-e0401n:218_52: “Manaso viññāṇaṃ”ti ettha paṭisandhi cittato paṭṭhāya yāvacuti cittā antare sabbaṃ citta santānaṃ satta
anya-e0401n:218_53: viññāṇa dhātūnaṃ vasena vibhāgaṃ katvā attho vattabbo.
anya-e0401n:218_54: Pañcadvārā vajjanañca sampaṭicchana dvayañca manodhātu mattattā mano nāma.
anya-e0401n:218_56: Avasesāni sabbāni viññāṇāni manassa viññāṇanti atthena manoviññāṇāni nāma.
anya-e0401n:218_57: Tattha “manassa viññāṇaṃ”ti anantara paccaya bhūtassa vā manassa paccayuppanna bhūtaṃ viññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:218_59: Santīraṇato paṭṭhāya yāva dvārantare pañcadvārā vajjanaṃ nāgacchati,
anya-e0401n:218_60: tāva antare sabbaṃ manoviññāṇa santānaṃ paccayuppanna viññāṇaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:218_61: Puna “manassa viññāṇa”nti paccayuppanna bhūtassa manassa paccaya bhūtaṃ viññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:218_62: Ettha pañcadvārā vajjanaṃ paccayuppanna mano nāma.
anya-e0401n:218_63: Tato pure sabbaṃ manoviññāṇa santānaṃ paccaya mano nāma.
anya-e0401n:218_66: “Manoviññāṇadhātu bhāvaṃ sambhāvetī”ti avasesā pana dhammā manoviññāṇadhātu ca nāma honti,
anya-e0401n:218_67: hadaya vatthuñca nissāyayeva vattantīti evaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ manoviññāṇadhātu bhāvañca sambhāveti, vaṇṇeti.
anya-e0401n:218_71: Dutīyajjhāne eva aparisesa nirodha vacanaṃ viruddhaṃ siyā. Kathaṃ,
anya-e0401n:218_72: sace paṭigho anīvaraṇā vattho nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n:218_73: Pathamajjhānato pubbe eva so niruddho siyā.
anya-e0401n:218_79: “Purima kāraṇamevā”ti anīvaraṇā vatthassa paṭighassa abhāvatoti kāraṇaṃ eva.
anya-e0401n:218_80: Paratoghoso nāma sāvakānaṃ sammādiṭṭhippaṭilābhāya padhāna paccayo hoti.
anya-e0401n:218_83: buddhā ca pacceka sambuddhā ca sayambhuno parato ghosena vinā dhammaṃ paṭivijjhanti.
anya-e0401n:221_3: “Vuttappakārenā”ti ‘tattha cittaṃ tāva catubbidhaṃ hoti kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ,
anya-e0401n:221_5: “Pubbā paraniyāmitaṃ”ti vā dvattiṃsa sukha puññamhātiādinā nayena pubbā paraniyāmitaṃ.
anya-e0401n:223_0: Pavatti saṅgaho nāma, sandhiyaṃ dāni vuccatī.ti
anya-e0401n:224_2: Keci vāde “paṭisandhi pavattiyaṃ”ti niddhāraṇe gahite dvīsu paṭisandhi saṅgaha pavatti saṅgahesu idāni pavatti saṅgahaṃ pavakkhāmi,
anya-e0401n:224_3: pacchā paṭisandhi saṅgahaṃ pavakkhāmīti attho hoti.
anya-e0401n:224_6: So ca uparigāthāya na sametīti dassetuṃ “evaṃ satī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:224_17: Iti tasmā manodhātu visuṃ vuttāti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:224_20: “Yaṃ kiñci mananaṃ”ti antamaso āvajjanamatta sampaṭicchanamattaṃ pīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:224_21: “Suddho pana manoviññāṇappabandho”ti manodvāra vikāraṃ paṭicca pavatto manoviññāṇappabandho.
anya-e0401n:224_25: Buddhassa bhagavato pathamābhinīhārakālo nāma sumedhatāpasakāle buddha bhāvāya kāya cittānaṃ abhinīhārakālo.
anya-e0401n:224_27: “Jāti phalikakkhandhā viya sampajjantī”ti tena obhāsena ajjhotthaṭattā jātiphalikakkhandha sadisā hontīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:224_28: “Upapatti deva brahmānaṃ panā”ti upapattippaṭisandhikānaṃ opapātika deva brahmānaṃ pana.
anya-e0401n:224_29: “Pasāda nissaya bhūtānaṃ”ti cakkhādīnaṃ pasāda vatthūnaṃ nissaya mahābhūtānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:225_1: Dvatti cittakkhaṇāni atikkamma āpātaṃ āgacchantīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:225_3: Vibhūtassāti ca avibhūtassāti ca idaṃ ādimhi manodvāre pana vibhūtassāti ca avibhūtassāti ca padānaṃ uddharaṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:225_5: “Tāvā”ti vīthi cittappavatti dassanato pathamataraṃ evāti attho.
anya-e0401n:225_7: Vibhāvanipāṭhe “atimahantā divasena visaya vavatthānaṃ hotī”ti vacanena ādimhi ‘chavatthūni,
anya-e0401n:225_12: cha dhāvisayappavattī,ti evaṃ vuttesu chasu chakkesu chadhāvisayappavattīti padamattaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0401n:225_15: “Visaya vavatthānattha mevā”ti atimahantādi visaya vavatthānatthameva vuttanti na ca sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0401n:225_16: Rūpā rūpa dhammānaṃ addhāna paricchedo nāma abhidhamme sabbattha icchitabbo.
anya-e0401n:225_17: Tasmā tassa dassanatthampi taṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:225_23: “Assā vijjuyāṭhiti nāma visuṃ na paññāyatī”ti vijjuppādaṃ passantānaṃ na paññāyati.
anya-e0401n:225_39: Saṅkhata lakkhaṇaṃ visayo yesaṃ tāni saṅkhata visaya lakkhaṇāni.
anya-e0401n:225_44: Iti vatvā tamatthaṃ sādhentīti sambandho. Gāthāyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:225_46: Sabbadā sabbapāṇinaṃ maraṇaṃ nāma vuccatīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:225_49: “Santati vasena ṭhānaṃ”ti ṭhitāya aññathattaṃ paññāyatīti ettha ṭhitabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ ṭhānaṃ santati ṭhitivasena veditabbanti vadanti.
anya-e0401n:225_52: ṭhitāya aññathattaṃ paññāyatīti idaṃ suttaṃ vadati.
anya-e0401n:225_55: Udaya pariyanta mattabhūtā sā eva nivatti.
anya-e0401n:225_57: Arūpa jarā saṅkhārakkhandhenāti evaṃ dvīhi khandhehi.
anya-e0401n:225_61: “Vibhāgā rahassā”ti uppādo uppajja naṭṭhena eko samāno rūpānaṃ vaḍḍhana samaye uppādo.
anya-e0401n:225_63: Avaḍḍhitvā ṭhita samaye uppādo yathā ṭhita nīhārena cirakālaṃ pavatti atthena santatīti vutto.
anya-e0401n:226_1: “Arūpaṃ”ti sabbaso rūpasaṇṭhāna rahitattā citta cetasikaṃ nāmaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0401n:226_3: Tattha arūpa dhamma sabhāvo nāma rūpa dhammato sataguṇenavāsahassaguṇenavāsaṇhasukhumasabhāvo.
anya-e0401n:226_5: “Gāhaka gahetabba bhāvassa taṃ taṃ khaṇavasena nipphajjanato”ti ettha pañcadvāra vīthīsu vīthi cittānañca
anya-e0401n:226_6: ārammaṇānañca visayī visayabhāvo gāhaka gahetabba bhāvo nāma.
anya-e0401n:226_7: “Taṃ taṃ khaṇavasena nipphajjanato”ti vīthi cittāni ca ekasmiṃ ārammaṇepi āvajjanādīhi nānā kiccehi gaṇhantā eva gahaṇa kiccaṃ sampādenti.
anya-e0401n:226_8: Nānā kiccāni ca nānā cittānaṃ vasena sampajjanti.
anya-e0401n:226_9: Ārammaṇāni ca purejātāni hutvā yāva tāni kiccāni sampajjanti,
anya-e0401n:226_10: tāva paccuppannabhāvena dharamānāni eva gahaṇaṃ sampādenti.
anya-e0401n:226_12: gāhakānaṃ vīthi cittānañca khaṇattayāyukattā eva gāhaka kiccaṃ nipphajjati, sijjhati.
anya-e0401n:226_13: Gahetabbānaṃ ārammaṇānañca sattarasa cittakkhaṇāyukattā eva gahetabba kiccaṃ nipphajjati, sijjhati.
anya-e0401n:226_14: Evaṃ taṃ taṃ khaṇa vasena nipphajjanato.
anya-e0401n:226_20: “Uppādanirodha vidhānassā”ti uppāda nirodha vidhānabhūtassa mahāaṭṭhakathāvādassa paṭisiddhattāti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:226_24: Yaṃ pana vibhāvaniyaṃ kāraṇaṃ vuttanti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:226_25: “Taṃ ṭīkānayaṃ”ti taṃ soḷasa cittakkhaṇāyuka dīpakaṃ mūlaṭīkānayaṃ.
anya-e0401n:226_26: Tadatthaṃ sādhentena vibhāvani ṭīkācariyena vuttanti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:226_38: “Nimitta vasena ghaṭṭentī”ti ādāsaṃ passantassa mukhasadisaṃ mukhanimittaṃ mukhappaṭibimbaṃ ādāse upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0401n:226_39: Evaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhupasāde saddārammaṇañca sotapasāde taṃ sadisa nimitta vasena ghaṭṭenti.
anya-e0401n:226_49: So ca lañchanakkhandho tālapaṇṇe āpātetvā akkharaṃ upaṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0401n:226_52: Na kevalaṃ attano dvāresu eva āpāta māgacchanti.
anya-e0401n:226_54: Na kevalaṃ bhavaṅga manodvāre eva āpāta māgacchantīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:226_56: Tāni ārammaṇāni yesaṃ tāni tadā rammaṇāni.
anya-e0401n:226_57: Na ekakkhaṇe pañcasu ārammaṇesu vīthi cittāni pavattanti,
anya-e0401n:226_58: ekekasmiṃ ārammaṇe evāti vuttattā na dvīsu, na tīsu,
anya-e0401n:226_62: “Evaṃ satī”ti tesaṃ pasādānaṃ āvajjanena saddhiṃ uppattiyā sati.
anya-e0401n:226_63: “Ādilakkhaṇaṃ”ti pañcārammaṇānaṃ pañcadvāresu āpātā gamana saṅkhātaṃ visayappavattiyā ādilakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:226_66: Vibhāvanipāṭhe “yogya desāvaṭṭhāna vasenā”ti āpātaṃ āgantuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne aveccaṭṭhāna vasena.
anya-e0401n:226_70: ghaṭṭananti ca āpātā gamananti ca vuccatīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:226_73: “Eko dhammaniyāmo nāmā”ti yathā bodhisatte mātukucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhante dhammaniyāma vasena sakale jātikkhette pathavikampanaṃ ahosi.
anya-e0401n:226_74: Tathā idhapi pañcadvāresu ekekasmiṃ dvāre ārammaṇe ghaṭṭente dhammaniyāma vasena bhavaṅga calanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:226_77: Kathaṃ hadaya vatthu nissitassa bhavaṅgassa calanaṃ siyāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:226_78: Ettha ca pañcaviññāṇassa calanaṃ siyāti idaṃ na vattabbaṃ. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:226_81: tadā taṃ na calatīti na vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:226_82: Sabbampi hi vīthicittaṃ nāma calati yevāti.
anya-e0401n:226_86: Pañcanissaya mahābhūtehi saddhiṃ hadaya vatthu nissayabhūtānaṃ eka saṇṭhāna bhāvena ekābaddhattāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:226_88: “Tādisassa anukkama calanassā”ti vibhāvaniyaṃ bherisakkharopamāya saddhiṃ rūpādinā pasāde ghaṭṭite tannissa
anya-e0401n:226_89: yesu mahābhūtesu calitesu anukkamena taṃ sambandhānaṃ sesarūpānampi calanena hadaya vatthumhi calite
anya-e0401n:226_90: tannissitassa bhavaṅgassa calanā kārena pavattitotīti evaṃ vuttassa anukkama calanassa.
anya-e0401n:226_94: “Yoni somanasikārādivasenā”ti yoni somanasikāro kusala javanuppattiyā paccayo.
anya-e0401n:226_97: Tesu ca somanassa javanādīnaṃ uppatti paccayopi heṭṭhā citta saṅgahe vuttanayena veditabbo.
anya-e0401n:227_1: “Āvajjanato paṭṭhāya uṭṭhitaṃ”ti kamma vipākasantānato ca tadārammaṇato ca muñcitvā visuṃ kriyāmaya byāpārena
anya-e0401n:227_4: Tasmā tampi uṭṭhite citta santāne saṅgaṇhanto pathama bhavaṅga calanatoyeva vāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:227_5: “Imasmiṃ ṭhāne”ti vīthi cittānaṃ anukkamena attano kiccehi ārammaṇappavattiṭṭhāne.
anya-e0401n:227_20: cakkhudvāra vīthi cakkhu viññāṇa vīthi vacanañca,
anya-e0401n:227_22: Tehi chachakkehi āharitvā imissaṃ vīthiyaṃ dassitāni.
anya-e0401n:227_26: “Ekūna paññāsa parimāṇesū”ti ekassanipphanna rūpadhammassa ekapaññāsa mattesu khuddakakkhaṇesu uppādakkhaṇañca
anya-e0401n:227_27: bhaṅgakkhaṇañca ṭhapetvā majjhe ekūna paññāsa mattāni ṭhitikkhaṇāni santi.
anya-e0401n:227_28: Tesu khaṇesu anukkamena uppannā ekūna paññāsa cakkhu pasādā ca santi.
anya-e0401n:227_29: “Kismiñcī”ti tesu katarasmiṃ nāma cakkhu pasāde na ghaṭṭentīti na vattabbāni.
anya-e0401n:227_33: Atīta bhavaṅgena saddhiṃ uppajjitvā taṃ atikkamma bhavaṅga calanakkhaṇe laddhaghaṭanaṃ ekaṃ cakkhu.
anya-e0401n:227_34: Taṃ pana cakkhu viññāṇassa vatthu bhāvañca dvārabhāvañca sādheti.
anya-e0401n:227_37: Etadeva etaṃ eva cakkhu kicca sādhanaṃ nāma hoti vīthi cittuppattiyā vatthu kiccadvāra kiccānaṃ sādhanato.
anya-e0401n:227_38: “Yaṃ majjhimāyukaṃ”ti mandāyuka amandāyukānaṃ majjhe pavattattā yaṃ majjhimāyukanti vadanti.
anya-e0401n:227_40: “Itarāni panā”ti ekūna paññāsa parimāṇesu cakkhu pasādesūti vuttāni,
anya-e0401n:227_41: tesu ekaṃ kicca sādhanaṃ ṭhapetvā sesāni itarāni aṭṭha cattālīsa cakkhūni moghavatthūni nāma honti.
anya-e0401n:227_42: Rūpā rammaṇehi saddhiṃ laddha ghaṭṭanānampi sataṃ vīthi cittuppattiyā vatthu kiccadvāra kiccarahitattā.
anya-e0401n:227_43: Tesu katamāni mandāyukāni nāmāti āha “tāni panā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:227_44: Kicca sādhanato purimāni nāma atīta bhavaṅgato pure terasasu bhavaṅgesu ādi bhavaṅgassa bhaṅgakkhaṇato
anya-e0401n:227_45: paṭṭhāya khaṇe khaṇe uppannā sattatiṃsa cakkhu pasādā.
anya-e0401n:227_48: Kicca sādhanato pacchimāni nāma atīta bhavaṅgassa ṭhitikkhaṇato paṭṭhāya khaṇe khaṇe uppannā ekādasa cakkhu pasādā,
anya-e0401n:227_51: Tadubhayānipi aṭṭha cattālīsa mattāni veditabbānīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:227_54: Tāni hi cakkhu viññāṇassa uppādakkhaṇe ṭhiti bhāvena anupaladdhattā idha na gahitāni.
anya-e0401n:227_56: Tāni ca cakkhu viññāṇassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannānipi tasmiṃ khaṇe ṭhiti bhāvena anupaladdhattā idha na gahitāni.
anya-e0401n:227_57: Kasmā pana cakkhuviññāṇassa uppādakkhaṇe ṭhiti bhāvena anupaladdhāni tadubhayāni idha na gahitānīti.
anya-e0401n:227_58: Cakkhu viññāṇassa uppādakkhaṇe ṭhiti bhāvena dharamānānaṃ aṭṭhacattālīsa mattānaṃ cakkhūnaṃ majjhe eva
anya-e0401n:227_59: katamaṃ cakkhu cakkhu viññāṇassa vatthu kicca dvāra kiccaṃ sādhetīti āsaṅkitabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:227_60: Ettha ca pañca vatthūni nāma attano ṭhitikkhaṇe eva pañcaviññāṇānaṃ vatthudvāra kicca sādhakattā cakkhu
anya-e0401n:227_61: viññāṇassa uppādakkhaṇe ṭhiti bhāvena anupaladdhattā idha na gahitānīti ca,
anya-e0401n:227_62: cakkhu viññāṇassa uppādakkhaṇe ṭhiti bhāvena dharamānānanti ca,
anya-e0401n:228_6: “Alātacakkassa gāhikā viyā”ti rattandhakāre eko alātaṃ gahetvā paribbhamati.
anya-e0401n:228_7: Añño taṃ passanto cakkaṃ viya maññati.
anya-e0401n:228_8: Tattha alātassa gatagataṭṭhāne paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ ārabbha cakkhudvāra vīthiyo uppajjanti.
anya-e0401n:228_9: Manodvāra vīthiyo pana purima purimāhi cakkhudvāra vīthīhi gahitāni atīta rūpāni amuñcitvā ekato saṇṭhānañca santatiñca katvā gaṇhanti.
anya-e0401n:228_16: “Saṅgaha kārenā”ti porāṇa aṭṭhakathāyo ekato saṅgahetvā katattā buddhaghosattherena katā sabbā aṭṭhakathāyo saṅgahaṭṭhakathā nāma.
anya-e0401n:228_21: “Yassa hi cattārī”tiādīsu yassa ārammaṇassa cattāri vā pañcavā chavātiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:228_23: “Attano padhāna kriyāyā”ti anuppajjitvāti padassa parato ‘yaṃ pavattatī’ti attano padhāna kriyāpadaṃ atthi.
anya-e0401n:228_25: “Katthaci vuttā”ti katthaci saddaganthesu vuttā. Api ca,
anya-e0401n:228_26: hetumhi tvāpaccayo lakkhaṇe hetumhi ca mānanta paccayā jotanīyaṭṭhena vuttā,
anya-e0401n:228_29: cattāri vā pañcavā chavā javanāni uppajjantīti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n:228_31: “Dvattikkhattuṃ”ti vāsaddatthe aññapadattha samāsapadanti vuttaṃ “dvikkhattuṃ vā tikkhattuṃ vā”ti.
anya-e0401n:228_34: Idhapi ārammaṇa dubbalatāya catuppañca javanuppatti icchi tabbāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:228_35: Tattha “idha pī”ti imasmiṃ parittā rammaṇa vārepi.
anya-e0401n:228_36: Tivoṭṭhabbanikā pañca parittā rammaṇa vīthiyoti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:228_38: “Ubhayathāpī”ti āpātā gamana vasenapi ārammaṇa karaṇa vasenapi.
anya-e0401n:229_9: “Tathā tathā”ti diṭṭha sambandhādinā tena tena pakārena.
anya-e0401n:229_18: “Parassa saddahanā”ti paravacanaṃ sutvā yathā ayaṃ vadati,
anya-e0401n:229_27: “Devato pasaṃhāravasenā”ti devatā kadāci kesañci supinante nānārammaṇāni upasaṃharitvā dassenti.
anya-e0401n:229_29: Anubodho nāma lokiyaññāṇa vasena catussacca dhammānaṃ anubujjhanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:229_31: Ananta rūpa nissaya paccayaggahaṇena pakatū panissaya paccayampi upalakkheti.
anya-e0401n:229_32: Citta santānassa anantarūpanissaya paccayabhāvo nāmāti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:229_33: Ananta rūpa nissaya paccayasatti nāma anantara parampara vippharaṇavasena mahāgatikā hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:229_34: Ananta rūpa nissaya paccayānu bhāvotipi yujjati.
anya-e0401n:229_36: “Suṭṭhu āsevitvā”ti ettha pacchā appamussamānaṃ katvā punappunaṃ sevanaṃ suṭṭhu āsevanaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:229_37: Na kevalaṃ purima citta santānassa so upanissaya paccayānubhāvo eva mahāvipphāro hoti.
anya-e0401n:229_38: Pakatiyā cittassa vicitta bhāva saṅkhātaṃ cintanā kiccampi mahāvipphāraṃ hotīti dassetuṃ “cittañca nāmā”tiādivuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:229_40: “Kiñci nimittaṃ”ti diṭṭhādīsu nānā rammaṇesu kiñci appamattakaṃ diṭṭhādikaṃ ārammaṇa nimittaṃ.
anya-e0401n:229_44: Bhavaṅga cittassa ārammaṇaṃ nāma avibhūtaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:229_46: “Laddha paccayesū”ti ālokādivasena vā diṭṭhādivasena vā laddha paccayavantesu.
anya-e0401n:229_47: Tadabhininnākāro nāma niccakālampi tesu ārammaṇesu abhimukhaṃ ninnākāro.
anya-e0401n:229_50: Etehi vacanehi suddhamanodvāre ārammaṇānaṃ apātāgamanañca bhavaṅga calanañca na kevalaṃ laddha paccayānaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ vaseneva hoti.
anya-e0401n:229_51: Tādisena pana manasikārena yuttassa sayañca vīthi citta cintanā kiccassa cittassa vasenāpi hotīti siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:229_52: Na hi ārammaṇantare abhininnākāro nāma natthīti sakkā vattuṃ. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:229_53: abhāvita cittānaṃ pamāda bahulānaṃ janānaṃ kadāci karahaci bhāvanā manasikāre karīyamānepi vīthi citta
anya-e0401n:229_55: “Yathā cetthā”ti yathā ettha manodvāre rūpārūpa sattānaṃ vibhūtā rammaṇepi tadā rammaṇuppādo natthi,
anya-e0401n:229_59: sutaṃ viya meti kathanakālepi abyākato yevāti.
anya-e0401n:229_60: Tattha hi “abyākato yevā”ti supinante manodvāre dvattikkhattuṃ uppannassa āvajjanassa vasena abyākatoyeva.
anya-e0401n:229_62: Aṭṭhasāliniyampi vuttaṃ ayaṃ pana vāro diṭṭhaṃ viya me,
anya-e0401n:229_63: sutaṃ viya me tiādīni vadanakāle labbhatīti.
anya-e0401n:229_64: Taṃ pana pañca dvāre parittārammaṇe dvattikkhattuṃ uppannassa voṭṭhabbanassa vasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:229_65: “Sopi idha laddhuṃ vaṭṭati yevā”ti sopi vāro imasmiṃ manodvāre laddhuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
anya-e0401n:229_66: “Bhavaṅge calite nivattanakavārānaṃ”ti dvikkhattuṃ bhavaṅga calanamatte ṭhatvā vīthi cittāni anuppajjitvā
anya-e0401n:229_67: bhavaṅgapātavasena nivattanakānaṃ moghavārānaṃ manodvārepi pamāṇaṃ na bhavissatiyeva.
anya-e0401n:229_70: imasmiṃ vīthi saṅgahe so vāro na vattabboti ce.
anya-e0401n:229_72: chadhā visayappavattīti imasmiṃ chakke saṅgahitattāti dassetuṃ “visaye ca āpātāgate”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:229_75: “Tadārammaṇa vārādayo”ti tadārammaṇa vāro javanavāro voṭṭhabbana vāro moghavāro.
anya-e0401n:229_76: Tesu pana tadā rammaṇavāro vatthuggahaṇe ca nāmaggahaṇe ca na labbhati.
anya-e0401n:229_79: Na ca tadā rammaṇaṃ paññattā rammaṇaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0401n:229_83: “Atīta bhavaṅga vasenā”ti ekaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ atikkamma āpātā gate ārammaṇe eko vāro,
anya-e0401n:229_84: dve bhavaṅgāni atikkamma āpātā gate ekotiādinā atīta bhavaṅga bhedavasena.
anya-e0401n:229_85: “Tadā rammaṇa vasenā”ti tadā rammaṇassa uppannavāro anuppanna vāroti evaṃ tadā rammaṇa vasena.
anya-e0401n:229_88: “Khaṇa vasena balavadubbalatā sambhavo”ti yathā pañcadvāre atimahantā rammaṇesupi ārammaṇa dhammā uppādaṃ
anya-e0401n:229_90: Attano dvāresu āpātaṃ āgantuṃ na sakkonti.
anya-e0401n:229_91: Eka cittakkhaṇaṃ pana atikkamma balavantā honti.
anya-e0401n:229_93: Mahantā rammaṇādīsu pana dvi cittakkhaṇikamatte dubbalā hontītiādinā vattabbā.
anya-e0401n:229_94: Na tathā manodvāre ārammaṇānaṃ khaṇa vasena balavadubbalatā sambhavo atthi.
anya-e0401n:230_4: Ekāvajjanā ca sā vīthi cāti viggaho.
anya-e0401n:230_7: “Taṃ taṃ javanenā”ti tena tena javanena sahuppannaṃ vā parassa cittaṃ āvajjati kinti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:230_8: “Kiñcetthā”ti ettha vacane kiñci vattabbaṃ atthīti attho.
anya-e0401n:230_9: Yadi tāva āvajjanañca javanāni cāti adhikāro.
anya-e0401n:230_13: Taṃ cittaṃ niruddhampi javanānampi paccuppannameva hotīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:230_22: Anantarapaccaye atīto ca paccuppanno ca khaṇa vasena yujjati.
anya-e0401n:230_24: paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa anantara paccayena paccayoti vutto bhaveyya. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:230_25: ekāvajjana vīthiyañhi sabbāni cittāni addhāsantati vasena paccuppannāni eva hontīti.
anya-e0401n:231_4: “Indriya samatādīhī”ti saddhādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ aññamaññaṃ anati vattanavasena samatādīhi.
anya-e0401n:231_7: Appanaṃ vahituṃ janetuṃ samattha bhāvo appanāvahasamatthabhāvo.
anya-e0401n:231_20: “Tadāhi javanaṃ patitaṃ nāma hotī”ti pakatiyā javanappavattināma sattakkhattu paramo hoti.
anya-e0401n:231_23: Tasmā tasmiṃ pañcamavāre javanaṃ patitaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0401n:231_26: Tadā anulomaṃ pathamajavanaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “aladdhā sevanaṃ anuloma”nti.
anya-e0401n:231_35: “Paṭisiddhattā”ti pañcamaṃ gotra bhuppavattiyā paṭisiddhattā ādimhi aṭṭhannaṃ aññatrasmiṃti vuttattā
anya-e0401n:231_36: idha niruddheti padaṃ avassaṃ icchitabbamevāti vuttaṃ “niruddhe anantaramevāti padacchedo”ti.
anya-e0401n:231_37: Anantara saddassa ca niccaṃ sambandhāpekkhattā tamevapadaṃ vibhatti pariṇāmena adhikatanti āha “niruddhassāti atthato laddhamevā”ti.
anya-e0401n:231_41: Mūlaṭīkā pāṭhe “bhūmantarapattiyā”ti gotrabhu cittaṃ kāmabhūmi hoti.
anya-e0401n:231_42: Appanāpana mahaggatabhūmi vā lokuttarabhūmi vā hoti.
anya-e0401n:231_44: “Ārammaṇantara laddhiyā”ti phalasamāpatti vīthiyaṃ phalajavanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:231_45: Tatthahi purimāni anuloma javanāni saṅkhārā rammaṇāni honti.
anya-e0401n:231_48: Yathāvutta leḍḍupamā eva idha yuttarūpāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:231_49: “Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabba”nti etaṃ atthajātaṃ na kho evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:231_50: “Anaddhanīyā”ti addhānaṃ dīghakālaṃ nakha mantīti anaddhanīyā. Asārā.
anya-e0401n:231_53: Sāravantā pana sārena saha vaḍḍhamānattā sīghataraṃ naruhanti.
anya-e0401n:231_58: “Supakkasālibhatta sadisānī”ti yathā sālibhattāni supakkattā eva mudutarāni hutvā dubbalāni aciraṭṭhitikāni.
anya-e0401n:231_63: “Paṭisandhiyā anantara paccaya bhāvino”ti sattama javana cetanā anantara paccayo,
anya-e0401n:231_65: tameva ca avasāne cuti cittaṃ hutvā bhavantare paṭisandhi cittassa anantara paccayo.
anya-e0401n:231_66: Evaṃ paṭisandhi cittassa anantara paccaya bhāvena avassaṃ bhavissamānassāti attho.
anya-e0401n:231_68: Mahāṭīkāvacanaṃ pana kiñci vattabba rūpanti na paṭikkhittaṃ.
anya-e0401n:231_70: Bhinnā asadisā vedanā yesaṃ tāni bhinnavedanāni.
anya-e0401n:232_2: Loke majjhimake hi mahājanehi icchitampi kiñci ārammaṇaṃ atiukkaṭṭhehi mandhātu rājādīhi icchitaṃ na hoti.
anya-e0401n:232_3: Tathā tehi mahājanehi anicchitampi kiñci ārammaṇaṃ atiduggatehi paccanta vāsīhi icchitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:232_4: Tasmā ārammaṇānaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭha vavatthānaṃ patvā atiukkaṭṭhehi ca atiduggatehi ca vavatthānaṃ na gacchati,
anya-e0401n:233_1: “Ādāse mukhanimittassa viyā”ti yathā ādāse mukha nimittassa calana cavanādiyogo nānāvaṇṇayogo ca yathāmukhameva siddho.
anya-e0401n:233_3: Vedanā yogo pana yathārammaṇameva siddhoti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:233_7: Na kevalañca vipākānaṃ eva yathārammaṇaṃ vedanā yogo hotīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:234_3: “Pañcannaṃ”ti somanassa santīraṇena saddhiṃ cattāri mahāvipāka somanassāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:234_18: “Mettāyavā pharatī”ti ayaṃ satto averohotūtiādinā mettācittena vā pharati.
anya-e0401n:234_19: “Dhātuso upasaṃharatī”ti yathā ma ma kāyopi catudhātu samussayo hoti.
anya-e0401n:234_20: Tattha ekāpi dhātu nāma paṭikūlā vā appaṭikūlā vā na hoti.
anya-e0401n:234_22: Evameva imassa sattassa kāyopītiādinā dhātu so upasaṃharati.
anya-e0401n:234_24: Asubha bhāvanā cittena vāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:234_27: Kuthitāni kuṭṭhāni yesaṃ tāni kuthita kuṭṭhāni.
anya-e0401n:234_29: Kuthita kuṭṭhāni sarīrāni yassa so kuthitakuṭṭhasarīro.
anya-e0401n:234_31: Vedanā yuttāni honti iti apare vadantīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:234_33: Kathaṃ paccayo hotīti āha “yathā ānisaṃsa dassanenā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:234_35: “Buddhasubuddhatā dassanenā”ti attano satthubhūtassa buddhassa subuddhatā dassanena.
anya-e0401n:234_36: “Attasampatti dassanenā”ti mayaṃ pana evarūpā dukkhā muttāmhāti evaṃ attano sampatti dassanena.
anya-e0401n:234_46: “Vipallāsavaseneva hotī”ti devaccharavaṇṇādīsu atiiṭṭhesu atiiṭṭhākārato gahaṇampi vipallāsa vaseneva hoti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:234_47: devacchara vaṇṇādīsu ati iṭṭha saññāya vipallāsa saññābhāvato.
anya-e0401n:235_2: Aṭṭhakathādhippāye ṭhatvā vuttattā aṭṭhakathāgāravena”taṃ vicāretabba mevā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:235_6: “Kusalākusalāni yevā”ti tesaṃ dhamma cakkhu rahitānaṃ uppannāni kusalākusalāniyeva. Gāthāyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:235_12: Tathā upekkhā kriyajavanānantarampi tadārammaṇāni somanassu pekkhāvedanā yuttāni eva siyunti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:235_16: “Vijjamāne ca tasmiṃ”ti tasmiṃ kriyajavanānu bandhake tadā rammaṇe vijjamāne sati.
anya-e0401n:235_19: “Savipphārikaṃ evajavanaṃ”ti kilesa dhammānaṃ vipallāsa dhammānañca vasena khaṇamattepi anekasatesu ārammaṇesu
anya-e0401n:235_20: vividhākārena pharaṇavegasahitaṃ kusalākusala javanameva anubandhatīti yuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:235_21: Na pana kriyajavanaṃ anubandhatīti yuttanti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:235_22: “Chaḷaṅgu pekkhāvato”ti cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hoti,
anya-e0401n:235_25: tiādinā vuttāya cha dvārikavasena chaḷaṅga samannāgatāya upekkhāya sampannassa.
anya-e0401n:235_29: “Yadi cetaṃ vucceyyā”ti ettha “etaṃ”ti kriyā byākatetiādikaṃ etaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:235_41: “Etānihī”tiādinā tesaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ javanānaṃ anantaraṃ tadārammaṇānaṃ aniyamato pavattiyā kāraṇayuttiṃ dasseti.
anya-e0401n:235_43: Tadā rammaṇassa sambhavo tadā rammaṇa sambhavo. Athavā,
anya-e0401n:235_44: sambhavanaṃ uppajjanaṃ sambhavoti ime dve atthe dassetuṃ “tadā rammaṇa sambhavo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:235_53: Na pana alabbhamānattā na vuttānīti imamatthaṃ dassento “aṭṭhakathāyaṃ panā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:235_54: “Upekkhāsahagata santīraṇa dvayameva vuttaṃ”ti āgantuka bhavaṅgabhāvena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:235_55: Yathāha athassa yadā somanassa sahagatappaṭisandhikassa pavatte jhānaṃ nibbattetvā pamādena parihīnajjhānassa
anya-e0401n:235_56: paṇīta dhammo me naṭṭhoti paccavekkhato vippaṭisāri vasena domanassaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0401n:235_60: Mahaggata dhammaṃ ārabbha javane javite tadā rammaṇampi tattheva paṭisiddhanti.
anya-e0401n:235_61: Kusala vipākāvā akusalavipākāvā upekkhā sahagatā hetukamanoviññāṇa dhātu uppajjati.
anya-e0401n:235_64: Etesu hi yadeva tasmiṃ samaye āpātamāgataṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:235_65: Taṃ ārabbha etaṃ cittaṃ uppajjatīti veditabbaṃ- ti.
anya-e0401n:235_66: Evaṃ domanassasahagata javanānurūpaṃ upekkhāsahagata santīraṇa dvayameva āgantuka bhavaṅgabhāvena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanti.
anya-e0401n:235_67: “Etampi yujjati yevā”ti akusala javanāvasāne etaṃ sahetukaṃ āgantuka bhavaṅgaṃpi yujjatiyeva.
anya-e0401n:235_68: “Domanassa javanānantaraṃ bhavaṅga pātova hotī”ti upekkhā sahagata mūlabhavaṅga pātova hoti.
anya-e0401n:235_73: Na hi mahantārammaṇesu ca avibhūtārammaṇesu ca tadārammaṇavāro sambhavati.
anya-e0401n:235_74: Na ca mūlabhavaṅga sambhavo atthi. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:235_75: mūlabhavaṅgabhū tassa somanassa bhavaṅgassa domanassa javanena saha viruddhattā.
anya-e0401n:235_78: Tathā tasseva domanassaṃ uppādentassa neva tadārammaṇa sambhavo atthi.
anya-e0401n:235_79: Na ca mūlabhavaṅga sambhavoti katvā domanassānantaraṃ chasu…pe…
anya-e0401n:235_83: ārammaṇānaṃ atimahantattepi ativibhūtattepi sati somanassa tadārammaṇassa javanena saha viruddhattā.
anya-e0401n:235_84: Upekkhā tadā rammaṇassa ca ārammaṇena saha viruddhattā.
anya-e0401n:235_85: Na hi ati iṭṭhārammaṇe upekkhā tadārammaṇaṃ pavattati.
anya-e0401n:235_86: Mahaggata paññattā rammaṇesu pana ubhayampi tadārammaṇaṃ nuppajjatiyeva.
anya-e0401n:235_87: Na ca mūlabhavaṅga sambhavo atthi. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:236_8: Kathaṃ āvajjanena vinā nuppajjatīti āha “sace āvajjanenā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:236_10: Yathā pana nirāvajjanaṃ hoti bhinnā rammaṇañca,
anya-e0401n:236_15: “Savipphandanattā”ti ettha attho savipphārikanti pade vuttanayena veditabbo.
anya-e0401n:236_18: Yadi tadārammaṇū panissa yassa kāmabhavaṅgassa abhāvato tadārammaṇāni rūpārūpa brahmānaṃ nuppajjanti.
anya-e0401n:236_20: cakkhusota dvārika cittānipi rūpa brahmānaṃ nuppajjeyyunti āha “cakkhu sotaviññāṇāni panā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:236_21: “Indriyappavatti ānubhāvato”ti cakkhu vatthu sotavatthu saṅkhātānaṃ indriya vatthūnaṃ rūpa brahma santāne
anya-e0401n:236_22: pavattattā tesaṃ pavatti ānubhāvato cakkhu sotaviññāṇāni rūpabrahmānaṃ pavattantiye vāti dassetuṃ “sampaṭicchana
anya-e0401n:236_24: “Vikappabalevā”ti kāmakusalā kusalānaṃ viya vividhena ākārena kappetvā pakappetvā ārammaṇaggahasāmatthiyevāsati.
anya-e0401n:236_25: “Appanāpatta bhāvanā kammavisese vā”ti ettha abhiññā javanāni viya mahaggata vipāka lokuttara vipākāni viya cāti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:236_27: “Vibhāvaniyaṃ vutta kāraṇānī”ti aṭṭhakathāto āharitvā vibhāvaniyaṃ vuttāni ‘ajanakattā janaka samānattā bhāvato’tiādīni kāraṇāni.
anya-e0401n:237_3: Yathāha sace pana balavā rammaṇaṃ āpātāgataṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:237_5: Javanaṭṭhāne pana pathamakāmāvacara kusala cittaṃ javanaṃ hutvā chasattavāre javitvā tadārammaṇassa vāraṃ detīti.
anya-e0401n:237_6: “Mudutara bhāvenā”ti mātukucchimhi ṭhitakālevā sampati jātakāle vā vatthussa atimudubhāvena.
anya-e0401n:237_7: “Kenaciupadduta bhāvenā”ti bāḷhagelaññajātakāle kenaci vātapittasemhādinā upadduta bhāvena.
anya-e0401n:237_9: Mandībhūto vego yesaṃ tāni mandībhūta vegāni.
anya-e0401n:237_12: Tañca kho vacanaṃ pākatika sattānaṃ vaseneva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:237_15: sattavisesānaṃ vasena kathaṃ daṭṭhabbanti āha “ye panā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:238_3: Attano anantare eva uppannaṃ phalaṃ etissāti ānantarikapphalā.
anya-e0401n:238_9: “Payogābhisaṅkhārassā”ti pathamajjhānato paṭṭhāya samatha vipassanāyuganandhappavatti saṅkhātassa pubbappayogābhisaṅkhārassa.
anya-e0401n:240_2: Jāti dvihetukādayo eva adhippetāti vuttaṃ “paṭisandhiviññāṇa sahagatā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:240_5: Vipākāni ca tāni āvaraṇāni cāti viggaho.
anya-e0401n:240_7: Tehi gahitappaṭisandhikānaṃ imasmiṃ bhavejhāna maggaphalappaṭilābho nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n:241_5: “Sabba aṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhitto”ti aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ tāva vipākuddhārakathāyaṃ soḷasasu kāmāvacara kusala
anya-e0401n:241_6: vipākesu aṭṭhannaṃ ahetuka vipākānaṃ eva āpāyikesu sattesu uppattiṃ dasseti.
anya-e0401n:241_8: Tathā paṭicca samuppādaṭṭha kathāsu ca viññāṇa padavaṇṇanāsu aññāsu ca abhidhammāvatārādīsūti evaṃ sabbaṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhittā nāma hoti.
anya-e0401n:241_10: Kusalākusalāni hi vaḍḍhetuṃ vā hāpetuṃ vā payoge kate vaḍḍhanti ceva hāyanti ca.
anya-e0401n:241_15: Vuttañhi tattha ‘aparepana yathā ahetukānaṃ sahetuka tadārammaṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e0401n:241_17: Tesaṃmatānurodhena ca idhapi ñāṇasampayutta vipākappaṭikkhepo ahetukeyeva sandhāyāti vadantīti.
anya-e0401n:241_18: Taṃ pana vipākuddhārakathāyaṃ ‘ettheva dvādasa kamaggopī’ti ca,
anya-e0401n:241_19: ettheva dasakamaggopī’ti ca āgatehi na sameti.
anya-e0401n:241_20: Tattha hi soḷasasukusalavipākesu dvihetuka kammanibbattānaṃ dvinnaṃ dvihetukāhetuka puggalānaṃ cattāri
anya-e0401n:241_21: ñāṇasampayutta vipākāni vajjetvā dvādasa kamaggo nāma hoti.
anya-e0401n:241_22: Puna sesesu dvādasa vipākesupi asaṅkhārika kammanibbattānaṃ dve ñāṇavippayutta sasaṅkhārika vipākāni,
anya-e0401n:241_23: sasaṅkhārika kammanibbattānañca dve ñāṇavippayutta asaṅkhārika vipākāni vajjetvā dutiyatthera vāde dasakamaggo nāma hotīti.
anya-e0401n:241_24: Ettha pana dvi hetukopi puggalo adhikena chandena vā vīriyena vā cittena vā yutto pariyatti dhammaṃ vā nānāvijjāsippāni vā bahuṃ gaṇheyya, suṇeyya, dhāreyya, vāceyya, cinteyya.
anya-e0401n:241_25: Athassa ñāṇasampayutta javanaṃ bahulaṃ samudā careyya.
anya-e0401n:241_26: Tadā tassa nānākammena javanānu rūpaṃ ñāṇasampayutta tadārammaṇaṃ na na sambhavatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:241_30: Etāni hi manussesu ca kāmāvacara devesu ca puññavantānaṃ dvihetukati hetukānaṃ paṭisandhikāle paṭisandhi hutvā vipaccantītiādinā vuttāti.
anya-e0401n:241_35: “Sikkhana dhammayuttā”ti tīhi sikkhāhi pahātabbānaṃ kilesānaṃ atthitāya sikkhitabbatā pakatiyaṃ ṭhitāti
anya-e0401n:241_39: “Pariniṭṭhita sikkhā kiccattā”ti sikkhā kiccaṃ nāma kilesa dhammānaṃ pahānatthāya eva hotīti tesu sabbaso pahīnesu sikkhā kiccaṃ pariniṭṭhitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:242_3: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ dvāre uppannāni taṃ taṃ dvārikāni.
anya-e0401n:242_11: Soca kho kāmāvacare aniṭṭha rūpadassana saddasavanavasena,
anya-e0401n:242_12: brahmaloke pana aniṭṭhā rūpādayo nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n:242_18: “Taṃ taṃ bhūmi pariyāpanne”ti tissaṃ tissaṃ bhūmiyaṃ pariyāpanne.
anya-e0401n:245_7: “Taṃ gahaṇene vā”ti sandhiggahaṇena eva sandhivacanena eva.
anya-e0401n:245_8: “Visayappavatti nāmā”ti kamma kammanimittādīnaṃ visayānaṃ dvāresu āpātā gamana vasena pavatti nāma.
anya-e0401n:245_9: “Maraṇuppattiyaṃ eva siddhā”ti maraṇuppattiyaṃ javanesu eva siddhā.
anya-e0401n:245_12: Na hi tasmiṃ vidhāne tassaṃ cutiyaṃ visayappavatti vacanaṃ nāma atthi.
anya-e0401n:245_14: Sā pana cuti tasmiṃ bhave ādimhi paṭisandhi pavattiyā siddhāya sijjhati yevāti.
anya-e0401n:245_26: “Iti katvā”ti iti vacanatthaṃ katvā uparidevā surāti vuccantīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:245_32: Tesaṃ pavatti upari ‘vinipātikāsurānañcā’ti pade āvi bhavissati.
anya-e0401n:245_35: Evaṃ kathāvatthu pāḷiyaṃ āgatā vessabhu ādayo yamarājānopanāti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:245_36: Vessabhū ca notti ca somo ca yamo ca vessavaṇo ca iti ime petti rājāno.
anya-e0401n:245_38: Ye ca yakkharakkhasā nāma karontā vicarantīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:245_43: Tehi yakkha rakkhasā nāma bhūmaṭṭhakāpi santi,
anya-e0401n:246_5: Kasmā tikkhatara cittā hontīti vuttanti āha “paripuṇṇānaṃ”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:246_6: Pubbavākye ananta cakkavāḷasādhāraṇa vasena vuttattā puna “imasmiṃ”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:246_12: “Idha brahmacariyavāso”ti idheva sikkhattayapūraṇa saṅkhātassa brahmacariyavāsassa atthitā.
anya-e0401n:246_18: Pathavi gatāni ratanabhaṇḍāni yesaṃ teti viggaho.
anya-e0401n:246_19: “Dānavarakkhasā”ti danunāmadevadhītāya apaccanti atthena dānava nāmakā rakkhasā.
anya-e0401n:246_31: Vasundharā ca te deva yakkhā cāti viggaho.
anya-e0401n:246_35: “Kīḷāpasutavasenā”ti bodhisattānañca buddhānañca acchariya dhammajātakāle ugghosana kīḷākammavaḍḍhanavasena.
anya-e0401n:246_36: “Yāsañca mantapadānī”ti yāsaṃ niggaha paggahapūjanādi vasena pavattāni mantapadāni.
anya-e0401n:246_48: “Niyacchantī”ti aññamaññaṃ issāmacchariya mūlakehi kalahabhaṇḍanādīhi vigacchantīti attho.
anya-e0401n:246_49: “Taṃ sahacaritattā”ti tena yāma nāmakena issaradevakulena niccakālaṃ saha pavattattā.
anya-e0401n:247_1: Taṃ pana ṭhānaṃ uccaṭṭhānaṃ nāma hotīti āha “ucceṭhāne”ti.
anya-e0401n:247_2: “Sahasso brahmā”tiādīsu attano sarīrobhāsena sahassaṃ cakkavāḷa lokaṃ pharanto sahassonāmāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ adhippetaṃ.
anya-e0401n:247_3: Kuladevatāyo nāma kula parampara pūjita devatāyo nāma.
anya-e0401n:247_4: “Upaṭṭhahantī”ti yuttaṭṭhāne devavatthu devamālakāni katvā samaye samaye tattha gantvā gandhamālādīhi pūjenti, vandanti, thomenti,
anya-e0401n:247_12: “Acala saṇṭhitā”ti dutīya tale viya calitā na hoti.
anya-e0401n:247_25: Kiṃ vihaññanaṃ nāmāti āha “samathavipassanā kammesu avipphārikatā pattī”ti.
anya-e0401n:247_26: Cittassa avipphāratā pajjanaṃ nāma natthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:247_31: Tattha pasādacakkhu eva idha dibbacakkhūtipi vuccati.
anya-e0401n:247_33: “Paññā cakkhū”ti vipassanā ñāṇapaccavekkhanāñāṇehi saddhiṃ avasesaṃ sabbaññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:249_8: Tassa ādito paṭṭhāya vipannattā tena samannāgato puggalo vatthuvipannoti vuccati.
anya-e0401n:249_13: Dvihetuka tihetukānaṃpi na sakkā niyametunti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:249_14: Kathaṃ na sakkāti āha “mātukucchimhi vipatti nāma natthī”ti.
anya-e0401n:249_18: Parūpakkamenavā mātuyā visama payogena vā nānābādhena vā vipattīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:249_23: “Bhūmissitā”ti pāṭhe bhūmiyaṃ sitā nissitāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “puññanibbattassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:249_28: Vivasāti ca attano vasena icchāya vināti attho.
anya-e0401n:249_32: Tāsetvā pīḷetvā vā jīvitaṃ kappentīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:249_35: Te pana puññāpuññamissaka kammena nibbattattā keci divā dibbasukhaṃ anubhavanti,
anya-e0401n:249_39: Parehi dattaṃ dinnaṃ puññapphalaṃ upanissāya jīvantīti paradattūpajīvino.
anya-e0401n:249_40: “Parehi dinnaṃ puññapphalaṃ”ti ñātakehi puññaṃ katvā idaṃ me puññaṃ petānaṃ kālaṅkatānaṃ ñātīnaṃ dedhīti evaṃ dinnaṃ puññapphalaṃ.
anya-e0401n:249_41: “Sakalacakkavāḷapariyāpannā ekabhūmakā”ti yathā tāvatiṃsābhūmi nāma sabba cakkavāḷesupi atthi.
anya-e0401n:249_42: Sabbāpi dibbena vassasahassena ekaāyu paricchedo hoti.
anya-e0401n:249_44: Na tathā nirayesu vā tiracchāna yoniyaṃ vā pettivisayevā asurakāyevā manussesuvā bhummadevesu vā ekaparicchedo nāma atthi.
anya-e0401n:249_45: Catunnaṃ apāyānaṃ āyuppamāṇa gaṇanāya niyamo natthīti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0401n:249_46: na nu brahma saṃyutte kokālikaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha bhagavatā vutto dasannaṃ nirayānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ atthīti.
anya-e0401n:249_48: Te pana dasanirayā avīciniraye pariyāpannā hutvā tassa padesamattā honti.
anya-e0401n:249_49: Na tehi pade samattehi sakalo avīcinirayo niyatāyu parimāṇoti sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0401n:249_50: Api ca sopi tesaṃ āyuparicchedo avīcibhūmiyā niyāmena siddho na hoti.
anya-e0401n:249_55: “Evaṃ sante”ti na itara dīpavāsīnaṃ āyukappassa ārohaṇañca orohaṇañca atthīti vutte satīti attho.
anya-e0401n:249_62: Ādikappakāle sabbesampi catudīpa vāsīnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyāyukatā sambhavatoti.
anya-e0401n:249_63: Atha itaradīpavāsīnampi āyukappassa ārohaṇaṃ orohaṇañca atthi.
anya-e0401n:249_65: etarahipi tesaṃ āyukappo jambudīpavāsīnaṃ āyukappena ekagatiko siyāti codanā.
anya-e0401n:249_67: Natthi idaṃ mama idaṃ mamāti pavattā pāṭipuggalikataṇhā etesanti “amamā”.
anya-e0401n:249_71: “Yāva nimirājakālā”ti yāva amhākaṃ bodhisattabhūtassa nimirañño uppannakālā.
anya-e0401n:249_73: Nimirājā pana imasmiṃ antara kappe uppanno.
anya-e0401n:249_74: “Manussa lokehi paññāsavassāni cātumahārājike ekodibbarattidivo hotī”tiādi abhidhamme dhamma hadaya vibhaṅge āgatanayena vutto.
anya-e0401n:249_85: “Ādianta dassanavasenā”ti cātumahārājike manussavassagaṇanā dassanaṃ ādidassanaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:249_86: Idāni vasavattiyaṃ manussavassagaṇanā dassanaṃ anta dassanaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:250_4: Kappīyati vassa, utu, māsa, pakkha, ratti, divā,
anya-e0401n:250_6: Kappīyanti vā nānādhammappavattiyo atītā divasena paricchijjīyanti etenāti kappo. Kālo.
anya-e0401n:250_8: Vassānaṃ satabhāgehipi sahassabhāgehipi satasahassabhāgehipi saṅkhātuṃ asakkuṇeyyoti asaṅkhyeyyo.
anya-e0401n:250_9: Ekassa asaṅkhyeyyassa antare dissamāno kappo antarakappo.
anya-e0401n:250_11: So pana manussānaṃ dasavassāyukakāle dasavassena paricchinno.
anya-e0401n:250_12: Nevasaññā devānaṃ niccakālaṃ caturāsīti kappasahassehi paricchinno.
anya-e0401n:250_14: Vīsatippabhedā cūḷakappā vuccantīti keci vadantītiādinā yojanā.
anya-e0401n:251_6: Aṭṭhame aṭṭhamevāre loko dakena vinassatīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:251_14: “Dve asaṅkhyeyyānī”ti aḍḍhadvayaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyanti katvā upacārena vuttaṃ. Yathātaṃ-
anya-e0401n:251_16: “Upaḍḍhenā”ti udakavāre heṭṭhimabhūmīsu udakena vinassamānāsu dutīyajjhānabhūmi na tāva vinassati.
anya-e0401n:253_11: sabbampi kammaṃ kammapathapattaṃ nāma hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:253_31: “Vuttappakārā”ti ‘vipaccituṃ aladdhokāsāvā vipakka vipākā vā sabbāpi kusalā kusala cetanā’ti evaṃ vuttappakārā.
anya-e0401n:253_32: “Dubbalataraṃ katvā vā vibādhamānā”ti upapīḷaka kammakiccaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:253_36: “Upatthambhakampi tabbipariyāyena veditabbaṃ”ti upapīḷaka kammato vipariyāyena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:253_37: ‘Uparibhūmi nibbattakampi samānaṃ heṭṭhābhūmiyaṃ nibbattetī’tiādīsu ‘heṭṭhābhūmi nibbattakampi samānaṃ
anya-e0401n:253_39: Ajātasatturājavatthumhi tassa rañño pitughātakammaṃ mahāavīciniraye nibbattanakampi samānaṃ pacchā buddhu
anya-e0401n:253_40: paṭṭhāna kammena bādhīyamānaṃ vihatasāmatthiyaṃ hutvā taṃ ussadaniraye nibbatteti.
anya-e0401n:253_41: Khandhasantānassa vibādhanaṃ nāma sattassa dukkhuppatti karaṇanti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:253_42: Kathaṃ gomahiṃsādīnaṃ puttadārañātimittānañca vipattikaraṇaṃ tassa sattassa upapīḷaka kammakiccaṃ bhaveyya.
anya-e0401n:253_45: Na ca aññena kataṃ kammaṃ aññesaṃ sattānaṃ dukkhuppattiṃ vā sukhuppattiṃ vā kareyyāti codanā.
anya-e0401n:253_50: So tato cavitvā ekasmiṃ gāmake ekissā itthiyākucchimhi jāto.
anya-e0401n:253_51: Tassa jātakālato paṭṭhāya tassa pāpakammena mātaraṃ ādiṃ katvā sakalagāmikānaṃ janānaṃ dukkhuppatti hotīti dhammapada aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:253_52: Tasmā nissandaphalavasena aññena kataṃ kammaṃ aññesaṃ sattānaṃ dukkhuppattiṃ vā sukhuppattiṃ vā karoti yevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:253_53: [“Kammajasantati sīsesū”ti paṭisandhikālato paṭṭhāya uppannā ekekā kammajarūpasantati nāma atthi.
anya-e0401n:253_54: Sā pacchā aparāparaṃ tādisāya kammajarūpasantatiyā pavattatthāya sīsabhūtattā santati sīsanti vuccati.
anya-e0401n:253_61: Duṭṭhagāmaṇi rañño vatthumhi ca soṇatthera pituno vatthumhi ca tesaṃ maraṇāsannakāle pathamaṃ duggati nimittāni upaṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0401n:253_62: Pacchā rañño ekaṃ pubbakataṃ kalyāṇa kammaṃ anussarantassa therapitu ca taṅkhaṇe eva ekaṃ kalyāṇa kammaṃ
anya-e0401n:253_66: Kusalā kusala kammānaṃ khayaṃ karotīti kusalā kusala kammakkhayakaro.
anya-e0401n:253_67: “Āyu kammesu vijjamānesū”ti tassa sattassa āyu paricchedo ca pariyanta gato na hoti,
anya-e0401n:253_70: “Aparādha kammassā”ti mātāpitūsuvā dhammikasamaṇa brāhmaṇesu vā aparajjhanavasena katassa aparādhakammassa.
anya-e0401n:253_80: Tassa janakaṃ kammaṃ janaka kammanti vuccati.
anya-e0401n:253_81: Tasseva khandhasantānassa upatthambhakaṃ tasseva upapīḷakaṃ tasseva upaghātakaṃ kammaṃ upaghātaka kammanti vuccatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:253_83: Dhammadinnāya nāma uggasena rañño deviyā vatthumhi sādevī pubbe ekaṃ ajaṃ ghātesi,
anya-e0401n:253_84: tena kammena apāyesu patitvā pacchā pavatti vipākavasena bahūsu bhavesu ajasarīre lomagaṇanāmattaṃ attano sīsacchedana dukkhaṃ anubhosīti.
anya-e0401n:253_85: “Sā panā”ti sā ekā pāṇātipāta cetanā pana.
anya-e0401n:253_86: Mahāmoggalāna vatthu nāma pañcasata corānaṃ therassa ghāta na vatthu.
anya-e0401n:253_87: Therohi attanā pubbakatena upacchedaka kammena coraghātanaṃ labhitvā parinibbuto.
anya-e0401n:253_88: Sāmāvatidevī ca vaggumudānaditīravāsino pañcasata bhikkhū ca attano pubbakatehi upacchedaka kammehi tādisaṃ parūpakkamaṃ labhitvā saggesu nibbattā.
anya-e0401n:253_89: Dussimāro nāma kakusandha buddhakāle māradeva putto vuccati.
anya-e0401n:253_90: Kalāburājānāma khanti vāditā pasassa ghātako vuccati.
anya-e0401n:253_91: Te pana taṅkhaṇe attanā katena upacchedaka kammena taṅkhaṇe eva cavitvā avīcimhi nibbattā.
anya-e0401n:253_92: Tattha purima vatthūsu upacchedaka kammaṃ upacchindana mattaṃ karoti.
anya-e0401n:253_97: “Upacchedana pubbakaṃ”ti upacchedana pubbakaṃ vipākaṃ janetīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:253_98: Kammantarassa vipākaṃ upacchinditvāva attano vipākaṃ janetīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:253_99: Tattha “attano vipākaṃ janetī”ti idha kadāci janeti,
anya-e0401n:253_100: kadāci na janetīti evaṃ vibhāgassa akatattā “taṃ na sundaraṃ”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:253_102: “Aṭṭhakathāsuyeva āgatattā”ti tesu vatthūsu tejanā upacchedaka kammena marantīti evaṃ vatvā āgatattā.
anya-e0401n:255_1: “Nikanti balena vā paṭibāhiyamānaṃ vipākaṃ na detī”ti jhānalābhino hutvāpi maraṇakāle uppajjituṃ nikantiyā sati,
