anya-e0401n:255_2: taṃ jhānaṃ vipākaṃ na detīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:255_5: Antima javanavīthiyaṃ kataṃ nāma vatthu dubbalattā sayampi dubbalaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:255_10: na detīti na vattabbanti dassetuṃ “micchādiṭṭhikammaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:255_11: Kataṃ āsanna kammaṃ nāmāti gahetabbanti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:255_18: Idaṃ garuka catukkaṃ nāma anantare bhave vipaccanakānaṃ kammānaṃ vasena vuttanti āha “upapajjavedanīya kammāni evā”ti.
anya-e0401n:255_24: Kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ uppannaṃ hoti cakkhu viññāṇanti ca,
anya-e0401n:255_25: akusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ uppannaṃ hoti cakkhu viññāṇanti ca,
anya-e0401n:255_27: Etthahi katattāti vatvā puna upacitattāti vacanaṃ punappunaṃ vaḍḍhanasaṅkhāte āsevane sati eva vipākaṃ detīti ñāpeti.
anya-e0401n:255_28: Tasmā katamatta kammattā kaṭattā kammaṃ nāmāti vuttepi anantarabhave vipaccanaka kammasseva idha adhippetattā
anya-e0401n:255_29: punappunaṃ laddhā sevanameva idha gahetabbanti dassetuṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “punappunaṃ laddhāsevanaṃ”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:256_1: “Yattha taṃ pubbakataṃ kammanti āgataṃ”ti yasmiṃ aṭṭhakathā padese taṃ kaṭattā kammaṃ pubbakataṃ kammaṃti āgataṃ.
anya-e0401n:257_6: Maraṇa divase pana sāriputtattherassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā cavitvā tena āsanna kammena sagge nibbatti.
anya-e0401n:257_7: Vātakālassa yāvajīvaṃ bahūni kalyāṇa kammāni āciṇṇāni.
anya-e0401n:257_8: Maraṇa divasepana buddhasāsane viparīta saññaṃ katvā tena āsanna kammena apāye nibbatti.
anya-e0401n:259_7: Attasaṅkhātassa diṭṭhiyā parikappitasārassa bhāvo pavatti kāraṇanti katvāti imamatthaṃ dassento “diṭṭha dhammo vuccatī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:259_9: Paṭisaṃvedana kriyāpade vipākanti kammapadaṃ disvā vipākaṃ nāma veditabbaṃ vedanīyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:259_21: “Diṭṭhadhammā nāgatānantara bhavehī”ti diṭṭhadhammato ca anāgatānantara bhavato cāti attho.
anya-e0401n:259_27: Ahosi kamme “ahosī”ti padaṃ aññāsi koṇḍaññoti padeviya ruḷhīnāmapadanti āha “ahosi nāmakaṃ”ti.
anya-e0401n:259_28: Taṃ pana ruḷhipadaṃ kutopavattaṃti āha “ahosi kammaṃ”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:259_29: “Evaṃ vutta pāṭhavasenā”ti ettha idha vutto pāṭho sā vaseso.
anya-e0401n:259_30: Paripuṇṇapāṭho pana ahosi kammaṃ ahosi kamma vipāko,
anya-e0401n:259_35: ahosi kammaṃ na bhavissati kamma vipākotiādinā paṭisambhidā magge āgato.
anya-e0401n:259_37: “Appatara vipākā cātī”ti ettha “itī”ti hetu atthe nipāto,
anya-e0401n:259_38: tasmā aciraṭṭhiti kattā diṭṭha dhamme eva phalaṃ datvā vigacchati,
anya-e0401n:259_39: tasmā appatara vipākattā ahetukamattaṃ phalaṃ datvā vigacchatīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:259_40: “Paccayoti cā”ti paccayaṃ laddhāti vutto paccayoti ca.
anya-e0401n:259_42: “Kākavaliyādīnaṃ viyā”ti kākavaliyādīnaṃ puggalānaṃ diṭṭhavedanīya kammaṃ viya.
anya-e0401n:259_43: “Pākaṭatarapphaladānaṃ”ti sattāhabbhantare eva seṭṭhiṭṭhānappaṭi lābhādivasena pākaṭatarapphaladānakaṃ kammavisesaṃ.
anya-e0401n:259_44: Kamma pathajavanasantāne pavattā pathamajavana cetanā vā itarāpi pathama javana cetanā vāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:260_8: “Sugatiyaṃ vipattiṃ anubhavantāni vatthūnī”ti ettha “vipattiṃ”ti cakkhu sotādīnaṃ aṅga paccaṅgānaṃ vā vipattiṃ.
anya-e0401n:260_13: “Tesaṃ saṅkamanaṃ natthī”ti tesaṃ kammānaṃ vipaccanakāla saṅkanti nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n:260_14: “Yathāṭhāneyeva patiṭṭhantī”ti tāni diṭṭha dhammaṭṭhānādivasena bhagavatā yathā vuttaṭṭhāne eva tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0401n:260_16: “Yuttiyā vā abhāvato”ti ettha diṭṭha dhamma vedanīyassa paṭisandhi vipākādi yuttiyā abhāvato.
anya-e0401n:262_7: Agamanīyavatthūni nāma avītikkamanatthāya anupagantabbāni māturakkhitādīni itthi purisasarīrāni.
anya-e0401n:262_10: “Acchindaka cetanā”ti parasantakassa attano santakakaraṇavasena bhusaṃ parasantakā bhāvacchindaka cetanā.
anya-e0401n:262_13: “Etthapī”ti yathā adinnādāne parapariggahita saññinoti dutīyaṃ aṅgapadaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:262_15: Ettha vadanti agamanīya vatthu vasena cittanti avatvā tasmiṃ sevana cittanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:262_16: Tasmā agamanīya vatthu saññitāti avuttampi vuttasadisaṃ hotīti. Na hoti.
anya-e0401n:262_17: Na hi tasminti vacanaṃ saññāvisesa sahitaṃ atthaṃ vadati.
anya-e0401n:262_18: Īdisesu ca ṭhānesu sace saññāpadhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:262_20: parapariggahita saññitā,ti aṅga padaṃ viya idhapi agamanīya vatthu saññitāti dutīyaṃ aṅgapadaṃ avassaṃ vattabbaṃ hoti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:262_43: “Na gahitaṃ”ti therena vā aṭṭhakathācariyehi vā na gahitaṃ.
anya-e0401n:262_44: Surañca merayañca pivanti etenāti surāmeraya pānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:262_46: “Sabba lahuko”ti sabbesaṃ surāpāna kamma vipākānaṃ majjhe yo vipāko lahukataro,
anya-e0401n:262_52: Paṭisambhidā maggaṭīkāyaṃ imassa vākyassa saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:262_53: Tattha “tabbi ramaṇādayo cā”ti tato surāpānato viramaṇādayo ca.
anya-e0401n:262_63: Surāpānaṃ visuṃ paṭisandhiṃ na detīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:262_64: Tabbirati kamme pana sace idaṃ surāpānaṃ nāma pāpakammaṃ duccaritanti ñatvā samādāna virati sampattavirati vasena taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ rakkhati.
anya-e0401n:262_65: Taṃ sīlaṃ aññehi puññapathehi asambandhampi visuṃ paṭisandhiṃ na detīti na vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:262_66: “Evamidaṃ pī”ti evaṃ idampi surāpāna kammaṃ kamma pathapattassa kammassa parivārabhūtaṃ eva paṭisandhiṃ janetīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:262_68: Sarūpato na vuttanti ca sakkā vattunti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:262_71: Kamma jananaṃ nāma duccarita kammānaṃ jananaṃ.
anya-e0401n:262_72: Sakkena devāna mindena tassa apāyagāmitā vuttāti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:262_82: vedanā hotītiādinā vutte dhammuddesavāre jhānādikoṭṭhāsā nāma āgatā.
anya-e0401n:262_83: Tesu pañca sikkhāpadā koṭṭhāsato kammapatha koṭṭhāsikā eva.
anya-e0401n:263_7: tasmā so kammānaṃ pavatti mukhanti vuccatīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:263_11: Tasmā kāyadvāre vuttitoti ca vacīdvāre vuttitoti ca vuttanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:263_14: “Chabbidhāni tāni vajjānīti”ti ‘kāyakammaṃ jaheyyu’ntiādīni chabbidhāni tāni vajjāni.
anya-e0401n:263_15: Kathaṃ ekamekena bāhulla saddena chabbidhāni tāni vajjetīti.
anya-e0401n:263_16: Anvayato ca byatirekato ca vajjeti. Kathaṃ,
anya-e0401n:263_17: pāṇātipāta kammaṃ kadāci appakena vacīdvāre uppannampi kāyadvāre eva pavatti bahulattā kāyakammameva hoti.
anya-e0401n:263_19: Dve vā assa nāmāni na bhavanti.
anya-e0401n:263_20: Vacīdvāre pana appakavuttittā vacīkammaṃ nāma na hoti.
anya-e0401n:263_22: Dve vā assa nāmāni na bhavantīti evaṃ ekena kāyadvāre bāhulla vuttivacanena pāṇātipāta kamme chabbidhāni vajjāni vajjetīti.
anya-e0401n:263_25: So pana kadāci appakena gāme carantopi vane bāhulla cārittā vanacarako eva hoti.
anya-e0401n:263_27: Dve vā assa nāmāni na bhavanti.
anya-e0401n:263_29: Saṅgāmāvacaro nāma saṅgāme bāhullāvacaro hatthī vuccati.
anya-e0401n:263_30: Ettha manodvāraṃ sabba kamma sādhāraṇattā kammāni visesetuṃ na sakkotīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:263_32: ‘abhijjhā byāpādo micchādiṭṭhi ceti manasmiṃ vuttito manokammaṃ nāmā’ti idaṃ na vattabbanti.
anya-e0401n:263_37: “Kāyakammadvāraṃ”ti ettha tattha copanakāyo kāyakammānaṃ pavatti bahulattā kāyakamma dvāraṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:263_38: Copanavācā tattha vacīkammānaṃ pavatti bahulattā vacīkammadvāraṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:263_39: Kusalā kusala javana cittaṃ pana manokammānaṃ tattheva kamma kicca siddhito manokamma dvāraṃ nāmāti evaṃ kammena dvāra vavatthānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:263_40: “Tassa dvārassa nāmaṃ bhindituṃ vā”ti kāyoti nāmaṃ bhindituṃ vā.
anya-e0401n:263_41: “Attano nāmaṃ dātunti vā”ti vacīti nāmaṃ tassa dātuṃ vā.
anya-e0401n:263_42: “Brāhmaṇa gāmādīnaṃ brāhmaṇa gāmādibhāvo viyā”ti tasmiṃ aññakulesu vasantesupi brāhmaṇa kulabahulattā brāhmaṇa gāmotveva nāmaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:263_43: Tasmiṃ vane aññarukkhesu santesupi khadīrarukkha bahulattā khadīravanantveva nāmaṃ hotīti vattabbanti.
anya-e0401n:264_4: “Nirutti nayenā”ti ettha piyasuñña karaṇāti vattabbe akkhara lopakaraṇaṃ nirutti nayo nāma.
anya-e0401n:264_6: “Samphaṃ”ti ettha saṃsaddo sammati dukkhaṃ etenāti atthena sukhe hite vattatīti āha “saṃ sukhaṃ hitañcā”ti.
anya-e0401n:264_9: Hitasukhassa vināsanaṃ nāma tassa āgamana maggabhindananti āha “hitasukha maggaṃ bhindatī”ti.
anya-e0401n:264_11: “Attha dhammā pagatassā”ti atthato ca dhammato ca apagatassa.
anya-e0401n:264_12: “Paṭibhāṇa cittassā”ti suṇantānaṃ cittarati cittahāsavaḍḍhanatthāya paṭibhāṇaññāṇena cittīkatassa.
anya-e0401n:264_14: “Attha dhamma vinayapadaṃ”ti attha padañca dhammapadañca vinaya padañca.
anya-e0401n:264_22: idaṃ duccaritaṃ nāma apāya saṃvattanikanti evaṃ sabhāva dhammesu kosalla janakaṃ vākya padaṃ dhamma padaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:264_26: evaṃ doso vinetabbotiādinā vinetabbesu vinaya kosallajanakaṃ vākyapadaṃ vinaya padaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:264_27: Yattha evarūpaṃ attha padañca dhamma padañca vinaya padañca kiñci natthi.
anya-e0401n:264_28: Tassa vācā vatthumattassa etaṃnāmaṃ hotīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:264_42: “Saṃkiliṭṭha cetanā”ti attha purekkhāra dhamma purekkhāra vinaya purekkhāra anusāsani purekkhāra rahitā
anya-e0401n:264_43: kevalaṃ bhedapurekkhāra cetanā saṃkiliṭṭha cetanā nāma.
anya-e0401n:264_44: “Pare bhinne yevā”ti parajane parajanena mithubhedavasena bhinneyeva.
anya-e0401n:264_47: Evaṃ akkosana kammaṃpi akkositabbassa dūre ṭhitassapi matassapi sampajjatīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:264_48: Anatthaṃ niratthakavācā vatthu mattaṃ viññāpetīti anatthaviññāpanako.
anya-e0401n:264_50: tathā taṃ vatthu uppanna pubbanti evaṃ saccato gaṇhanteyeva.
anya-e0401n:264_51: Keci saccato gaṇhitvā kiñci vatthuṃ pūjanīya ṭhāne ṭhapetvā thomentā pūjentā vandantā pariharanti.
anya-e0401n:264_54: “Tadassādavasenā”ti taṃ rājakathādiṃ tattha cittaratiṃ labhitvā assādavasena kathentasseva kammaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:264_55: Anicca lakkhaṇa vibhāvanatthāya vā ratanattaya guṇavibhāvanatthāya vā pāpa garaha kalyāṇa sambhāvanāya
anya-e0401n:264_56: vā kathentassa pana satthakameva hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:265_24: Dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatesu kācidiṭṭhiyo natthikādi sabhāvā honti.
anya-e0401n:265_45: Micchattā ca te niyatā cāti micchattaniyatā.
anya-e0401n:265_47: Sammattā ca te niyatā ca anantarameva phaladāna niyamenāti sammattaniyatāti.
anya-e0401n:265_56: Evasaddena vinā pāṇātipāta kammaṃ kāyadvāre bāhulla vuttito kāyakammaṃ nāmāti vutte idaṃ laddhātapatto rājakumāroti viya upalakkhaṇanayamattaṃ.
anya-e0401n:265_57: Tena sesadvāresupi bāhulla vuttiṃ upasallakkhetīti atthantarappasaṅgo siyāti.
anya-e0401n:265_64: Cetanā viya kāyakammabhāvaṃ gacchantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:265_65: “Abbohārikattaṃ gacchantī”ti manokammanti voharituṃ appahonakattaṃ gacchantīti attho.
anya-e0401n:265_71: “Tathā tathā”ti ahovata idaṃ mamassātiādinā tena tena pakārena.
anya-e0401n:265_76: “Manokamma kiccavisesenā”ti ahovata idaṃ mamassātiādikena kicca visesena.
anya-e0401n:266_5: Eko ekassa vadati ahaṃ imaṃ sattaṃ māremi,
anya-e0401n:266_9: Tattha āṇāpakassa tvaṃ asukaṃ sattaṃ mārehīti āṇāpana kammaṃ sace sijjhati.
anya-e0401n:266_11: Idha pana asiddhattā vacīdvāre dissa mānaṃ vacīkammanti vuccati.
anya-e0401n:267_5: So kathaṃ dosena mūlena jāyeyyāti vuttaṃ “purimo byāpādavajjehī”ti.
anya-e0401n:267_9: Tattha caṇḍo niggahetabboti āgatattā duṭṭhaniggahatthanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:267_11: “Brāhmaṇānañcā”ti sakasaññāya eva yaṃ kiñci harantānaṃ brāhmaṇānañca kammaphalasambandhāpavādīnañca.
anya-e0401n:267_16: yo ca kamma phalasambandhā pavādīnaṃ uppannoti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:267_17: “Lobho nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāyā”ti lobho kammānaṃ suṭṭhuvaḍḍhanāya nidānaṃ kāraṇaṃ hotīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:269_2: Ayaṃ pana evamādīsu suttapadesu āgatoti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:269_16: “Yaṃ pana kusalaṃ”ti pāṇāti pātādito virati kusalaṃ.
anya-e0401n:270_0: “Vacīkammepi esevanayo”ti yasmiṃ dussilye pavattamāne vācā aparisuddhā hoti.
anya-e0401n:270_2: “Avasesaṃ panā”ti tīhi kāyakammehi catūhi vacīkammehi avasesaṃ.
anya-e0401n:270_3: Tattha “tīhi kāyakammehī”ti tīhi kāyaduccarita virati kammehi.
anya-e0401n:270_13: sabbampi diṭṭhijukammaṃ tīsudvāresu pavattampi manokammaṃ nāmāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:270_14: Imesu pana dvīsu pariyāyesu pacchimoyeva padhānanti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:271_1: “Sīlayatī”ti sammā dahati ca upadhāreti cāti dvidhā attho.
anya-e0401n:271_4: Sattasu visuddhīsu uparime citta visuddhādi kusaladhamme.
anya-e0401n:271_21: “Paṇītenā”ti kattabbamevidanti ariyavaṃsānu brūhanavasena paṇītena chandādinā pavatti taṃ paṇītanti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:271_25: “Ariyabhāvaṃ nissāyā”ti idaṃ dānaṃ nāma ariyānaṃ vaṃso.
anya-e0401n:271_27: Tasmā mayāpi kattabbamevidanti evaṃ ariyabhāvaṃ nissāyāti attho.
anya-e0401n:271_28: Ettha ca “ariyo”ti ācāra ariyopi yujjati dassana ariyopi.
anya-e0401n:271_29: Tattha ācāra ariyo nāma sappuriso puthujjana kalyāṇako vuccati.
anya-e0401n:271_31: “Pāramitā dānaṃ”ti sabbadānehi aggapattaṃ mahābodhi sattānaṃ pāraṅgatadānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:271_32: Tañhi sabba sattavimokkhatthāya pavatti tattā aggapattaṃ hoti,
anya-e0401n:271_42: Taṃ ce añño bhikkhu amūlakena antima vatthunā anuddhaṃseti.
anya-e0401n:271_45: Sahaseyyaṭṭhāne tena saha atireka rattiṃ sayantassāpi āpatti natthi.
anya-e0401n:271_47: “Puna kammavācāya samādātabbanti natthī”ti yathā sikkhaṃ paccakkhantassa sabbaṃ samādānaṃ bhijjati.
anya-e0401n:271_48: Puna bhikkhubhāvaṃ icchantena puna kammavācāya samādātabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:271_52: “Yaṃ niccameva vaṭṭatī”ti yaṃ pāṇātipāta virati sīlaṃ niccameva rakkhituṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0401n:271_57: “Yaṃ niccampi vaṭṭatī”ti pakati gahaṭṭhānaṃ yaṃ vikāla bhojanādi virati sīlaṃ niccampi vaṭṭati.
anya-e0401n:271_58: “Aniccampi vaṭṭatī”ti samādāna divasaṃ atikkamitvā vikāla bhojanādiṃ karontassa vītikkama dosovā duccarita doso vā natthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:271_61: Tathā dasasīlañca pakati gahaṭṭhānaṃ aniccasīlaṃ nāmāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:271_62: “Aniccasīlameva hotī”ti pakati gahaṭṭhānaṃ taṃ dasasīlaṃ yāvajīvaṃ niccaṃ katvā samādiyitvā rakkhantānampi
anya-e0401n:271_63: apabbajitattā pabbajitesu jāti sabhāveneva siddhaṃ niccasīlaṃ nāma na hoti.
anya-e0401n:271_64: Yāvajīvaṃ katvā samādāna vaseneva niccaṃ hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:271_65: “Vesadhāraṇena saha siddhattā”ti ettha kathaṃ vesadhāraṇena siddhaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0401n:271_66: Vesadhāraṇaṃ nāma gihivatthaṃ pahāya kāsāya vattha dhāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:271_68: Na ca arahattadhajaṃ dhārentassa sikkhāpadaṃ asamādiyantassapi vikāle bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0401n:271_74: tesañhi taṃ taṃ yathāsakaṃ sīlaṃ niccaṃ suddhaṃ katvā rakkhitumeva vaṭṭatītiādinā kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttamevāti.
anya-e0401n:271_75: “Appanaṃ apattāva adhippetā”ti appanāpattānaṃ mahaggatabhāvanānaṃ visuṃ upari vakkhamānattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:271_80: “Parisuddhenā”ti lābhasakkārādi nirapekkhatāya attukkaṃ sana paravambhanādi rahitatāya ca parisuddhena.
anya-e0401n:271_81: “Hitappharaṇa cittenā”ti mayi karonte imassa ettakaṃ hitasukhaṃ bhavissatīti evaṃ tesaṃ hitasukhesu pharaṇa cittena.
anya-e0401n:271_83: “Attano kiccesu viyā”ti etena tesaṃ sabbaṃ kiccaṃ attanobhāraṃ karotīti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n:271_87: “Yonisomanasikāre ṭhatvāti ettha silokādipakkhikaṃ ayonisomanasikāraṃ jahitvā suṇantassa imaṃ dhammaṃ
anya-e0401n:271_89: desentassa imaṃ desento dhammassa ca suṇantānañca anuggahaṃ karissāmīti yonisomanasikāre ṭhatvā.
anya-e0401n:271_90: Lābha sakkārādi pakkhiko manasikāro ayoni somanasikāro nāma.
anya-e0401n:271_94: Niravajja vijjāṭhānāni nāma parūparodhara hitāni aṅgavijjā vedavijjā mantavijjādīni.
anya-e0401n:271_99: Tathāhi desentassa ca suṇantassa ca desanāsotānusārena cittabhāvanā ñāṇabhāvanāvahattā desanāsavanā sabhāvā honti.
anya-e0401n:271_100: Attano diṭṭhiṃ sayameva ujuṃ karontassa ca ñāṇabhāvanā kammameva.
anya-e0401n:271_101: Tathā parassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā ujuṃ karontassāpīti.
anya-e0401n:271_102: “Dhammo nāma natthī”ti desanā dhammo nāma natthi. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:271_103: dānasīlāni desentenapi ante lakkhaṇattayena sahasaccappakāsanassa kattabbattā.
anya-e0401n:271_104: Etena desanāsavanā ante lakkhaṇattayānupassanā bhāvanā kammaṭṭhāne patiṭṭhitattā taṃ sabhāvā hontīti dasseti.
anya-e0401n:271_112: Sīlavasena appavattanatoti idaṃ pana pāḷiyā na sameti.
anya-e0401n:271_113: Pāḷiyañhi mahaggatajjhānesupi pahānaṃ sīlaṃ veramaṇi sīlantiādi vuttanti codanā.
anya-e0401n:271_117: Uppanne ca pathamajjhāne nīvaraṇānaṃ pahānaṃ nāma pakaticārittameva pakati niyāmena pavattameva.
anya-e0401n:271_119: Puna nīvaraṇānaṃ pahānameva tehi vigamanaṭṭhena veramaṇīti ca,
anya-e0401n:271_121: pahāna kiccaṃ avijahanaṭṭhena avītikkamoti ca, vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:271_122: Cetanāsīlanti ettha pana jhānasampayutta cetanā eva vuccati.
anya-e0401n:271_123: Sā ca sīlajāti kattā sīlanti vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:273_9: Imesu chasu cittuppādesu ekacce cha cittuppādā sotāpatti maggena pahātabbā,
anya-e0401n:273_10: ekacce cha cittuppādā tīhi upari maggehi pahātabbāti attho.
anya-e0401n:273_11: Tattha pathamapade “ekacce cha cittuppādā”ti kammapathapattakammasahajātā cha cittuppādā.
anya-e0401n:273_12: Dutīya pade “ekacce cha cittuppādā”ti akammapatha pattā dhammikesu ṭhānesu assādanābhi nandādivasena pavattā cha cittuppādā.
anya-e0401n:273_18: “Nānakkhaṇikā”ti attano paccayuppannehi asahajātā atītakālabhūte nānakkhaṇe pavattā pāṇātipātādi cetanā.
anya-e0401n:273_20: Yadi uddhacca cetanā dassana pade anuddhaṭattā paṭisandhiṃ nākaḍḍhatīti viññāyeyya.
anya-e0401n:273_26: “Imesu dhammesu ñāṇaṃ”ti ime dhamme ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannaññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:273_30: “Ativiya kāḷakadhammattā”ti buddhādīsu mahantesu ṭhānesu saddhāratanassa antarāyaṃ katvā pavattanato atiyevakaṇha dhammattā.
anya-e0401n:273_31: Tassā vicikicchā cetanāya paṭisandhi ākaḍḍhanampi viññātabbanti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:273_33: Adhimokkho sanniṭṭhāna sabhāvoti evaṃ sabhāva viruddhattāyeva.
anya-e0401n:274_2: Taṃ pana padarūpena na sametīti aññaṃ atthaṃ vadanto “sabbampi vā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:274_3: “Mahāsampattiyo samuṭṭhāpetvā”ti devaloke devasampatti sadisā dibbavimānādikā mahāsampattiyo samuṭṭhāpetvā.
anya-e0401n:274_5: Tattha “sukha vipākaṃ”ti idaṃ aṭṭha ahetuka vipākāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:274_6: Rūpaloke brahmānaṃ rūpakāyo rūpāvacara kammena nibbatto.
anya-e0401n:274_7: So ca kāmāvacara dhamma samūho eva.
anya-e0401n:274_8: Evaṃ sante tasmiṃ loke pañca ahetuka vipākānipi rūpāvacara kammena nibbattāni siyunti codanā.
anya-e0401n:274_12: “Tesu cā”ti tesu aṭṭha ahetuka vipākesu ca.
anya-e0401n:274_14: “Nimittā rammaṇe”ti kasiṇa nimittādike nimitta paññattā rammaṇe.
anya-e0401n:274_15: “Tāni pañcavipākānī”ti cakkhu viññāṇādīni pañca ahetuka vipākāni kāmāvacara kusala kammasseva vipākāni hontīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:274_23: Na hi tena ñāṇena asampanno kammañca kammaphalañca saddahatīti.
anya-e0401n:274_29: Tassame bhavalābho bhogalābho mittalābho sabbelābhā ekantena sulābhāti attho.
anya-e0401n:274_36: Tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ ‘ekā cetanā ekameva paṭisandhiṃ detī’ti,
anya-e0401n:274_54: Tathā dubbala kammena uppanne mandavipākepi yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:274_56: Na ca tathā sakkā bhavitunti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:274_58: yadi pubbakammavasena aṭṭhannaṃ mahāvipākānaṃ saṅkhārabhedo siddho siyā,
anya-e0401n:274_59: aṭṭhannaṃ ahetuka vipākānampi sosaṅkhārabhedo siddho bhaveyya.
anya-e0401n:274_60: Tānipi hi kānici asaṅkhārikena kammena nibbattāni,
anya-e0401n:274_63: “Ubhayakamma nibbattanaṃ”ti tesaṃ saṅkhāra bhedarahitattā asaṅkhārika kammenapi virodho natthi.
anya-e0401n:274_69: “Na kammāgamana vasenā”ti kammasaṅkhātassa cirakālato āgamana paccayassa vasena.
anya-e0401n:274_74: Paṭisambhidā magge pana dvihetukā vuttāti ca sambandho.
anya-e0401n:274_75: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne paṭisambhidā maggaṭṭhakathā vacanampi vattabbanti vadanto “tattha panā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:274_79: dvihetukena kammena ahetuka paṭisandhi avasesā hoti.
anya-e0401n:276_4: “Hīnehi chandādīhī”ti lābhasakkāra silokādi sāpekkhatāya hīnehi chandādīhi.
anya-e0401n:276_10: “Aṭṭhārasappabhedena vibhajitvā”ti tīsu hīna majjhimapaṇītesu ekekasmiṃ hīna hīnaṃ hīna majjhimaṃ hīna paṇītantiādinā vibhattena navavidhāni honti.
anya-e0401n:276_15: “Imehi pabhāvitattā”ti imehi pabhāvehi mūlakāraṇehi pabhāvitattā pavattāpitattā.
anya-e0401n:276_18: Aṭṭha cattālīsa gottāni nāma hīnamajjhimā divasena vibhattāni gotamagottādīni aṭṭhacattālīsa gottāni.
anya-e0401n:276_19: Tesaṃ cāritta paṭipattibhūtāni caraṇānipi aṭṭhacattālīsa hontīti.
anya-e0401n:276_25: “Upalakkhetī”ti paccakkhato pākaṭaṃ ekadesaṃ dassetvā apākaṭe tādisepi jānāpetīti attho.
anya-e0401n:276_32: Tādisaṃ hetuṃ aladdhā alabhitvā abhiññā cetanā vipākaṃ na paccatīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:276_40: “Sabba pathamabhūtā”ti samāpatti vīthīsu gotrabhussa anantare mahaggata javanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:276_41: Lokuttara maggacetanā kadācipi samānā sevanaṃ na labhati.
anya-e0401n:276_42: Evaṃ santepi attano anantarato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvampi bhavantarepi ariyaphalaṃ janetiyeva.
anya-e0401n:276_46: tasmā asamānaṃ idaṃ nidassananti ce. Vuccate.
anya-e0401n:276_47: Maggacetanā nāma taṇhā sahāyakaṃ vaṭṭagāmi kammaṃ na hoti.
anya-e0401n:276_50: Sace pana taṃ taṇhā sahāyakaṃ vaṭṭagāmikammaṃ bhaveyya.
anya-e0401n:276_59: Na ca sāpi samānabhūmaka dhammato laddhā sevanā hoti.
anya-e0401n:276_61: Bhāvitattāti ca punappunaṃ āsevana lābhena vaḍḍhitattā iccevattho.
anya-e0401n:276_62: Tasmā viññāyati asamānabhūmikehi pubbabhāgappavattehi kāmajavanehi paramparato punappunaṃ laddhā sevanatāya eva idha upacitattāti vuttanti.
anya-e0401n:276_64: Tattha “ubhayatthā”ti ubhayesu katattā upacitattāti ca katattā bhāvitattāti ca vuttesu pāṭhesu.
anya-e0401n:276_65: “Pathama samannāhārato paṭṭāyā”ti mahaggatajjhāne appanāvīthito pure dvīsu parikamma bhāvanā upacāra
anya-e0401n:276_66: bhāvanāsu parikamma bhāvanaṃ bhāventassa pathavī pathavītiādinā pathama samannāhārato paṭṭhāya.
anya-e0401n:276_67: Lokuttara maggepana dasasu vipassanā ñāṇesu sabbapathamaṃ sammasanaññāṇaṃ bhāventassa rūpaṃ aniccaṃ vedanā
anya-e0401n:276_69: Upacinitvāti ca bhāvetvāti ca vaḍḍhetvā icceva attho.
anya-e0401n:276_73: aṭṭhakathāsu saṅkhāra paccayā viññāṇa pada niddesesu abhiññā cetanā panettha parato viññāṇassa paccayo na hotīti na gahitāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:277_4: “Attanā laddha samāpattīnaṃ”ti ekassapi puggalassa bahūnaṃ attanā laddha samāpattīnaṃ.
anya-e0401n:277_13: Tathā nikantiyā sati puthujjanādayo kāmāvacara kamma balena kāmabhavepi nibbattantīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:277_23: “Vipassanā nikanti taṇhā”ti teneva dhammarāgena tāya dhamma nandiyāti evaṃ vuttā vipassanā sukhe nikanti taṇhā.
anya-e0401n:277_25: Kuppā dhammā yesaṃ te kuppa dhammā.
anya-e0401n:277_27: Ime dve sotāpanna sakadāgāmino sīlesu paripūrakārino nāma.
anya-e0401n:277_29: Tasmā te sīlesu akuppa dhammāti vuccanti.
anya-e0401n:277_31: “Mahābrahmesu na nibbattantī”ti mahābrahmattaṃ na labhantīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:277_32: “Hīnajjhāsayattā”ti ettha itthiyo nāma pakatiyāva hīnajjhāsayā honti nīca chandā nīca cittā mandavīriyā mandapaññā. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:277_36: Dubbala kammanti ca purisatta janakaṃ kammaṃ upādāya vuccati.
anya-e0401n:277_40: Itarathā na brahmapurohitānaṃ na ca mahābrahmānanti vuttaṃ siyā.
anya-e0401n:277_41: Na ca tathā sakkā vattuṃ ‘brahmattanti mahābrahmatta’nti iminā vacanena virujjhanato.
anya-e0401n:277_42: Ayañca attho na kevalaṃ yebhūyyanayamattena siddho.
anya-e0401n:277_43: Atha kho byañjana sāmatthiyenāpi siddhoti dassetuṃ “tehī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:277_54: Vibhāvanipāṭhe “iti attho daṭṭhabbo”ti “brahmapārisajjesu yevā”ti pulliṅga vacanattā puggalappadhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:279_11: Tasmā ekaṃ kammakkhaya maraṇameva vattabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:279_12: “Itarepi vuttā”ti itarānipi tīṇi maraṇāni vuttānīti codanā.
anya-e0401n:279_15: Nānā āyu kappaṃ vidahanti saṅkharontīti nānāāyukappa vidhāyakā.
anya-e0401n:279_19: kadāci hāniṃ karontīti vuddhikarā hānikarā ca.
anya-e0401n:279_27: Tesaṃ utuāhārānaṃ gatiṃ anuvattantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:279_35: Aṭṭhi nhāru maṃsa lohitādikā rasadhātuyo ayanti vaḍḍhanti etehīti rasāyanāni.
anya-e0401n:279_38: Ciraṭṭhiti katthāya jīvitaṃ saṅkharonti etehīti jīvita saṅkhārā.
anya-e0401n:279_39: Iddhimaya vijjāmaya jīvita saṅkhāresu ca rasāyana vidhisaṅkhātesu jīvita saṅkhāresu ca vidunoti samāso.
anya-e0401n:279_40: “Dvi samuṭṭhānika rūpadhammesū”ti utusamuṭṭhānika rūpadhammesu ca āhāra samuṭṭhānika rūpadhammesu ca.
anya-e0401n:279_43: “Yāvamahantaṃ pīti” sabbaññubuddhānaṃ kammaṃ viya koṭipattavasena atimahantampi.
anya-e0401n:279_45: “Upacchedaka maraṇepi netabbo”ti balavante upacchedaka kamme āgate yāvamahantampi janaka kammaṃ attano vipākādhiṭṭhāna vipattiyā khiyyatiyeva.
anya-e0401n:279_47: atha kho upacchedaka kamma balena hotīti idha upacchedaka maraṇaṃ visuṃ gahitanti evaṃ upacchedaka maraṇepi netabbo.
anya-e0401n:279_48: “Akāla maraṇaṃ”ti āyukkhayamaraṇādīni tīṇi maraṇāni kālamaraṇāni nāma,
anya-e0401n:279_50: Tato aññaṃ yaṃ kiñci maraṇaṃ akāla maraṇanti vuccati.
anya-e0401n:279_53: Yasmā pana milinda pañhe vuttanti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:279_55: Sannipātehi uppannā sannipātikāti atthaṃ sandhāya “sannipatitānaṃ”ti vuttaṃ. Athavā.
anya-e0401n:279_64: “Vināsentī”ti satthavassa vālukavassādīni vassāpetvāvā samudda vīciyo uṭṭhāpetvāvā evarūpe mahante bhayupaddave katvā vināsenti.
anya-e0401n:279_67: “Jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpentī”ti manussānaṃ vā gomahiṃsānaṃ vā medalohitāni pātabyatthāya tesu nānārogantara kappāni uppādetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpentīti attho.
anya-e0401n:279_68: “Vattabbameva natthī”ti sakalaṃ rajjaṃ vā raṭṭhaṃ vā dīpakaṃ vā vināsentīti vutte sakalaṃ janapadaṃ vā
anya-e0401n:279_69: nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā gāmaṃ vā taṃ taṃ puggalaṃ vā vināsentīti visuṃ vattabbaṃ natthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:279_70: “Satthadubbhikkharogantara kappāpī”ti satthantara kappo dubbhikkhantara kappo rogantara kappoti ime tayo antara kappāpi idha vattabbāti attho.
anya-e0401n:279_71: Tesu pana rogantara kappo yakkhā vāḷe amanusse ossajjanti,
anya-e0401n:279_72: tena bahū manussā kālaṅkarontīti iminā ekadesena vuttoyeva.
anya-e0401n:279_73: “Upapīḷako paghātakānaṃ kammānaṃ vipaccanavasenā”ti ettha tesaṃ kammānaṃ okāsappaṭilābhena sattasantāne
anya-e0401n:279_74: sukhasantānaṃ vibādhetvā maraṇaṃ vā pāpetvā maraṇa mattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ janetvā pīḷanañca ghātanañca idha
anya-e0401n:279_79: Aṭṭhasu kāraṇesu opakkamikaṭṭhāne ‘kuppitāhi devatā sakalaṃ rajjādikaṃ asesaṃ katvā vināsentī’ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:279_80: Tattha vināsitā janā kiṃ nu kho attano attano kamma vipākajehi ābādhana daṇḍehi vā vinassanti,
anya-e0401n:279_81: udāhu visuṃ opakkamikehi ābādhana daṇḍehi vā vinassanti.
anya-e0401n:279_82: Yañcettha vuttaṃ ‘evaṃ akāla maraṇaṃ upacchedaka kammunā vā aññehi vā aneka sahassehi kāraṇehi hotī’ti.
anya-e0401n:279_83: Tattha yassa upacchedaka kammaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n:279_84: Kiṃ tassa aññena kāraṇena akāla maraṇaṃ nāma bhaveyyāti.
anya-e0401n:279_86: tassa aññena kāraṇena akāla maraṇaṃ nāma na bhaveyya.
anya-e0401n:279_92: Tesaṃ taṃ vādaṃ bhindanto “yehikeci loke dissantī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:279_96: Tattha vipāka phalaṃ nāma vipākakkhandhā ca cakkhu sotādīni kaṭattā rūpāni ca.
anya-e0401n:279_100: Nissanda phalaṃ nāma tassa sukhuppattiyā vā dukkhuppattiyā vā attano kammānubhāvena bahiddhā samuṭṭhitāni iṭṭhārammaṇāni vā aniṭṭhā rammaṇāni vā.
anya-e0401n:279_104: Loke aṭṭhaloka dhammā nāma sabbe kamma vipākajā evāti na vattabbā.
anya-e0401n:279_105: Ime ca sattā saṃsāre saṃsarantā aṭṭhasuloka dhammesu nimmujjantā saṃsaranti,
anya-e0401n:279_106: tasmā te vināpi upapīḷaka kammena aññehi kāraṇehi nānādukkhaṃ phusantiyeva.
anya-e0401n:279_107: Tathā vināpi upacchedaka kammena maraṇa dukkhaṃ pāpuṇantiyeva.
anya-e0401n:280_1: “Na upāya kusalā vā”ti tato attānaṃ mocetuṃ kāraṇa kusalā vā na honti.
anya-e0401n:280_2: “Na ca paṭikāra kusalā vā”ti uppannaṃ rogādibhayaṃ apanetuṃ vūpasametuṃ paṭikāra kammeti kicchakamme kusalā vā na honti.
anya-e0401n:280_3: “Nāpi parihāra kusalā vā”ti tato mocanatthaṃ pariharituṃ desantaraṃ gantuṃ kusalā vā na hontīti attho.
anya-e0401n:280_5: “Rogādayo eva taṃ khepentā pavattantī”ti kathaṃ te pubbakammaṃ khepentīti.
anya-e0401n:280_6: Tassa vipākabhūtaṃ jīvita santānaṃ vināsentā khepenti.
anya-e0401n:280_7: Vinaṭṭhehi jīvita santāne taṃ bhavaṃ janentaṃ khiyyati yevāti.
anya-e0401n:280_9: “Kammassapi tathevā”ti tatheva pubbakammassapi tiṇagge ussāva bindusseva paridubbalatā siddhā hoti.
anya-e0401n:280_10: Jīvite parikkhīṇe taṃ bhavaṃ janentassa pubbakammassapi parikkhīṇattā.
anya-e0401n:280_11: “Evañcetaṃ”ti etaṃ kammappaṭi saṃyutta vacanaṃ idha amhehi vuttanayena sampaṭicchitabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:280_12: Sabbaṃ pubbekatahetudiṭṭhi nāma sabbaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā sucaritaṃ vā duccaritaṃ vā pubbabhave attanā
anya-e0401n:280_13: katena pubbakammahetunā eva uppajjatīti evaṃ pavattā diṭṭhi.
anya-e0401n:280_15: Mahābodhisattānaṃ adhimuttikālaṅkariyā nāma idha me cirakālaṃ ṭhitassa pāramipūraṇa kiccaṃ natthi,
anya-e0401n:280_17: uparujjhatu me idaṃ jīvitanti adhimuñcitvā daḷhaṃ manasikaritvā kālaṅkariyā.
anya-e0401n:280_18: “Sayameva satthaṃ āharitvā”ti sayameva attano gīvaṃ satthena hanitvāti attho.
anya-e0401n:281_2: “Jīvita samasīsīnaṃ”ti arahatta maggaṃ labhitvā maggapaccavekkhanavīthi eva maraṇāsannavīthiṃ katvā parinibbānattā samaṃ sīsaṃ etesanti samasīsino.
anya-e0401n:281_3: “Samaṃ sīsaṃ”ti jīvita santāna pariyantena samaṃ vaṭṭadukkha santāna pariyantaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0401n:281_11: “Na sameti yevā”ti santiṃ anupādisesaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvāti ettha parinibbāna javanehi ārammaṇaṃ katvāti vuttepi na sametiyeva.
anya-e0401n:281_13: “Bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā parinibbāyatī”ti ettha parinibbāna cuticittameva bhavaṅganti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:281_18: Yathā pana buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ yāvajīvaṃ uppannaṃ mahābhavaṅgacittaṃ kammakammanimittādayo ārammaṇaṃ karotiyeva.
anya-e0401n:281_19: Tathā parinibbāna cuticittaṃ pīti āha “na hī”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:281_20: Nanu maraṇakāle kammakammanimittādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ nāma bhavantara gamanatthāya hoti,
anya-e0401n:281_25: Bhavantara gamanatthāyāti idaṃ javanehi gahaṇe daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:281_35: Dhammāsokarañño maraṇakāle pāpapakkhiyānaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ katthaci sīhaḷaganthe vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:287_1: “Niyāmaka sahakāri paccayabhūtā”ti ettha yathā nāvāyaṃ niyāmako nāma nāvaṃ icchitadisābhimukhaṃ niyāmeti, niyojeti.
anya-e0401n:287_2: Tathā ayaṃ taṇhāpi bhavanikanti hutvā cittasantānaṃ gantabbabhavābhimukhaṃ niyāmeti, niyojeti.
anya-e0401n:287_3: Kammassa ca accāyatta sahāyabhāvena sahakārī paccayo hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:287_4: “Kusalākusala kammanimittāni vā”ti aññāni kusalā kusalakammanimittāni vā.
anya-e0401n:287_12: “Kilesa balavināmitaṃ”ti avijjā taṇhādīnaṃ kilesānaṃ balena vināmitaṃ.
anya-e0401n:287_19: “Tasmiṃ vuttā naṃ”ti tasmiṃ ‘yebhūyyena bhavantare cha dvāraggahitaṃ’ti ṭhāne ṭīkāsu vuttānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:287_20: Taṃ sadisa javanuppatti nāma kammakaraṇakāle pavatta javanehi sadisānaṃ idāni javanānaṃ uppatti.
anya-e0401n:287_21: Bhavappaṭicchannañca kammaṃ apākaṭañca kammaṃ na tathā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0401n:287_22: Kevalaṃ attānaṃ abhinavakaraṇa vasena dvārapattaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhātīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:287_24: “Tabbiparītena pāpakamma bahulāpi vattabbā”ti tepivisīdantare āvudha hatthā pāṇaghātaṃ karontā gaṇhathabandhathāti
anya-e0401n:287_30: Tassa agge katā sūci patodana sūci.
anya-e0401n:287_32: Kathaṃ pana ukkhittāsikādibhāvena upaṭṭhānaṃ kammupaṭṭhānaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0401n:287_33: Kathañca taṃ paṭisandhiyā ārammaṇabhāvaṃ upetīti āha “so cā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:287_36: “Paripuṇṇaṃ katvā”ti tadārammaṇa pariyosānāyavā suddhāya vā javanavīthiyāti evaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā.
anya-e0401n:287_37: Ayaṃ pana bhavaṅgāvasāne cuticittuppatti nāma aṭṭhakathāsu natthi.
anya-e0401n:287_38: Yañca bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā parinibbāyatītiādi tattha tattha vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:287_40: Tasmā “bhavaṅgakkhayevā”ti idaṃ kathaṃ yujjeyyāti āha “ettha cā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:287_44: Ettha ca anusayo nāma javanasahajāto na hoti.
anya-e0401n:287_46: Nānājavana sahajātā ca avijjā taṇhā paṭisandhiyā visesa paccayā honteva.
anya-e0401n:287_47: Kathaṃ tā idha gahitā siyunti āha “ettha cā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:287_48: Evaṃ sante avijjā parikkhittena taṇhāmūlakenāti vuttesu suṭṭhu yujjati.
anya-e0401n:287_50: Tasmā idha anusaya vacanaṃ na yuttanti codanā.
anya-e0401n:287_53: “So pī”ti phassādi dhamma samūhopi.“Tathā rūpā yevā”ti aggamaggena appahīna rūpāyeva,
anya-e0401n:287_62: Kuto maraṇakāle saṅkantā nāma atthi vijjantīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:287_63: Evaṃ sante idaṃ vacanaṃ anamataggiya suttena viruddhaṃ siyāti.
anya-e0401n:287_67: anamataggiya suttaṃ pana suttanta vacanaṃ pariyāya vacananti dassento “yañcā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:287_68: Pariyāyena vuttanti vatvā taṃ pariyāyaṃ dasseti “yesañhī”tiādinā.
anya-e0401n:287_70: “Tesaṃ”ti avijjā taṇhā saṅkhārānañca paṭisandhi nāma rūpa dhammānañca.
anya-e0401n:287_71: “Hetupphalasambandhena bhavantaraṃ sandhāvati saṃsaratīti vuccatī”ti pubbe kammakaraṇakālepi te avijjā taṇhā saṅkhārā eva so sattoti vuccanti.
anya-e0401n:287_72: Pacchā tesaṃ phalabhūtāyaṃ paṭisandhiyā pātubhavanakālepi sāpaṭisandhi eva so sattoti vuccati.
anya-e0401n:287_74: Evaṃ hetudhammehi saddhiṃ phaladhamme ekaṃ sattaṃ karontassa hetupphala sambandho hoti.
anya-e0401n:287_75: Evaṃ hetupphala sambandhena so eva kammaṃ karoti.
anya-e0401n:287_76: Tena kammena so eva bhavantaraṃ sandhāvati saṃsaratīti vuccati.
anya-e0401n:287_77: Ettha ca anamataggo yaṃ bhikkhave. La.
anya-e0401n:287_78: Avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃti evaṃ sattavohārena vuttattā sādhammadesanā pariyāyadesanā hoti.
anya-e0401n:287_79: Pariyāyadesanattā ca sandhāvataṃ saṃsaratanti pariyāyopi sijjhati.
anya-e0401n:287_80: Yassaṃ pana dhamma desanāyaṃ dhammadesanāti vacanānu rūpaṃ dhammameva deseti,
anya-e0401n:287_83: Ayaṃ dhammadesanā eva mukhyadesanā nāma hoti.
anya-e0401n:287_84: Tattha desita dhammā pana pakatikālepi desantaraṃ kālantaraṃ khaṇantaraṃ saṅkantā nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n:287_88: Tena vuttaṃ ‘na hi uppannuppannā dhammā. La.
anya-e0401n:287_95: bālakumāra sarīresu upayuttā vijjāsipposadhā cāti evaṃ aṭṭhakathā yaṃ āgatāni nidassanāni saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0401n:287_97: Tattha “paṭighoso”ti gambhīraleṇa dvāre ṭhatvā saddaṃ karontassa antoleṇe paṭighoso pavattati.
anya-e0401n:287_98: Tattha dvāre uppanno mūlasaddo antoleṇaṃ na gacchati,
anya-e0401n:287_100: Paṭighoso ca tato āgato na hoti.
anya-e0401n:287_101: Na ca vinā mūlasadda + paccayena aññato pavattati.
anya-e0401n:287_106: Tattha “padīpo”ti pathamaṃ ekaṃ padīpaṃ jāletvā tena aññaṃ padīpasatampi padīpa sahassampi jāleti.
anya-e0401n:287_111: Etehi nidassanehi phalaṃ nāma hetuto āgataṃ na hoti.
anya-e0401n:287_112: Hetunā ca vinā na sijjhatīti ettakamatthaṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0401n:287_113: “Bījasaṅkhāro”ti kālantare uppannesu pupphaphalesu icchitavaṇṇa gandharasapātubhāvatthāya ropanakāle
anya-e0401n:287_115: Tattha tappaccayā kālantare pupphaphalesu uppannesu tevaṇṇagandharasā pātubbhavanti.
anya-e0401n:287_116: “Pāṭibhogo”ti kiñci atthaṃ sādhetuṃ parassa santike iṇaṃ gaṇhantassa tavadhanaṃ saṃvaccharena vuḍḍhiyā saha dassāmi,
anya-e0401n:287_118: Asukaṃ nāma mamakhettaṃ vā vatthuvā tuyhaṃ hotūti paṭiññāṭhapanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:287_119: Tattha tappaccayā dhanaṃ labhitvā taṃ atthañca sādheti.
anya-e0401n:287_120: Kāle sampatte vuḍḍhiyā saha iṇañca sodheti.
anya-e0401n:287_121: “Vijjāsipposadhā”ti loke puttake yāvajīvaṃ hitatthāya daharakāle kiñci vijjaṃvā sippaṃvā sikkhāpenti.
anya-e0401n:287_122: Yāvajīvaṃ khararogānaṃ anuppādatthāya daharakāle ojavantaṃ kiñci osadhaṃ vā ajjhohārenti.
anya-e0401n:287_123: Tattha tappaccayā puttānaṃ yāvajīvaṃ hitappaṭilābho vā tādisānaṃ rogānaṃ anuppādo vā hotiyeva.
anya-e0401n:287_124: Etehi yathā kālantare asantesuyeva pāṭibhogādīsu mūlakammesu pubbabhāge katapaccayā eva pacchā attha sādhanādīni sijjhanti.
anya-e0401n:287_125: Tathā kusalā kusala kammāni katvā kālantare tesu asantesupi pubbe katattā eva pacchā paṭisandhādīni phalāni pātubbhavantīti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n:287_127: “Kammadubbalabhāvenā”ti tadā jīvitindriyassa dubbalattā kammampi dubbalameva hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:287_133: Pañcadvāre paṭisandhikammaṃ vinā dvigocare siyāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:287_135: Tattha pañcadvāre paṭisandhi nāma pañcadvārika maraṇāsanna vīthicittānaṃ ante ca vantānaṃ paṭisandhi.
anya-e0401n:287_136: Sāpi gatinimittabhūte gocare siyāti vutte pañcadvārika vīthicittāni pañcārammaṇabhūtāni gatinimittāni ārammaṇaṃ karontītipi siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:287_138: Tesaṃ vīthicittānaṃ ante acavitvā tadanubandhaka manodvārikavīthicittehipi kadāci kesañci ca vanaṃ nanasambhavatīti sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0401n:287_139: Tesu pana anubandhaka vīthīsu atītaggahaṇa samudāyaggahaṇehi ca vantānaṃ atītānipi gatinimittāni labbhanti.
anya-e0401n:287_140: Vatthuggahaṇanāmaggahaṇehi ca vantānaṃ dhammā rammaṇaṃpi labbhatiyeva.
anya-e0401n:287_141: Tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ ācariyena kāmāvacara paṭisandhiyā cha dvāraggahitaṃ kammanimittaṃ gatinimittañca paccuppannamatītā rammaṇaṃ upalabbhatīti.
anya-e0401n:287_143: Yaṃ pana ‘tameva tathopaṭṭhitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārabbha cittasantānaṃ abhiṇhaṃ pavattatī’ti evaṃ antimavīthito
anya-e0401n:287_144: pubbabhāge bahūnaṃ vīthivārānaṃ pavattanaṃ ācariyena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:287_145: Taṃ tathopaṭṭhitaṃ gatinimittaṃ ārabbhātipi laddhuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
anya-e0401n:287_152: “Manodvārika maraṇāsanna javanānaṃpi icchitabbattā”ti purejātapaccaya bhāvena icchitabbattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:287_154: “Paṭisandhiyāpi sambhavato”ti tassa purejāta paccayassa paṭisandhiyāpi purejāta paccayatā sambhavato.
anya-e0401n:287_155: Nanu therena bhinditvā avuttepi bhinditabbe sati,
anya-e0401n:287_160: Vibhāvaniyaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbaṃti vatvā aparepana avisesatova vaṇṇentīti aparevādopi vutto.
anya-e0401n:287_161: Tattha “avisesato vaṇṇentī”ti abhinditvāva vaṇṇentīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:287_163: Idha pana taṃ aparevādaṃ paggaṇhanto puna “yañca tatthā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:287_167: Nanu aṭṭhakathāyaṃ panātiādi sabbaṃ vicāraṇā vacanameva hotīti.
anya-e0401n:287_173: mūlaṭīkāpāṭho pana manodvāre yevāti niyametvā vuttattā kathaṃ sāvaseso siyāti.
anya-e0401n:287_174: Niyametvā vuttopi idha adhippetatthe aparipuṇṇe sāvaseso eva hotīti.
anya-e0401n:287_175: Tena vuttaṃ “aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthi aññatra avicāraṇāyā”ti.
anya-e0401n:287_177: Tadārammaṇāvasānāya pañcadvārika javanavīthiyā ca vanaṃ hotīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:287_182: “Purimabhāge evā”ti pañcadvārika antima vīthito pubbabhāge eva.
anya-e0401n:287_188: Aṭṭhakathāpāṭhe ñātakā mātādayo pañcadvāre upasaṃharantīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:287_204: “Aññaṃ dubbala kammaṃ”ti upacārajjhānakammato aññaṃ tihetukomakaṃ kammaṃ.
anya-e0401n:287_207: “Upatthambhane kāraṇaṃ natthī”ti idaṃ upacārajjhāna kammassa garuka kammagatikattā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:287_208: Ekanta garukakammabhūtaṃpi pana mahaggatajjhāna kammaṃ nāma nānānikanti balena paṭibāhīyamānaṃ paṭisandhiṃ na detiyeva.
anya-e0401n:287_210: “Tādisānī”ti tathā rūpāni dvihetukomaka kammāni tesaṃ okāsaṃ na labhanti.
anya-e0401n:287_213: “Nānākammāni pī”ti upacārajjhāna kammato aññāni paccuppanna kammānipi atītabhavesu katāni aparapariyāya kammānipi.
anya-e0401n:287_214: “Yena cā”ti yena nānākammānampi okāsa lābhakāraṇena ca.
anya-e0401n:287_216: “Vuttanayene vā”ti suṭṭhuvikkhambhitanīvaraṇānaṃ tesaṃ appanā pattajjhānavisesena [ yasmā panātiādinā
anya-e0401n:287_219: Parampara bhavesuca vīthimuttacittānaṃ pavattākāraṃ dassetunti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:287_220: “Yathā tāniyeva osadhānī”ti loke ekaṃ osadhaṃ labhitvātaṃ devasikaṃ bhuñjati.
anya-e0401n:287_221: Ekopathamadivase bhuñjantaṃ disvā katamaṃ nāma tvaṃ osadhaṃ bhuñjasīti pucchi.
anya-e0401n:287_223: Punadivasesupi osadhaṃ bhuñjantaṃ disvā tatheva pucchi.
anya-e0401n:287_225: Tattha “tameva osadhaṃ”ti yaṃ pathamadivase osadhaṃ tayāca pucchitaṃ.
anya-e0401n:287_228: Tattha pana pathamadivase bhuttaṃ osadhaṃ aññaṃ.
anya-e0401n:287_230: Taṃsadisaṃ pana aññaṃpi tamevāti loke voharanti tāniyeva osadhāni bhuñjāmīti.
anya-e0401n:287_235: Tasmā tassa upapatti bhavassa anoccheda aṅgatthāya kāraṇattā bhavaṅganti vuccatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:287_242: Pajjanti pāpuṇanti ariyā janā etthāti padaṃ.
anya-e0401n:287_243: Parato samantipade anupādisesassa gayhamānattā idha saupādisesanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:287_245: Suṭṭhu saddhiṃ ucchinnaṃ sinehabandhanaṃ yehi te susamucchinnasinehabandhanā.
anya-e0401n:290_6: Nipātaṃ icchantā ettakehi pañcahi paricchedehīti vaṇṇenti.
anya-e0401n:290_17: Bhūtañca abhūtaṃ katvā abhūtañca bhūtaṃ katvā sandassakaṭṭhenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:290_24: bahivā ṭhatvā karontīti pākatikehi manussehi jānituṃ passituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā acinteyyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:290_25: “Vañcakaṭṭhenā”ti etā pakatiyā atidubbaṇṇaṃ attānaṃ devaccharāvaṇṇaṃ katvā vañcenti.
anya-e0401n:290_30: Arukkhaṃyeva attānaṃ rukkhoti visaṃvādenti. Aniṭṭhaṃ, akantaṃ,
anya-e0401n:290_33: tathā sahajātānañca tesaṃ aññamaññassa anto vā tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0401n:290_34: Udāhubahivātiṭṭhantīti jānituṃ passituṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ ṭhānaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0401n:290_38: “Imasmiṃ pāṭhe”ti catunnaṃ mahābhūtānanti evaṃ sambandha padasahite pāṭhe.
anya-e0401n:290_39: Aññattha pana upādārūpaṃ anupādārūpantiādīsu yakāra viraho diṭṭhoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:290_42: Tameva jātatthe niruttinayena pathavīti siddhanti dassetuṃ “puthumahantī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:290_43: Pakārena thavīyatīti atthe pathavīti idaṃ ujukameva.
anya-e0401n:290_50: “Vitthambhanaṃ”ti vividhena ākārena bhūtasaṅghāṭānaṃ thambhanaṃ vahanaṃ abhinīharaṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:290_58: Ābandhakaṃ nāma ābandhitabbe vatthumhi mudumhi sati,
anya-e0401n:290_61: daḷhaṃ bandhatīti idaṃ lokatova siddhanti āha “ābandhitabbāyā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:290_63: “Paripācakatā dassanato”ti hemante ajjhohaṭāhārānaṃ suṭṭhuparipācakatā dassanatoti vadanti.
anya-e0401n:290_73: Evaṃ sītatejopi usatidahatīti atthena uṇhatta lakkhaṇonāma hotīti.
anya-e0401n:290_74: Evaṃsante nīlenavaṇṇena phuṭṭhaṃ vatthu nīlaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:290_76: Nīlaṃpi pītaṃpi taṃ vatthuṃ dahatināmāti ce.
anya-e0401n:290_86: sakalo silāthambho kappāsapicuguḷhoviya sithilo ca lahuko ca bhaveyya.
anya-e0401n:290_88: Tasmā tattha vitthambhanaṃ natthīti adhippāyena “so pana ghanathaddhesu silāthambhādīsu na labbhatī”ti codeti.
anya-e0401n:290_89: Tattha pana vitthambhanaṃ labbhamānaṃ adhimattena na labbhati,
anya-e0401n:291_4: “Ācikkhatī”ti ācikkhantaṃ viya taṃ jānana kiccaṃ sampādeti.
anya-e0401n:291_14: Ime pana pañca cakkhu pasādādayoti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:291_16: Ādisaddena sotukāmatā ghāyitukāmatā sāyitukāmatā phusitukāmatāyo saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0401n:291_17: Atthato saddataṇhā gandhataṇhā rasataṇhā phoṭṭhabbataṇhā eva.
anya-e0401n:291_30: Cakkhu ūkāsirappamāṇe diṭṭha maṇḍale tiṭṭhatīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:292_6: mukhe vaṇṇavikāraṃ disvā ayaṃ me tussati,
anya-e0401n:292_14: Taṃ taṃ atthaṃ vā ācikkhati taṃ sutvā tassa tassa atthassa jānanato.
anya-e0401n:292_15: Attano vatthuṃ vā ācikkhati taṃ sutvā tassa vatthussapi jānanato.
anya-e0401n:292_16: “Attano vatthuṃ sūcetī”ti idha idaṃ nāma atthīti pakāseti.
anya-e0401n:292_26: Ettha evaṃ alabbhamānāpi sāsītatā āpoyeva, na tejo. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:292_30: Evaṃ pana sati tejo nāma natthīti āpajjatīti parihāro.
anya-e0401n:292_32: “Orapārānaṃ viyā”ti nadiyaṃ tīraṃ nāma idaṃ orimatīraṃ,
anya-e0401n:292_38: Ettha ca “sītuṇhānaṃ saha appavattanato”ti etena yadi te saha pavatteyyuṃ.
anya-e0401n:292_42: tasmā tathā na vattabbā hontīti dasseti.
anya-e0401n:292_45: Yathātaṃ uṇhatejena yuttā pathavīpi vāyopi uṇhattameva gacchantīti.
anya-e0401n:292_47: Saha appavattesupi tesu aññattha sītavatthūsu sītatā āponāmāti vattabbameva hotīti codanā.
anya-e0401n:292_48: Evaṃsante tasmiṃ loharase sabbepi rūpadhammā uṇhattaṃ gacchantīti sabbepi tejobhāvaṃ pāpuṇanti.
anya-e0401n:292_50: Yadi ca sītavatthūsu sītabhāvo nāma siyā.
anya-e0401n:292_51: Tatthapi tena yuttā sabbepi rūpadhammā sītataṃ gacchantiyeva.
anya-e0401n:292_54: Na hi evarūpaṃ lakkhaṇaññathattaṃ nāma tesaṃ atthi.
anya-e0401n:292_66: Evaṃ ekamekassā dhātuyā tikkha manda omattādhimattavasena kriyāsaṅkanti nāma atthīti.
anya-e0401n:292_67: Tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ ‘uṇhatejena yuttohi āpo uṇhattameva gacchati,
anya-e0401n:292_68: yathā taṃ uṇhatejena yuttā pathavīpi vāyopi uṇhattameva gacchantī’ti.
anya-e0401n:292_71: Na hi uṇhatejena yuttā sabbetedhammā uṇhattaṃ gacchanti.
anya-e0401n:292_73: Tathāhi tasmiṃ pakkuthite santatte loharase bhāvo uṇhattaṃ na gacchati.
anya-e0401n:292_74: Ābandhana sabhāvaṃ vā paggharaṇa sabhāvaṃ vā na vijahati.
anya-e0401n:292_77: tasmiṃ loharase ābandhanākāro vā paggharaṇākāro vā na paññāyeyya.
anya-e0401n:292_88: Tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ “yadi te saha pavatteyyuṃ.
anya-e0401n:292_92: Tasmā tathā na vattabbā hontīti dassetī”ti.
anya-e0401n:292_94: “Tesaṃ anavaṭṭhānato”ti etena sace te sītuṇhā avaṭṭhitā siyuṃ.
anya-e0401n:292_99: Tasmā tathā na vattabbā hontīti dasseti.
anya-e0401n:292_100: Ettha ca anavaṭṭhitesu santesu yadi sītatā āpo nāma,
anya-e0401n:292_110: Tena vuttaṃ “orapārānaṃ viya tesaṃ anavaṭṭhānato ca viññāyatī”ti.
anya-e0401n:293_1: Yaṃ pubbe parena vuttaṃ ‘nanu dravatā vā phusitvā gayhatī’ti.
anya-e0401n:293_5: Evañcasati ārammaṇa bhūto eva siyāti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:293_9: ayopiṇḍādīsu ābandhanamattabhūto āpopi phusitvā gahetabbo siyā. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:293_12: tesu ayopiṇḍādīsu so āpo tāni hatthena vā pādena vā phusantassa paharantassa vinā itara mahābhūtehi visuṃ kāyika sukhadukkhānaṃ ārammaṇa paccayo siyā. Yathātaṃ,
anya-e0401n:293_13: tesveva ayopiṇḍādīsu pathavimahābhūtaṃ vinā itaramahābhūtehi visuṃ kāyikasukhadukkhānaṃ ārammaṇa paccayo hoti.
anya-e0401n:293_15: Na pana so visuṃ kāyikasukhadukkhānaṃ ārammaṇa paccayo hoti.
anya-e0401n:293_16: Tasmā so phoṭṭhabba sabhāvo na hoti.
anya-e0401n:293_17: Yathā ca so phoṭṭhabbasabhāvo na hoti.
anya-e0401n:293_18: Tathā pakati udakādīsu dravabhāvabhūtopi āpo tāni phusantassa paharantassa kāyikasukhadukkhānaṃ ārammaṇa paccayo na hoti.
anya-e0401n:293_21: kathaṃ ayopiṇḍādīsu ābandhanamattabhūto āpo kāyikasukhadukkhānaṃ paccayo na hoti.
anya-e0401n:293_22: Kathañca tesu itaramahābhūtāni visuṃ visuṃ kāyikasukhadukkhānaṃ paccayā hontīti.
anya-e0401n:293_24: Tattha “saṇhathaddhatāvasenavā”ti tesu ṭhitāya pathavidhātuyā saṇhathaddhatāvasena vā.
anya-e0401n:293_25: Saṇhapathavīsukhavedanāya thaddhapathavīdukkhavedanāya ārammaṇa paccayoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:293_27: “Abbhantaratthambhanassā”ti tesaṃ ayopiṇḍādīnaṃ abbhantare ṭhitassa vitthambhana sabhāvassa.
anya-e0401n:293_28: “No aññathā”ti tānitīṇi kāraṇāni ṭhapetvā ābandhana kriyaṃ paṭicca kāyikasukhadukkhuppatti nāma natthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:293_29: Idāni pakati udakādīsu dravabhāvabhūtaṃ āpodhātumpi phusitvā jānantīti mahājanā maññanti.
anya-e0401n:293_33: Loke hatthena parāmasitvā vā cakkhunā disvā vā idaṃ rassaṃ,
anya-e0401n:293_36: idaṃ maṇḍalantiādinā saṇṭhānaṃ jānantā hattha phusanena vā cakkhu dassanena vā saheva taṃ jānantīti maññanti.
anya-e0401n:293_37: Tattha pana purimabhāge kāyadvāravīthi cittena paccuppannāni tīṇibhūtāni phusitvā vā cakkhudvāra vīthicittena
anya-e0401n:293_38: paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ disvā vā pacchā vatthuggahaṇavīthiyā uppannāya eva saṇṭhānaṃ jānanti.
anya-e0401n:293_41: Tathā loke cakkhunā disvā dvāravātapānādīnaṃ chiddavivarāni jānantā cakkhunā dassanena saheva tāni jānantīti maññanti.
anya-e0401n:293_42: Tattha pana purimabhāge cakkhudvārikavīthi cittena paccuppannāni kavāṭarūpabhitti rūpāni punappunaṃ disvā
anya-e0401n:293_43: pacchā alātacakkassa majjhe vivaraṃpi jānantā viya visuṃ uppannāya manodvārika viññāṇavīthiyā eva taṃ
anya-e0401n:293_45: Tathā hatthena udakaṃ phusantassa pathamaṃ dravasahitāni vilīnāni mudūni tīṇiphoṭṭhabba mahābhūtāni visuṃ
anya-e0401n:293_46: visuṃ kāyadvārika vīthi cittehi phusanakiccena ārammaṇaṃ karitvā pacchā visuṃ suddhāya manodvārika vīthiyā
anya-e0401n:293_48: Evaṃ santepi taṃ dravabhāvaṃpi hatthena phusanena saheva jānantīti maññantīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:294_1: Akkhara vidū pana gosaddaṃ indriyatthepi icchantīti āha “goti vā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:294_3: etāni vā rūpādīni tesu cakkhādīsu caranti.
anya-e0401n:294_4: Tattha purimena gāvo indriyāni caranti etesūti gocarānīti dasseti.
anya-e0401n:295_4: Añño ca kāmiko gharāvāsa sukhatthāya tattha ṭhānaṃ upeti,
anya-e0401n:295_6: Āyatiñca kulavaṃsappatiṭṭhānatthāya tattha kulavaṃsa bījaṃ ṭhapetīti.
anya-e0401n:295_20: Mahāsaṇṭhānaṃ sattānaṃ jātibhedaṃ liṅgeti ñāpetīti liṅgaṃ.
anya-e0401n:295_21: Lakkhaṇapāṭhakā niminanti sañjānanti kalyāṇa pāpakaṃ kammavipākaṃ etenāti nimittaṃ.
anya-e0401n:295_27: “Vacanatthesu cā”ti itthi saṇṭhāna purisasaṇṭhānādi atthesu ca.
anya-e0401n:295_28: “Nimittasaddo viyā”ti nimitta saddo aṅgajāte pākaṭo viyāti.
anya-e0401n:295_33: Tattha hi itthiliṅgādīnaṃ hetubhāva lakkhaṇanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:295_36: Asati na hotīti etthaviya hetu phalabhāvapākaṭatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:296_2: Dhātu dvayaṃ nāma manodhātu manoviññāṇadhātu dvayaṃ.
anya-e0401n:296_8: “Yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāyā”ti yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattantīti imaṃ pāṭhaṃ niddisati.
anya-e0401n:296_9: “Anañña sādhāraṇesu ṭhānesū”ti cakkhu vatthādīhi aññavatthūhi asādhāraṇesu kusalākusalaṭṭhānesu.
anya-e0401n:297_5: Na hi tāni ekantena jīvantāni nāma honti.
anya-e0401n:297_6: Jīvita rūpassa ekanta kammajassa bahiddhā anupaladdhattā.
anya-e0401n:297_14: ekekasmiṃ vīthivāre niruddhe bhavaṅga samaye asadisassa rūpasantānassa pātubbhāvatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:297_15: Tañca kho rūpavisesaṃ jānantasseva pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:297_18: Yassahi dosa samuṭṭhitena rūpasantānena mukharūpaṃ dubbaṇṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:297_19: Tassa dose niruddhepi taṃ rūpaṃ thokaṃ dubbaṇṇameva khāyatīti.
anya-e0401n:297_22: Na nu cakkhusotādīni kammajarūpasantānānipi pavattikāle kadāci suppasannāni,
anya-e0401n:297_25: tathā pavatti pana santāna vicchedena na hoti,
anya-e0401n:297_26: nānāvicchinne ca ekekasmiṃ santāne tesaṃ punaghaṭanaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n:297_33: tasmā tesaṃ nānāsantati paccuppannaṃ nāma na vattabbaṃ. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:297_38: Na pana cittajarūpādīni viya attano janakapaccaye niruddhe nirujjhanti.
anya-e0401n:297_41: Yathā rūpasantatiyaṃ anantara paccayo nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n:297_42: Cutikāle bhavantararūpasantānassa kiñci paccayattaṃ anupagantvā nirujjhati.
anya-e0401n:297_43: Tena bhavantara pātubbhāvo nāma tesaṃ natthi.
anya-e0401n:297_45: Tattha pana cuticittampi paṭisandhiyā anantara paccayo hutvā nirujjhati.
anya-e0401n:297_48: Tasmā arūpadhammānaṃpi kammajarūpānaṃ viya niccaṃ jīvitayogena jīvantattā santati paccuppannaṃ nāma na bhaveyyāti na codetabbanti.
anya-e0401n:297_49: Kusalā kusala kriyacittāni nāma akammajāni honti.
anya-e0401n:297_50: Cittajarūpādīni viya atītaṃ kammaṃ anapekkhitvā taṅkhaṇikehi nānāpaccayehi uppajjanti.
anya-e0401n:297_51: Tasmā tesaṃ jīvantānaṃpi sataṃ ajīvantānaṃ cittajarūpādīnaṃ viya nānāsantati paccuppannaṃ nāma atthi.
anya-e0401n:297_55: Yato tesaṃ haritatā ca aharitatā ca rūhanañca-
anya-e0401n:297_61: Yathā tena samannāgato satto punappunaṃ maritvā punappunaṃ bhavantare pātubbhavanti.
anya-e0401n:297_64: Yathā sattānaṃ cakkhādi aṅgesu jīvita santāne bhinne tāni aṅgāni puna jīvantāni kātuṃ na sakkonti.
anya-e0401n:297_65: Tathā rukkhāpi khandhesu vā sākhāsuvā chinnesu jīvitasantāne bhinne tekhandhāvā sākhāyo vā puna aññattha ropetuṃ na sakkā bhaveyyuṃ.
anya-e0401n:297_67: Tasmā tadubhayaṃpi jīvitaṃ nāma tesaṃ natthīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:297_69: Na hi tesaṃ kammaṃyeva ṭhitikāraṇaṃ hotīti ettha kammaṃ ṭhitikāraṇaṃ eva na hotīti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:297_73: Kammādīnaṃ rūpajanakapaccayānaṃ janakānubhāvo nāma rūpakalāpānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe eva pharati,
anya-e0401n:297_77: Tasmā tā janakapaccayānubhāvakkhaṇe laddhattā kutocijātanāmaṃ labhanti.
anya-e0401n:297_80: Tasmā sā kutocijāta nāmaṃ na labhati.
anya-e0401n:297_81: Yadi pana āhārajādīnaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ ṭhiti nāma āhārādi janakapaccayāyattā bhaveyya.
anya-e0401n:297_86: Tasmā tesaṃ ṭhiti nāma janakapaccayāyattā na hotīti imamatthaṃ dassento “itarathā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:298_1: “Savatthukavacanaṃ”ti bhojanādi vatthunā saha pavattatīti savatthukaṃ. Vacanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:298_2: Na hi nibbattitaṃ āhāra rūpaṃ nāma kabaḷaṃ kātuṃ sakkā hotīti.
anya-e0401n:298_5: “Pañcadhā vibhāgaṃ gacchantī”ti ekaṃ bhāgaṃ pāṇakā khādanti.
anya-e0401n:298_9: Ekobhāgo rasabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā soṇitamaṃsādīni upabrūhayatīti evaṃ vuttanayena pañcadhā vibhāgaṃ gacchanti.
anya-e0401n:299_0: “Aññāpadeso” nāma rūpassa lahutātiādīsu aññassa rūpassa kriyāmattabhāvena apadisanaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0401n:299_2: Yathāhi sabbaṃ anipphannarūpaṃ ajāti dhammattā ujukato kammādīhi jātaṃ nāma na hoti.
anya-e0401n:299_3: Kammādīhi jātaṃ pana nipphannarūpaṃ nissāya dissamānattā ṭhānūpacārena viññatti dvayaṃ cittajaṃtiādinā vuccati.
anya-e0401n:299_5: Idaṃ pana jātidhammattā ujukatova kammādīhi paccayehi nipphāditaṃ janitanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:299_6: “Rūpaṃ”ti vutte anipphannarūpaṃpi labbhatīti tato visesanatthaṃ rūparūpanti vuccatīti āha “ruppanalakkhaṇa sampannaṃ”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:299_8: Tampana anipphanna rūpe mukhyato na labbhati.
anya-e0401n:300_6: “Attano vā paresaṃ vā akatvā”ti attanopakkhikaṃ vā paresaṃ pakkhikaṃ vā akatvā.
anya-e0401n:300_14: “Aññamañña abyāpitatā”ti dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā rūpakalāpānaṃ ekakalāpattūpagamanaṃ aññamañña byāpitā nāma,
anya-e0401n:300_18: “Nānākalāpagatānaṃ bhūtānaṃ”ti etena kalāpapariyantatā eva vuttā hoti.
anya-e0401n:301_5: “Kāyaṅgavikāraṃ karontassā”ti abhikkamanādi atthāya hatthapādādīnaṃ kāyaṅgānaṃ calana saṅkhātaṃ vikāraṃ karontassa.
anya-e0401n:301_6: Uppajjantā ca sabbete cittajavātakalāpā yathādhippeta disābhimukhā eva uppajjantīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:301_7: “Yathā vā tathā vā anuppajjitvā”ti aniyamato anuppajjitvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:301_15: Kathaṃ pana sā niyāmakasadisī hotīti āha “yathāhī”tiādi.
anya-e0401n:301_18: “Tato”ti yasmiṃ vāre calana saṅkhātaṃ desantara pāpanaṃ jāyati.
anya-e0401n:301_25: Na ekissāya javanavīthiyaṃ eva yujjatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:301_26: Yadi nānājavanavīthīsu tathā upatthambhanañca gayheyya. Evaṃsati,
anya-e0401n:301_31: Pacchima pacchimānaṃ rūpakalā pasaṅghāṭānaṃ aparāparaṃ uppajjananti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:301_32: Purimapurimānaṃ rūpakalāpasaṅghāṭānaṃ khaṇikadhammatā ca tesaṃ na siyā.
anya-e0401n:301_33: Na ca te khaṇikadhammā na honti.
anya-e0401n:301_34: Aññathā desantara saṅkamanasaṅkhātaṃ calanaṃ eva na siyā.
anya-e0401n:301_37: Yasmā ca aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ khaṇekhaṇe calanaṃ nāma loke paccakkhato diṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0401n:301_41: Abyāpāra dhammatā ca avasavattitā ca tesaṃ na siyā.
anya-e0401n:301_43: na avasavatti dhammā ca na honti.
anya-e0401n:301_44: Aññathā paccayāyatta vuttitā eva tesaṃ na siyā.
anya-e0401n:301_47: asati na vattantīti evaṃ pavattā paccayāyatta vuttitā yasmā ca paccayasāmaggiyaṃ sati,
anya-e0401n:301_50: Te māvattantūti ca attano vasena vattanti.
anya-e0401n:301_55: Yasmā ca tesaṃ paccayāyatta vuttitā nāma loke viññūnaṃ paccakkhatodiṭṭhā.
anya-e0401n:301_56: Tasmā tesaṃ abyāpāratā ca avasavattitā ca daṭṭhabbā hoti.
anya-e0401n:301_57: Etena tesaṃ sabbehi sattapuggala attākārehi sabbaso suññaṃ dasseti,
anya-e0401n:302_5: Ajjhatta santānagatā sabbe catujarūpadhammāpi katthaci upādinnakāti vuccantīti āha “catujabhūtāya eva vā”ti.
anya-e0401n:302_6: Dvīsuṭhāna karaṇesu karaṇapakkhe calanākārappavattā cittajapathavīdhātu ṭhānapakkhe pathavidhātuyaṃ saṅghaṭṭayamānā kammajapathaviyaṃ eva ghaṭṭeti.
anya-e0401n:302_7: Itara pathaviyaṃ na ghaṭṭetīti na sakkā vattuṃti katvā idha evaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0401n:302_9: Kathaṃ pana asammissaṃ katvā veditabbanti āha “etthacā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:302_10: Yaṃ pana tāsaṃ ghaṭṭanappakāravidhānaṃ atthīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:302_14: Yaṃ pana kāyaviññattiṭṭhāne ‘ayañca attho upari akkharuppatti vicāraṇāyaṃ pākaṭo bhavissatī’ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:302_21: Tassa āsevanañca nāma tato purimehi vīthivārehi eva laddhaṃ siyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:302_22: “Āsevanaṃ”ti ca upacāra vacanaṃ daṭṭhabbanti heṭṭhā vuttameva.
anya-e0401n:302_30: “Sesamettha kāyaviññattiyaṃ vuttanaye nā”ti tathāhi calanacittajarūpasantatiyaṃ pavattānītiādinā vutta nayenāti attho.
anya-e0401n:302_31: Idha pana vacībhedakara cittajasaddasantatiyaṃ pavattāni utujarūpasaṅghāṭānītiādinā vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:302_36: suttanta sajjhāyanādīsu vacīviññatti ca paraṃ bodhetukāmatā rahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0401n:302_40: Pacchā suddhena manodvārika javanena eva viññāyati,
anya-e0401n:302_43: “Kāyaviññāṇa vīthiyā”ti vacībhedaṃ akatvā hatthaggahaṇādi vasena adhippāya viññāpane ayaṃ kāyaviññāṇavīthi daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0401n:302_44: Kasmā pana sayañcaviññāyatīti viññattīti ayaṃ vikappo vuttoti āha “sāhi attānaṃ”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:302_47: sayañcaviññāyatīti dve atthā labbhantīti āha “dvīsu panā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:302_49: ayaṃ paṭikkamatīti jānantā abhikkamanapayogañca tappayoga janakacittañca jānanti.
anya-e0401n:302_52: Tena vuttaṃ mūlaṭīkāyaṃ paraṃ bodhetukāmatāya vināpi abhikkamanādippavattanena socittasahabhuvikāro adhippāyaṃ. La.
anya-e0401n:303_4: Sarīra kriyānukulo kammaññabhāvo lakkhaṇaṃ yassāti samāso.
anya-e0401n:303_20: Tāya pariyuṭṭhitāya eva sabbapariyuṭṭhānāni pavattantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:304_7: “Tena pariyāyenā”ti upasaddassa atthanānattaṃ acintetvā nibbattiṃ vaḍḍhiyaṃ antogadhaṃ katvā vuttena tenapariyāyena.
anya-e0401n:304_9: Tattha cittajarūpesu assāsa passāsānaṃ vā padavārahatthavārādīnaṃ vā akkharānaṃ vā nibbatti vaḍḍhi pavattiyo dissantiyeva.
anya-e0401n:304_11: Utujarūpesu iriyā pathanānattaṃ paṭicca sukhadukkhajanakānaṃ nānārūpasantatīnaṃ nibbattivaḍḍhipavattiyo dissantiyeva.
anya-e0401n:304_12: Tathā bahiddhā khāṇukaṇṭakādisamphassena sītuṇhādisamphassena vātātapādisamphassena vā sarīre uppannānaṃ nānārūpasantatīnampi cakkhurogādirūpānampīti.
anya-e0401n:304_13: Āhārajarūpesu āhāranānattaṃ paṭicca sarīre uppannānaṃ samavisamarūpasantatīnaṃti.
anya-e0401n:304_15: Tena ajjhattasantānepi sattasantānānaṃ hatthapādādisantānānaṃ kesalomādi santānānañca nibbatti vaḍḍhipavattiyo nidasseti.
anya-e0401n:304_20: Etena jarāvasenavā nānārogābādhādivasena vā vipariṇāmo vutto.
anya-e0401n:304_23: Tato paraṃ tameva pavatti hotīti evaṃ tathā avatthābhedayogato.
anya-e0401n:304_28: Vohārasiddhamattabhāvaṃ”ti puggalo satto attā jīvotiādikā paññatti nāma vohāra siddhamattā hoti.
anya-e0401n:304_30: Sāhi mahājanehi khandha pañcakaṃ upādāya puggalo nāma atthīti sammatattā voharitattā vohārasiddhā nāma.
anya-e0401n:304_32: Tasmā ariyānaṃ vohāre puggalo nāma natthīti sijjhati.
anya-e0401n:304_33: Imāni pana rūpāni sabhāvasiddhattā ariyānaṃ vohārepi atthīti sijjhanti.
anya-e0401n:304_39: Tasmā tassā uppādopi jarāpi bhedopi suddhadhammagatiyā siddho nāma.
anya-e0401n:304_41: Tathā viññatti dvayassapi vikārarūpattayassapi pariccheda rūpassapīti.
anya-e0401n:304_44: Kilesadhammāhi ariyamagge abhāvite bhavaparamparāya uppādaṃ gacchantiyeva.
anya-e0401n:304_46: Tasmā kilesadhammānaṃ anuppādanirodhopi suddhadhammagatiyā siddho nāma.
anya-e0401n:304_48: Atthi bhikkhave ajātaṃ abhūtanti idaṃ suttaṃpi ettha vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:304_49: Etena ariyavohāre nibbānassa ekantena atthitā bhagavatā vuttā hoti.
anya-e0401n:304_51: “Nasabhāvato anupaladdhattā anipphannāni nāma hontī”ti etena etāni asabhāvarūpānīti ca alakkhaṇa rūpānīti
anya-e0401n:304_52: ca asammasanarūpānīti ca na sakkā vattuṃtipi dīpeti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:304_53: yathāsakaṃ sabhāvehi sabhāvavantattā yathāsakaṃ lakkhaṇe hi salakkhaṇattā paṭisambhidāmagge sammasanaññāṇa
anya-e0401n:304_69: Hutvā abhāvākāro aniccatā nāmāti sabbaṃ parinipphannaṃ saṅkhatamevāti.
anya-e0401n:304_71: Tesaṃyeva dasannaṃ rūpānaṃ majjheti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:304_72: “Itisabbaṃ”ti idaṃ sabbaṃ dasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ parinipphannameva saṅkhatamevāti attho.
anya-e0401n:304_80: Nirodhasamāpatti ca nāma paññatti ca kathanti.
anya-e0401n:304_81: Nirodhasamāpatti lokiyalokuttarāti vā saṅkhatāsaṅkhatāti vā parinipphannāparinipphannāti vā na vattabbā.
anya-e0401n:304_91: Aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ paricchedavikāra lakkhaṇabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā sabhāveneva pariggahetabbato nipphannaṃ,
anya-e0401n:304_97: Lakkhaṇarūpaṃ pana na kutocijātanti ca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:306_1: Rūpavibhāge.“Ekavidhanayaṃ tāva dassetuṃ”ti rūpavibhāgato pathamaṃ dassetuṃ.
anya-e0401n:306_2: Etena ekavidhanayo rūpavibhāgo nāma na tāva hotīti dasseti.
anya-e0401n:306_5: “Ajjhattikādibhedena vibhajanti vicakkhaṇā”ti etena sabbaṃrūpaṃ ajjhattikabāhiravasena duvidhantiādiko
anya-e0401n:306_7: Tasmā tena na sametīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:306_11: na sahetukantiādi niyamakaraṇampi rūpavibhāgo evāti katvā tathā vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:306_20: Kiccapaccayānaṃ arahatthassa ca sakkatthassa ca dīpanato duvidhaṃ atthaṃ dassetuṃ “aṭṭhānattā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:306_23: “Pahīnaṃ bhavissatī”ti anāgatabhave puna anuppādatthāya idheva pahīnaṃ bhavissatīti attho.
anya-e0401n:306_34: ajjhattadhamma ajjhattika dhammānañca aviseso āpajjatīti vakkhamānakāraṇattā.
anya-e0401n:306_39: Tattha desanābhedo nāma rūpakaṇḍe pañcaviññāṇānaṃ vatthu rūpañca,
anya-e0401n:306_42: na ārammaṇa rūpañca vatvā manoviññāṇassa na vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:306_45: na ārammaṇa rūpanti dukapadaṃ na labbheyya.
anya-e0401n:306_47: Vatthudukesu hadayavatthuvasena labbhamānaṃ manoviññāṇadukaṃ na vuttanti.
anya-e0401n:306_49: “Dūre pavattassapī”ti yathā sukhumarūpaṃ attano sarīre pavattampi ñāṇena sīghaṃ pariggahetuṃ na sakkā hoti,
anya-e0401n:306_61: Na ca tāni aññappakārāni eva sakkā bhavitunti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:306_66: diṭṭhiyā eso me attāti parāmaṭṭhattā ca.
anya-e0401n:306_67: “Niccakālaṃ pavattivasenā”ti ekena janakakammena paṭisandhikkhaṇato paṭṭhāya niccakālaṃ pavattivasena.
anya-e0401n:306_73: Tathā sotasaddesu ca aññamaññaṃ laggitvā uppajjamānesu.
anya-e0401n:306_75: Tathā āpo ca sampattiyā eva paccayoti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:306_85: Hotu dūre ṭhitānaṃ cirena sutoti abhimāno.
anya-e0401n:306_86: Kasmā pana ujukaṃ asutvā dakkhiṇapassatovā uttarapassato vā suṇeyya,
anya-e0401n:306_91: pharitvā gaṇhatīti ce”ti taṃ cakkhusota dvayaṃ dūrevisayānaṃ uppannadesaṃ pharitvā gaṇhatīti cevadeyyāti attho.
anya-e0401n:306_92: Dūreṭhatvā passanto suṇanto ca mahantampipabbataṃ ekakkhaṇe passati,
anya-e0401n:306_95: Imasmiṃ vacane ṭhatvā idaṃ parikappavacanaṃ dasseti taṃ dvayaṃ visayappadesaṃ gantvā mahantaṃpi pabbataṃ vā meghasaddaṃ vā pharitvā gaṇhāti.
anya-e0401n:306_97: Na asampattagocarattā mahantaṃ passati suṇātīti koci vadeyyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:306_98: Adhiṭṭhānavidhānepi tassa so gocaro siyāti. Evaṃsati,
anya-e0401n:306_99: dibbacakkhu dibbasotābhiññānaṃ adhiṭṭhānavidhānepi so rūpasaddavisayo tassa pasādacakkhusotassa gocaro siyāti abhiññādhiṭṭhāna kiccaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n:306_100: Cakkhusotaṃ devalokampi gantvā dibbarūpampi dibbasaddampi gaṇheyya.
anya-e0401n:306_102: Tasmā tassa visayadesagamanañca mahantadesapharaṇañca na cintetabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:308_3: Te pana paṭṭhāne kammapaccayaṃ patvā tappaccayakiccaṃ na sādhenti,
anya-e0401n:308_5: “Taṃ samuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ”ti hetūhi ca hetusampayuttakadhammehi ca samuṭṭhānānañca rūpānanti atthavasena
anya-e0401n:308_9: Ajjhattikasaddo chasu cakkhādīsu ajjhattikāyatane sveva pavattati.
anya-e0401n:308_10: Idha pana sakalaṃ ajjhattasantānaṃ adhippetanti āha “ajjhatta santāneti pana vattabbaṃ”ti.
anya-e0401n:309_6: Samudayasaccassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe dukkhasaccabhūtassa rūpassavā nāmassavā uppādo nāma natthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:309_8: yassa akusalā dhammā uppajjantīti dve pāṭhāgahetabbā.
anya-e0401n:309_9: “No”ti kusalākusala dhammānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe abyākatabhūtānaṃ rūpānaṃ vā nāmānaṃ vā nirodho nāma natthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:309_14: “Itarattha cā”ti tato itarasmiṃ yassa kusalā dhammātiādipāṭhe ca.
anya-e0401n:309_15: “Tampi nā”ti tampi vacanaṃ na vattabbanti attho.
anya-e0401n:309_16: “Purimakoṭṭhāse”ti asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tatthāti imasmiṃ purimapakkheti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:309_17: “Pacchimakoṭṭhāse”ti sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassabhaṅgakkhaṇeti imasmiṃ pacchima pakkhe.
anya-e0401n:309_21: tasmā viññāyati pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe rūpajīvitindriyampi na uppajjatīti.
anya-e0401n:309_23: sabbāni kammajarūpāni utujarūpāni āhārajarūpāni ca cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe nuppajjantīti viññātabbaṃ hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:309_24: “Pacchimakoṭṭhāse”ti sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇeti imasmiṃ pacchimapakkhe.
anya-e0401n:309_25: Tattha ca pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇeti idaṃ adhippetaṃ.
anya-e0401n:309_26: Evaṃ pāḷisādhakaṃ dassetvā idāni yuttisādhakaṃ dassento “yasmā cā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:309_36: Tattha “na hi na cittaṭṭhitī”ti cittassaṭhiti nāma na hi natthi.
anya-e0401n:309_39: “Nānatthā nānābyañjanā”ti etena pāḷisaṃsandanā nāma garukattabbāti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n:309_40: “Gambhīro ca satthu adhippāyo”ti etena attānaṃ satthumataññuṃ katvā idaṃ sandhāya etaṃ sandhāyāti vattuṃ dukkaranti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n:309_42: Cha cattālīsacittāni rūpaṃ janetuṃ na sakkonti.
anya-e0401n:309_43: Evaṃ sati arūpavipākavajjitanti kasmā vuttanti āha “arūpavipākāpanā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:309_51: “Ekūna na vutibhavaṅgasse vā”ti pavattikāle rūpajanakassa ekūna na vutibhavaṅga cittassāti attho.
anya-e0401n:309_52: Tattha pana arūpavipākaṃ pavattikālepi rūpajanakaṃ na hotīti āha “tatthā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:309_53: Keci pana paṭisandhi cittassa uppādakkhaṇe rūpaṃ pacchājāta paccayaṃ na labhati.
anya-e0401n:309_54: Ṭhitikkhaṇe rūpaṃ parato bhavaṅgacittato pacchājātapaccayaṃ labhatīti vadanti.
anya-e0401n:309_55: Taṃ na gahetabbanti dassetuṃ “na hi attanā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:309_56: Sayaṃ vijjamāno hutvā upakārako paccayo atthipaccayo.
anya-e0401n:309_62: Iti pana vacanato aññesaṃpi cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpetīti viññāyatīti padhānavacanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:309_67: So sabbesaṃpi kāmasattānaṃ cuti cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ca tato purimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe ca nanirujjhatīti
anya-e0401n:309_68: vacanena cuticittato pubbabhāgeyeva assāsapassāsānaṃ abhāvaṃ ñāpeti.
anya-e0401n:309_69: Nanu imissaṃ pāḷiyaṃ cutikāle assāsapassāsassa abhāvaṃ vadati.
anya-e0401n:309_71: Tasmā imāya pāḷiyā sabbesampi cuticittaṃ assāsapassāsaṃ na janetīti viññāyati.
anya-e0401n:309_74: Na hi rūpasamuṭṭhāpakacittassa kāyasaṅkhāra samuṭṭhāpanaṃ atthīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:309_81: Tasmā etegabbhagamanādayo assāsapassāsaṃ vinibaddhanti nīvārentīti gabbhagamanādivinibaddhā.
anya-e0401n:309_83: Vinā imehi kāraṇehi assāsapassāsassa ca aññacittajarūpānañca viseso natthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:309_86: assa cittasamuṭṭhāna rūpañca pavattatīti na ca yuttanti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:309_88: Iti tasmā na sakkā vattuṃti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:309_96: Tadā dubbalattā eva pañcārammaṇāni pañcadvāresu āpātaṃ nāgacchanti.
anya-e0401n:309_101: Tasmā yathā sabbapaṭisandhicittampi rūpaṃ na janeti,
anya-e0401n:309_102: tathā sabbacuticittampi rūpaṃ na janetīti sakkā viññātunti.
anya-e0401n:309_103: “Pāḷivirodhaṃ”ti pubbe dassitāya saṅkhāra yamakapāḷiyā virodhaṃ.“Kāraṇaṃ vuttamevā”ti cittañhi uppādakkhaṇe
anya-e0401n:309_104: eva paripuṇṇaṃ paccayaṃ labhitvā balavaṃ hotīti vuttameva.
anya-e0401n:309_110: “Na tatoparaṃ”ti tato atirekaṃ rūpavisesaṃ na janeti.
anya-e0401n:309_113: “Aṭṭha puthujjanānaṃ”ti aṭṭha somanassa javanāni hasanaṃpi janenti.
anya-e0401n:309_118: “Kāraṇaṃ vuttamevā”ti ‘rūpassa pana upatthambhakabhūtā utuāhārā pacchājātapaccaya dhammā ca ṭhitikkhaṇe eva pharantī’ti evaṃ kāraṇaṃ vuttameva.
anya-e0401n:309_123: Ajjhatta santānagato ca bahiddhāsantānagato ca duvidhāhāroti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:310_5: Tesu ṭhapetvā bahiddhāhāraṃ avasesānaṃ ajjhatta santāne rūpasamuṭṭhāpane vivādo natthi.
anya-e0401n:310_6: Bahiddhāhārassa pana ajjhattasantāne rūpasamuṭṭhāpane vivādo atthīti taṃ dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:310_9: “Dantavicuṇṇitaṃ panā”ti dantehi saṅkhāditvā vicuṇṇaṃ kataṃ pana.
anya-e0401n:310_17: janana vasena pana ajjhattikāhāro eva samuṭṭhāpetīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:310_19: Bahiddhā ojāpi rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti yevāti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:310_28: Samāpatti cittena jātattā tāni indriyāni vippasanna nīti katvā kasmā vuttanti pucchati.
anya-e0401n:310_39: Tathā tena ākārena saṇṭhitā hotīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:311_1: Dandhattādikarānaṃ dhātukkhobhānaṃ paṭipakkhehi paccayehi samuṭṭhātīti viggaho.
anya-e0401n:311_3: Tasmā etaṃ lahutādittayaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānanti vattabbanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:311_6: Sacakkhukānaṃ asotakānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ uppajjatītiādīsu uppādavāre paṭisandhivasena,
anya-e0401n:311_9: “Kammavipākajā ābādhāti vuttaṃ”ti vīthimuttasaṅgahe upacchedakakammadīpaniyaṃ ‘atthi vāta samuṭṭhitā ābādhā. La.
anya-e0401n:311_11: Tāni upapīḷakupaghātaka kammānipi vipattiyo labhamānāni eva khobhetvā nānābādhe uppādentīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:311_13: “Tadanugatikāni eva hontī”ti kammajādīnipi khubbhitāni eva hontīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:311_14: Etena aṭṭhasu kāraṇesu yenakenacikāraṇena cakkhurogādike ābādhe jāte tasmiṃ aṅge pavattāni sabbāni rogasamuṭṭhānāni ābādhabhāvaṃ gacchantiyeva.
anya-e0401n:311_15: Evaṃ santepi tappariyāpannāni kammajarūpāni tadanugatikabhāvena ābādhabhāvaṃ gacchanti,
anya-e0401n:311_18: Tathāpi aṭṭhasu ābādhesupi atthi vātasamuṭṭhānā ābādhātiādīsu viya atthi kammasamuṭṭhānā ābādhāti avatvā atthi kammavipākajā ābādhāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:311_19: Tattha upapīḷako paghātakakammānaṃvasena uppanno yokocidhātukkhobho suttantapariyāye na kammavipākoti vuccatiyeva.
anya-e0401n:311_20: Tato jāto yokoci ābādho kammavipākajoti vuttoti.
anya-e0401n:311_25: Kevalaṃ so kammasamuṭṭhāno ābādho nāma natthīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:312_3: Tattha jananakiccaṃ janetabbānaṃ jātikkhaṇe eva labbhati.
anya-e0401n:314_9: “Evaṃ vikārapariccheda rūpāni ca yojetabbānī”ti pañcavikārarūpāni kalāpasseva copanādisabhāvā honti,
anya-e0401n:314_11: Tasmā tāni ekekasmiṃ kalāpe ekekāni eva honti.
anya-e0401n:314_12: Paricchedarūpaṃ pana kalāpapariyāpannaṃ rūpaṃ na hoti.
anya-e0401n:314_13: Tasmā dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ kalāpānaṃ antarā taṃpi ekekameva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:314_14: “Catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ nissayatā sambhavato”ti ettha catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃpi lakkhaṇamattena nānattaṃ hoti,
anya-e0401n:314_15: pavattivasena pana ekagghanattā saṅkhānaṭṭhenapi eko nissayoti vattabbameva.
anya-e0401n:314_26: Vitakkavipphārasaddo nāma kassaci mahantaṃ atthaṃ cintentassa sokavasena vā tuṭṭhivasena vā balavavitakko pavattati.
anya-e0401n:314_27: So sokaṃ vā tuṭṭhiṃ vā sandhāre tuṃ asakkonto dutīyena saddhiṃ mantento viya attano mukheyeva abyattaṃ saddaṃ katvā samudīrati.
anya-e0401n:314_28: Pakatijano taṃ saddamattaṃ suṇāti vā na vāsuṇāti.
anya-e0401n:314_29: Suṇantopi akkharaṃ vā atthaṃ vā adhippāyaṃ vā na jānāti.
anya-e0401n:314_30: Dibbasotena vā vijjāsotena vāsuṇanto akkharaṃpi atthaṃpi adhippāyaṃpi jānāti.
anya-e0401n:314_35: Saṅgahakāropana vacīmayasaddonāma viññattirahitoti vā asotaviññeyyoti vā natthīti paṭikkhipati.
anya-e0401n:314_39: Akkharañca padañca byañjanañca attho cāti dvando.
anya-e0401n:314_42: “Ukkāsitasaddo ca khipitasaddo ca vamitasaddo ca chaḍḍitasaddo cāti dvando.
anya-e0401n:314_43: Ādisaddena tādisā uggāra hikkāra hasita roditādayo saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0401n:317_1: Purimesu dvīsu yonīsu pāḷinayena veditabbāti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:317_3: iti tasmā aṇḍajāti ca jalābujāti ca vuccanti.
anya-e0401n:317_4: Kathaṃ ayaṃ nayo pāḷinayo nāma hotīti.
anya-e0401n:317_5: Pāḷiyaṃ aṇḍakosaṃ vatthikosaṃ abhinibbhijja abhinibbhijja jāyantīti vacanena aṇḍato jalābuto jātā vijātā nikkhantāti attho viññāyati.
anya-e0401n:317_7: Gabbhapaliveṭhanāsayo nāma yena paliveṭhito gabbho tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0401n:317_10: Abhirūpassa kaññā dātabbāti ettha kaññā dātabbāti sāmaññato vuttepi abhirūpassa purisassāti vuttattā kaññāpi abhirūpakaññā eva viññāyati.
anya-e0401n:317_13: Tānisabbānipi cakkhu sota ghāna bhāva dvayāni na omakena kammena labbhati.
anya-e0401n:317_16: Saddāyatanaṃ nāma paṭisandhikāle na labbhatīti vuttaṃ “ekādasāyatanānī”ti.
anya-e0401n:317_21: Pāḷiyaṃ opapāti kagabbhaseyyakānaṃ eva vuttattā “pāḷiyaṃ avuttaṃpipanā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:317_23: “Aññamaññaṃ avinābhāvavuttitā vuttā”ti kathaṃ vuttā yassa ghānāyatanaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0401n:317_30: “Ghānavekallatāpi atthīti yuttaṃ”ti ettha pāḷiyaṃ aghānakānaṃ itthīnaṃ purisānaṃti idaṃ mātugabbhe ghānāyatane
anya-e0401n:317_31: anuppanneyeva puretarañca vantānaṃ itthipurisānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:318_5: No ca cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjissatīti idaṃ addhāpaccuppannavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:318_6: Tasmā paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya uppannaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ yāvajīvaṃpi uppannantveva vuccati.
anya-e0401n:318_8: Cakkhāyatanaṃ pana ekādasamasattāhā orato ṭhitassa na uppannaṃ.
anya-e0401n:318_9: Tadā anuppannattā ekādasame sattāhe sampatte uppajjissatīti vattabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:318_10: Pacchima bhavikattā pana tadubhayampi bhavantare nuppajjissatiyevāti.
anya-e0401n:318_13: Idañca yadi tannibbattakena kammena paṭisandhiṃ gaṇheyyuṃ.
anya-e0401n:318_14: Ghānāyatane anuppanne antarā na kālaṅkareyyunti katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:318_15: Tannibbattakena kammena paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantāpi tato balavante upacchedakakamme āgate sati.
anya-e0401n:318_18: “Atthato siddhā evā”ti ekādasamasattāhe uppannāti siddhā eva.
anya-e0401n:318_23: “Anupubbappavattidīpanato”ti yathā pacchime taṇhāmūlake bhavacakke upapattibhavappavattiṃ vadantena bhavapaccayājātīti evaṃ ekato katvā vuttā,
anya-e0401n:318_27: “So paṭikkhittoyevā”ti āyatanānaṃ kamato vinicchayaṭṭhāne desanākkamova yuttoti vatvā so uppattikkamo paṭikkhitto.
anya-e0401n:319_6: “Paripakkasamūhakaṃ”ti kalalato paraṃ thokaṃ paripakkañca samūhākārañca hutvā.
anya-e0401n:319_18: Ekādasamepi hi pacchimadivase jātattā chadivasāni avasiṭṭhāni honti.
anya-e0401n:319_20: Paripākagatā eva hi kammajamahābhūtā suppasannā honti.
anya-e0401n:319_30: Tasmā taṃ tato parittakanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:319_31: Paṭisandhikkhaṇato paraṃ pana taṃpi khaṇekhaṇe upacitameva hoti.
anya-e0401n:319_35: “Jalābumūlānusārenā”ti jalābujātakāle tassa mūlānu sārenāti adhippāyo. Gāthāyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:319_41: “Rūpasamuṭṭhāne vuttamevā”ti rūpasamuṭṭhāne mūlaṭīkāvāda vicāraṇāyaṃ ‘yaṃ pitattha na ca yutta’ntiādinā vuttameva.
anya-e0401n:319_49: Pāḷiyeva pamāṇanti dassento “rūpadhātuyā”tiādinā vibhaṅge pāḷiṃ āhari.
anya-e0401n:319_54: “Phoṭṭhabbe paṭikkhittepī”ti pañcāyatanānīti vā pañcadhātuyoti vā paricchedakaraṇameva paṭikkhi panaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:319_58: Mahābhūtā hetū mahābhūtā paccayā rūpakkhandhassa paññāpanāyāti hi bhagavatā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:319_61: Kiccantaramevanatthīti ghānādīnaṃ visaya gocarabhāvakiccaṃ tesaṃ kiccaṃ nāma,
anya-e0401n:319_71: “Nissanda dhammamattabhāvenā”ti ettha yathā aggimhi jāte tassa nissandā nāma icchantassapi anicchantassapi jāyantiyeva.
anya-e0401n:319_72: Vaṇṇopi jāyati, obhāsopi, gandhopi, rasopi, dhūmopi,
anya-e0401n:319_74: Tehi vaṇṇādīhi karaṇīye kiccavisese satipi asatipi.
anya-e0401n:319_75: Tathā mahābhūtesu jātesu tesaṃ nissandā nāma icchantassapi anicchantassapi kiccavisese satipi asatipi jāyantiyeva.
anya-e0401n:319_77: Anuppaveso yutto siyā ajjhatta santāneti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:319_78: Bahiddhā santāne pana vatthā bharaṇa vimānādīsu tesaṃ bhāvo icchi tabbo siyā.
anya-e0401n:319_79: Ajjhattepi vā kāyaṃ oḷārikaṃ katvā māpitakāleti.
anya-e0401n:319_80: Ettha ca “dhammāyatana dhammadhātūsu anuppaveso”ti ettha aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ tāva.
anya-e0401n:319_81: Ye pana anāpātāgatā rūpādayopi dhammārammaṇamicceva vadantīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:319_84: Tañca manussānampi devānampi brahmānampi pasādarūpesu anāpātā gamanameva adhippetaṃ.
anya-e0401n:319_86: Api ca nissandadhammā nāma oḷārikānaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ vividhākārāpi bhaveyyuṃ.
anya-e0401n:319_87: Brahmānaṃ pana ajjhatta rūpaṃ appanā pattakammavisesena pavattaṃ atisukhumaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:319_88: Tasmā kāmasatta santāne viya tattha paripuṇṇaṃ nissandarūpaṃ nāma vicāretabbameva.
anya-e0401n:319_89: Dhammā rammaṇañca mukhyadhammārammaṇaṃ anuloma dhammāyatananti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ natthi yevāti.
anya-e0401n:319_92: Kāmaloke jīvitanavakaṃ kasmā visuṃ na vuttanti.
anya-e0401n:319_114: Kasmā pana tesaṃ kaḷevaranikkhepo nāma natthīti āha “tesañhī”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:319_122: Api ca tattha dandhattādikara dhātukkhobhapaccayānaṃ sabbaso abhāvato niccakālampi sakalasarīrassa lahutādiguṇo vattatiyeva.
anya-e0401n:321_2: Dvīsu nibbānapadesu pathamapadaṃ aviññātatthaṃ sāmañña padaṃ.
anya-e0401n:321_10: Loke na paññāvīyatīti paññattīti imamatthaṃ sandhāya “nahī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:321_11: Cattārimaggaññāṇāni catumaggaññāṇanti evaṃ samāsavasena ekavacanantaṃ padaṃ vākyaṃ patvā bahuvacanantaṃ hotītiāha “catūhi ariyamaggaññāṇehī”ti.
anya-e0401n:321_49: Buddhesu anuppajjantesu ekasattopi parinibbātuṃ na sakkotīti idaṃ buddhuppādakappe eva pacceka sambuddhāpi uppajjantīti katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:321_50: Apadāna pāḷiyaṃ pana buddhasuññakappepi paccekasambuddhānaṃ uppatti āgatā eva.
anya-e0401n:321_54: Sabbato pavattā guṇappabhā etassāti atthaṃ sandhāya “sabbatopabhā sampannaṃ”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:321_56: Sabbattha pabhavati saṃvijjatīti sabbatopabhanti imamatthaṃ sandhāya sabbato vā pabhutameva hotīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:321_66: Sekkhesu arahattamaggaṭṭhassa sekkhassa kilesupādisesa vasena anupādisesatā vuttā.
anya-e0401n:321_70: Ubhato bhāga vimuttādīnaṃ padattho navamaparicchede āgamissati.
anya-e0401n:321_71: “Kilesakkhayena saheva khiyyantī”ti paccuppannabhave arahattamaggakkhaṇe kilesakkhayena saddhiṃ eva khiyyanti.
anya-e0401n:321_74: sotāpannassa sattabhaveṭhapetvā avasesa kāmapaṭisandhikkhandhā sotāpatti maggakkhaṇe taṃ taṃ kilesakkhaye na saheva khiyyantīti.
anya-e0401n:321_76: Khandhupādisesā nāma hutvā yāvamaraṇakālā khīṇāsavānampi pavattanti.
anya-e0401n:321_94: Tasmā sakkāyadiṭṭhi nirodho nibyāpāradhammopi samāno te palibodhe nirodheti nāma.
anya-e0401n:321_96: Sakkāyadiṭṭhinirodhoyeva te palibodhe nirodhetuṃ sakkotīti ettha dvinnampi nirodho ekoyeva.
anya-e0401n:321_97: Evaṃ santepi avijjā nirodhā saṅkhāra nirodhotiādīsu viya abhede bhedaparikappanā hotīti.
anya-e0401n:321_108: “Natthi tasmiṃ nimittaṃ”ti vutte paññattidhammesupi uppādappavattamūlaṃ nimittaṃ nāma natthi. Evaṃsati,
anya-e0401n:321_111: Viddhaṃsetvāti ca sādhentanti ca atthavisesa pākaṭatthāya abyāpāre byāpāra parikappanā eva.
anya-e0401n:321_115: Idaṃ buddhasāvakānaṃ nibbānaṃ hīnanti bhinnaṃ na hotīti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:321_117: “Nidhetī”ti ārammaṇesu ninnaṃ poṇaṃ pabbhāraṃ katvā ṭhapetīti attho.
anya-e0401n:321_125: “Yadettha vedayitaṃ natthī”ti yasmā ettha vedayitaṃ natthi.
anya-e0401n:321_126: Tasmā nibbāne sukhaṃ nāma katamanti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:321_131: Tasmā eso vedayitassa natthibhāvo eva etthanibbāne sukhanti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:322_2: Keci pana taṃkhiyyana nirujjhana kriyāmattaṃ nibbānaṃ na hoti.
anya-e0401n:322_15: Tasmiṃ khaya nirodhamatte anantaguṇā nāma natthīti imaṃ vādaṃ visodhetuṃ “nibbānassa cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:322_16: “Paṭipakkhavasena sijjhantī”ti etena vaṭṭadhammesu mahantaṃ ādīnavaṃ passantā eva tesaṃ nirodhe mahantaṃ guṇānisaṃsaṃ passantīti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n:322_17: Ye pana yathāvuttaṃ khayanirodhaṃ paramatthanibbānanti na jānanti,
anya-e0401n:322_19: Evaṃ guṇapadānaṃ gambhīrattā taṃkhayanirodhamattaṃ anantaguṇānaṃ vatthu na hotīti maññanti.
anya-e0401n:322_21: Kathaṃ taṃ khayanirodhamattaṃ paramasukhaṃ nāma bhaveyyāti imaṃ vādaṃ visodhetuṃ “santisukhañcanāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:322_23: “Nocetaṃ abhavissā”ti etaṃ ajātaṃ noce santaṃ vijjamānaṃ na bhaveyya.
anya-e0401n:322_27: Imasmā jātā bhūtā katā saṅkhatā sattānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ nāma na paññāyeyyāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:322_30: Duccarita dhammā nāma paccaye sati, jāyanti. Asati,
anya-e0401n:322_31: na jāyantīti evaṃ jātaṃ viya ajātampi tesaṃ atthi.
anya-e0401n:322_34: attani duccaritānaṃ ajātatthāya sammāpaṭipajjantānaṃpi sabbe duccarita dhammā attani jātāyeva siyuṃ, no ajātā. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:323_2: Sabbesaṅkhārā samanti vūpasamanti etthāti sabbasaṅkhāra samatho.
anya-e0401n:323_3: Sabbe upadhayo ettha nissajjanti ariyājanāti sabbupadhinissaggo.
anya-e0401n:323_5: “Esiṃsū”ti katvā esanakiccassa sikhāpattaṃ atthaṃ dassetuṃ “adhigacchiṃsū”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:327_2: Attano āveṇikabhūtena sāmañña lakkhaṇenati ca sambandho.
anya-e0401n:327_3: Aññāpadesena eva tadubhayalakkhaṇena salakkhaṇāni nāma vuccantīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:327_5: Nanu nibbānampi rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayotiādinā aññanissayadassanaṃ atthi yevāti.
anya-e0401n:327_7: Nibbānaṃ pana rāgādīhi paṭibaddhaṃ na hoti.
anya-e0401n:327_11: Yañhi rūpassa khayo vayo bhedo aniccāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:327_12: Tattha rūpassa uppajjitvā khayo vuttoti so rūpassa nissito eva hoti.
anya-e0401n:327_13: Idha pana rāgādīnaṃ puna uppādassapi abhāvo vuttoti so rāgādīsu anissito eva.
anya-e0401n:327_15: Atha kho tehi dūrataro ca paṭipakkhataro ca tesaṃ paṭipakkhaguṇehi imassasiddhattāti.
anya-e0401n:327_16: Anipphannarūpānipi adhippetāni eva tesampi khandhāyatanadhātu saccesu saṅgahitattā.
anya-e0401n:331_2: “Āmasanaṃ”ti padassa atthaṃ dasseti “tathā tathā kappetvā gahaṇa”nti.
anya-e0401n:331_4: “Diṭṭhiyo diṭṭhupādānaṃ”ti diṭṭhivatthūsu daḷhaggāhaṭṭhena diṭṭhiyo eva diṭṭhupādānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:331_23: Tattha “sakkāye diṭṭhī”ti pubbantāparanta kappikānaṃ viya pubbantā paranteacintetvā sabbasattānaṃpi attano
