anya-e0401n:331_24: khandhesu eva ‘rūpaṃ me attāti vā’ attā me rūpavāti vā,
anya-e0401n:331_27: evamādinā dhammatā siddhā diṭṭhīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:331_28: “Assutavā”ti khandhadesanādike suññatadhammappaṭisaṃ yutte desanā dhamme assuta pubbattā natthi sutaṃ etassāti assutavā.
anya-e0401n:331_30: Tattha pariyāpanno pana ekapuggalopi puthujjanotveva vuccati.
anya-e0401n:331_34: Ariya puggalo pana tattha pariyāpanno na hoti. Ahantivā,
anya-e0401n:331_38: “Sesadhammevā gahetvā”ti rūpato avasese nāmakkhandha dhamme attā meti gahetvā vā.
anya-e0401n:331_39: “Dhamma muttakaṃ vā attānaṃ gahetvā”ti pañcakkhandhadhammavimuttaṃ parikappasiddhaṃ attānaṃ vā gahetvā.
anya-e0401n:331_44: Tattha pana sukhavedanāpadhānattā tathā samanupassanto vedanaṃ attāti samanupassati nāma.
anya-e0401n:331_50: Rūpaṃ attato samanupassatītiādikaṃ caturāvatthaṃ sandhāya “kadāci attato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:331_52: ahaṃ paṭikkamāmītiādinā citte dissamānā attacchāyā vuccati.
anya-e0401n:333_3: Santesuhi ekantato uppajjantesu anusayā nāma na honti sayanakiccasseva abhāvato.
anya-e0401n:333_6: Paññattiyohi asabhāvadhammajātikattā kāraṇa lābhepi uppajjituṃ nappahonti.
anya-e0401n:333_7: Ime pana sabhāvadhammajātikattā kāraṇa lābhe sati uppajjituṃ pahontīti.
anya-e0401n:333_9: uppādaṃ apattānaṃpi tesaṃ paramatthajātikatā siddhā hotīti.
anya-e0401n:333_10: “Saha anusentī”ti ekato anusentīti vuttā kāmarāgānusayo ca paṭighānusayo ca mānānusayo ca diṭṭhānusayo ca vicikicchānusayo ca.
anya-e0401n:333_11: Imesaṃ sattānaṃ sattasantāne anusayakiccamattaṃ ṭhapetvā ekato uppatti nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n:333_13: Dvādasā kusalacittāni sattasantāne niccakālampi ekato uppajjeyyuṃ.
anya-e0401n:333_15: Tasmā viññāyati uppajjanaṃ nāma appahīnaṭṭhena uppajjanārahabhāvo vuttoti.
anya-e0401n:333_26: te paramatthāpi nāma na bhaveyyunti codanaṃ pariharati “te panā”tiādinā.
anya-e0401n:333_27: Sace te kusalābyākata cittasantānampi anugatā. Evaṃsati,
anya-e0401n:333_28: te kusalābyākatāni nāma siyunti codanaṃ pariharati “na cā”tiādinā.
anya-e0401n:333_29: Atha te ekanta akusalā siyuṃ. Evaṃsati,
anya-e0401n:333_38: Kathaṃ te saṅkhatajātikā hontīti āha “tehi magge”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:333_50: “Muḷho”ti mohasamaṅgī hutvā pajahatīti doso āpajjatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:333_57: Bhutvā vigatañca taṃ uppannañcāti bhutvā vigatuppannaṃ.
anya-e0401n:333_68: Evaṃ maggavajjhānaṃ anusayānaṃ uppannabhāvena vuttattā paccuppannatā pariyāyova tesaṃ vattabboti.
anya-e0401n:334_5: byāpādo,ti imāni dvesaṃ yojanāni kāmalokasaṅkhāte orambhāge eva sandissanti. Diṭṭhi,
anya-e0401n:334_8: Sesāni pana pañca mahaggatabhāvasaṅkhāte ca ariyabhāvasaṅkhāteca uddhaṃbhāgepi sandissanti. Athavā.
anya-e0401n:334_10: taṃ uparibhavagge ṭhitaṃpi kāmalokasaṅkhātaṃ orambhāgaṃ ākaḍḍhanti,
anya-e0401n:334_16: Māno ca uddhaccañca avijjācāti imāni ca rūpārūparāgasahagatāni hutvā ākaḍḍhanti.
anya-e0401n:334_20: “Kamopana dvinnaṃ pī”ti idha saṅgahe dvinnaṃpi anukkamopana.
anya-e0401n:337_3: “Sugati duggati vivaṭṭasaṅkhātāsu cā”ti sugatibhava duggati bhavanibbānasaṅkhātāsu ca.
anya-e0401n:337_12: Imepi cattāro maggaṅga dhammā dhammā nāma āgatā.
anya-e0401n:338_1: Attano gati nāma cakkhundriyādīnaṃ dassanādi kiccameva vuccati.
anya-e0401n:338_9: Mano vijānanakicce sampayuttadhammānaṃ issaro hoti anaññābhibhavanīyabhāvena pavattanatoti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:338_13: “Catusaccadhammo”ti tena puggalena anaññāta pubbo catusacca dhammo.
anya-e0401n:338_15: Anaññātaṃ ñassāmi iti pavattaṃ indriyanti samāso.
anya-e0401n:338_19: Etena avasaddassayāva sabbakilesappahānā jānananti atthaṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0401n:338_20: Pathama maggena ñātaṃ mariyādaṃ anatikkamma jānanantipi vaṇṇenti.
anya-e0401n:338_23: Aññātāvino indriyanti aññātāvindriyanti atthaṃ dassetuṃ “pariniṭṭhita ājānanakiccassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:340_2: tiādīsu viya patisaddo sāmiissara pariyāyoti āha “patīti sāmiissaro”ti.
anya-e0401n:340_8: “Chandāgamanavasena vā”ti ettha āgacchati phalaṃ etenāti āgamanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:340_15: Mahogho tiṇapaṇṇakasaṭe attaparādhīne karonto viyāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:340_20: Vīriyavato kiṃ nāma kammaṃ na sijjhatīti evaṃ pubbābhisaṅkhāravasena vā pubbe atītabhavesu suṭṭhu āsevitavīriyāgamanavasena
anya-e0401n:340_21: vā tesu tesu kalyāṇa pāpakammesu sampayutta dhamme mahogho viya tiṇapaṇṇakasaṭe attaparādhīne niccaṃ
anya-e0401n:340_23: “Pacchimā tayo dhammā”ti vīriya citta vīmaṃsā dhammā.
anya-e0401n:340_27: “Taṃ taṃ kicca visesaṃ anapekkhitvā”ti cakkhundriyaṃ dassana kicce issaro,
anya-e0401n:340_28: sotindriyaṃ savana kiccetiādīsu taṃ taṃ kiccavisesaṃ apekkhati,
anya-e0401n:340_30: “Vijānanādi kiccaṃ”ti ‘mano ārammaṇa vijānane’tiādinā vuttaṃ sabbaṃ indriya kiccaṃ.
anya-e0401n:341_3: Tete paccaya dhammā tete paccayuppanna dhammā cāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:341_5: “Paccayāhāro vā”ti ettha hetu ārammaṇādiko sabbopaccayo paccayāhāro nāma.
anya-e0401n:341_29: Itarathā uppattiyāti ca vuttaṃ siyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:342_1: “Abhinipāta mattāni hontī”ti dassana savanādi mattāni hontīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:342_2: “Vitakka pacchimakaṃ jhānaṃ”ti jhānāni nāma vitakkassa pacchānugataṃ hotīti attho.
anya-e0401n:342_8: Lokuttaravipākāni javanakiccāni ca sādhipatikāni ca hontīti vuttaṃ “tibhūmakānī”tiādi.
anya-e0401n:344_2: “Satipaṭṭhānā”ti ettha pasaddo pamukhattho padhānatthoti āha “pamukhā padhānā hutvā”ti.
anya-e0401n:344_3: Ṭhāsaddo gatinivatti atthoti āha “cittagamanaṃ nivattetvā pavattantī”ti.
anya-e0401n:344_17: “Taṃ taṃ samūhabhūtarūpadhammavasenā”ti assāsapassāsādi samūhabhūtassa rūpa dhammassa vasena.
anya-e0401n:345_4: Uppannasaddena atīta kilesāpi paccuppanna kilesāpi gahetabbā hontīti āha “asukasmiṃ kāle”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:345_7: Tattha anuppādo dhammo yesaṃ te anuppāda dhammā.
anya-e0401n:345_16: “Niyāmaṃ na okkamantī”ti ariyamaggasaṅkhātaṃ sammattaniyāmaṃ na okkamanti.
anya-e0401n:345_18: Kilesehi akopetabbatāya akuppo dhammo yassāti akuppa dhammo.
anya-e0401n:345_23: Uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ pahānāyāti katvā visuddhidhammesu yogaṃ karontassa anukkamena bhāvanā kamme matthakaṃ
anya-e0401n:345_29: Evaṃ catūsu mukhesu ekekamukhenapi sammā padahantassa sammappadhānaṃ catukiccasādhakaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:346_0: Abhivisiṭṭhena dhammavavatthānaññāṇena ñātabbā sabbe paramattha dhammā abhiññeyyā nāma.
anya-e0401n:346_2: Visuṃ visuṃ paricchinditvā ñātabbā catusacca dhammā pariññeyyā nāma.
anya-e0401n:346_10: “Citta cetasikarāsī”ti saha pubbabhāgabhāvanāya uttari manussa dhammapariyā pannā cittacetasikarāsi.
anya-e0401n:347_0: Cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni nāma buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato. Dhamme, saṅghe,
anya-e0401n:347_1: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgatoti evaṃ vuttāni sotāpattiyā aṅgāni.
anya-e0401n:348_0: “Soḷasahikiccehī”ti ekekasmiṃ sacce cattāri cattāri katvā soḷasahi kiccehi.
anya-e0401n:348_6: kathaṃ pana sāsati sambodhiṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti āha “sāhī”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:348_18: Samāhito bhikkhave yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti passatīti vacanato paññāya samādhi pādakatā pākaṭāti vuttaṃ “tassā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:348_19: Samaṃ avisamaṃ attano kiccaṃ vahati sīlenāti samavāhī.
anya-e0401n:349_3: ‘Sabbe lokuttare hontī’ti vacanassa sambandhaṃ dassetuṃ “te pana sattatiṃsappabhedā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:351_17: “Rūpaṃ rūpatthāyā”ti rūpavikatiyā jātatthāya rūpasaṅkhātaṃ saṅkhataṃ abhisaṅkharontīti attho.
anya-e0401n:351_26: Dānavipākatthāya dānaphalatthāya dānapuññasaṅkhātaṃ saṅkhataṃ abhisaṅkharontīti attho.
anya-e0401n:351_35: Tasmā tattha dukkhānupassanāñāṇaṃ atirekataraṃ pavattetabbanti tadatthāya bhagavā taṃ vedanaṃ visuṃ ekaṃ
anya-e0401n:351_36: khandhaṃ katvā khandha desanaṃ desetīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:351_39: “Paramaṃ attānaṃ katvā”ti loke viññuttaṃ paramaṃ hoti,
anya-e0401n:352_2: Na hi abyāpāra dhammānaṃ ekantena ussāho nāma atthi.
anya-e0401n:352_3: Phalassa nibbattanato phalatthāya ussāhantā viya hontīti.
anya-e0401n:353_1: “Attano eva sabhāvaṃ”ti attano sabhāvaṃ evātipi yujjati.
anya-e0401n:353_2: “Īhā ca byāpāro cā”ti abhikkamāmi paṭikkamāmītiādinā ussāho ca,
anya-e0401n:353_4: “Na ca jīvayogā”ti na ca lokiyamahājana sammatena jīvena yuttā.
anya-e0401n:353_9: Araṇī vuccati agginibbattakatthāya katā dve sāraghaṭikā.
anya-e0401n:353_16: “Vanamigo viyā”ti tiṇa rūpe purisa saññālābho vanamigo viya.
anya-e0401n:353_22: “Yattha kāmanipātito”ti yasmiṃ yasmiṃ ārammaṇe patituṃ kāmeti icchati,
anya-e0401n:353_24: Puggalavase avattitvā ārammaṇesu yadicchakaṃ nipatanatoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:353_27: Tathoti ca avitathoti ca atthato ekaṃ.
anya-e0401n:353_38: Nanu bhijjanabhayena pageva paccayasampādanaṃ nāma saṅkhāra dukkhameva siyāti. Saccaṃ.
anya-e0401n:353_39: Idha pana āsanne bhijjananimittaṃ disvā kataṃ paccaya sampādanaṃ adhippetaṃ.
anya-e0401n:353_40: “Rakkhāvaraṇagutti saṃvidhāna dukkhaṃ”ti nānābhayato rakkhaṇassa ca āvaraṇassa ca gopanassa ca saṃvidhāna dukkhaṃ.
anya-e0401n:353_41: “Tadubhayena saheva sijjhatī”ti kasigorakkhādīni saṅkhāra kammāni vā rakkhāvaraṇa guttisaṃ vidhānādīnivā
anya-e0401n:353_42: karontānaṃ taṃ dukkha dukkhaṃ tadubhayena dukkhena saheva sijjhati.
anya-e0401n:353_52: Anindriyabaddha dhammā nāma pathavīpabbatādīsu pavattā rūpa dhammā.
anya-e0401n:354_4: Tasmā lobhoyeva dukkhasamudayāriya saccaṃ nāmāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:354_5: Sāsavā kusalā kusala dhammā samudayasaccaṃ nāma,
anya-e0401n:354_6: dukkha saccabhūtānaṃ vipākakkhandhakaṭattā rūpānaṃ samudayattā saṃvaḍḍhanattā.
anya-e0401n:356_5: Tathā ariyamaggo vipariṇāma dhammo ca hoti.
anya-e0401n:356_6: Sovipariṇāma dukkhenapi puggalaṃ bhusaṃ pīḷetiyevāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:356_13: “Mahantaṃ pariḷāhadukkhaṃ”ti soka parideva dukkha domanassupāyāsānaṃ pavattivasena mahantaṃ pariḷāha dukkhaṃ.
anya-e0401n:356_14: Nibbānassa anuppāda dhammattā uppādatthāya paccayo nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n:356_16: Sampāpuṇitabbattā pana sampāpanatthāya paccayo atthīti āha “sampāpaka paccayābhisaṅkharaṇalesaṃ”ti.
anya-e0401n:356_17: Sampāpaka paccayā nāma ariya maggo ca tassa paccayā ca.
anya-e0401n:357_8: “Sammohassa pahānavasenā”ti etena idha dassanaṃ nāma ito paṭṭhāya catūsu saccesu asammoha bhāvapatti eva ālokapatti eva vuccatīti dasseti.
anya-e0401n:357_15: Ayaṃ ariyamaggo eva taṇhāya anārammaṇabhāve ṭhito taṇhādāsabyaṃ ativattati.
anya-e0401n:357_16: Taṇhāvasaṃ bhindamāno taṇhāya avisayaṃ vipākaṃ janetīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:357_20: “Khayavirāga nirodha bhūto”ti ettha kilesa dhammānaṃ virajjanaṃ vigamanaṃ antaradhānaṃ virāgo.
anya-e0401n:357_24: ārammaṇa chakkanti na vattabbaṃ dhammārammaṇassa visuṃ gahitattāti.
anya-e0401n:357_26: dvārachakkato sesānaṃ dhammārammaṇānaṃ atthitāyāti dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:361_13: “Sahajāta dhammehī”ti avijjā paccayā saṅkhārātiādīsu saṅkhārādīnaṃ sahajāta dhammehi saheva uppajjanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:361_22: “Ṭhitāva sādhātū”ti jātiyā sati jarāmaraṇassa pavattisabhāvo loke ṭhitoyeva.
anya-e0401n:361_26: “Tatra tathatā”ti tasmiṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇe saṅkhata dhammānaṃ tathatā.
anya-e0401n:361_36: Aladdhe ca samānakattukatte kathañca pubbakāletvā paccayasambhavoti.
anya-e0401n:361_39: Gambhīrocānanda paṭiccasamuppādo gambhīrāva bhāsocāti bhagavatā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:361_40: Bhāvasādhane ca kate uppajjana kriyāmattaṃ nāma visuṃ eko dhammo na hotīti kathaṃ taṃ gambhīraṃ siyāti.
anya-e0401n:361_43: Api ca saṅkhata lakkhaṇaṃ nāma saṅkhata dhammatopi gambhīraṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:361_45: Tañca atthi mecittaṃ nāmāti sattānaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:361_46: Tassa pana aniccatā saṅkhātaṃ saṅkhata lakkhaṇaṃ apākaṭaṃ hoti suṭṭhu santatiyā paṭicchannaṃ.
anya-e0401n:361_47: Tathā vedanā nāma sukhāvā dukkhāvā saṅkhata dhammo.
anya-e0401n:361_48: Sā ca atthi mevedanāti sattānaṃ pākaṭā hoti.
anya-e0401n:361_49: Tassā pana aniccatā saṅkhātaṃ saṅkhata lakkhaṇaṃ apākaṭaṃ hoti suṭṭhu santatiyā paṭicchannaṃ.
anya-e0401n:361_50: Evaṃ sesesu nāmadhammesu ca rūpadhammesu ca.
anya-e0401n:361_51: Yato sattasu visuddhīsu saṅkhata dhamma vavatthāna saṅkhātaṃ diṭṭhivisuddhiñāṇañca avijjādipaccaya pariggaha
anya-e0401n:361_52: saṅkhātaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇa visuddhiñāṇañca pathamaṃ sampādetvā pacchā dasavidhāni saṅkhata lakkhaṇānupassanā
anya-e0401n:361_54: Yathā ca aniccatā saṅkhātaṃ saṅkhata lakkhaṇaṃ saṅkhata dhammato gambhīraṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:361_55: Tathā idampi paṭiccasamuppāda saṅkhātaṃ saṅkhata lakkhaṇaṃ saṅkhata dhammato gambhīraṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:362_5: Tabbhāvabhāvīnaṃ bhāvoti tabbhāvabhāvi bhāvoti imamatthaṃ dassento “tasmiṃ tasmiṃ”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:362_7: Tassa tassa paccaya dhammassa bhāvoti tabbhāvo.
anya-e0401n:362_8: Tabbhāve sati bhavanti sambhavanti dhammatāyāti tabbhāvabhāvino.
anya-e0401n:362_12: tiādīsu hetusadda ārammaṇa saddādayo lobhādīnaṃ rūpārammaṇādīnañca dhammānaṃ taṃ taṃ paccaya sattivisesaṃ dīpenti.
anya-e0401n:362_13: Tesañca so so paccaya sattiviseso visuṃ dhammaniyāmo hoti,
anya-e0401n:362_17: “Paccaya dhammuddhāra matte aṭhatvā”ti paccaya dhammānaṃ nāma saññāvasena uddharaṇamattaṃ akatvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:362_18: “Āhaccā”ti āhanitvā taṃ taṃ paccayasatti visesaṃ pāpetvāti attho.
anya-e0401n:362_20: Paccayasatti viseso hi hetuphaladīpane tato uttari vattabba kiccābhāvato matthakaṃ nāma hotīti.
anya-e0401n:363_0: Etasmā kāraṇā phalaṃ etadeva paṭicca anāgatapakkhato paccuppannapakkhaṃ āgacchati pātubbhavatīti paccayo.
anya-e0401n:363_7: Ālāpa sallāpa kathana sajjhāyana gāyanādikaṃ vācasika kriyañca.
anya-e0401n:363_11: Api ca saṅkharonti sattā etehīti saṅkhārā.
anya-e0401n:363_15: Diṭṭhadhammikampi atthaṃ vā anatthaṃ vā saṅkharonti.
anya-e0401n:363_16: Samparāyikampi atthaṃ vā anatthaṃ vā saṅkharontītiādinā.
anya-e0401n:363_28: Taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ lagganavasena bhusaṃ nahati bandhati,
anya-e0401n:363_44: Yato assāsapassāsānaṃ virūpappavattivā taṅkhaṇe sabbaso uparujjhanaṃ vā hotīti.
anya-e0401n:364_8: “Suttantikanayenā”ti abhidhammepi vibhaṅge suttanta bhājanīyaṃ nāma āgataṃ.
anya-e0401n:364_10: Sāsavā kusalā kusala cetanā saṅkhārā nāmāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:364_13: Avijjā kiriya dhammānaṃ neva upanissaya paccayattaṃ labhati.
anya-e0401n:364_14: Kusalā kusalamūlāni kiriya dhammānaṃ na upanissaya paccayattaṃ labhantīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:364_15: Kiriya dhammā avijjāto ca kusalā kusala mūlehi ca upanissaya paccayaṃ na labhantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:364_27: “Taṃ anupapannaṃ”ti pavattivipākaviññāṇa sahagatassa khandhattayassa taṃ sahajātassa cittajarūpassa ca avasiṭṭhattā taṃ na sampannaṃti attho.
anya-e0401n:364_28: Tattha hi viññāṇapade pavattivasena dvattiṃsavidhaṃ vipākacittaṃ viññāṇaṃ nāmāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:364_30: nāma rūpapadepi pavattivasena tadubhayaṃ pavattiviññāṇasahagataṃpi gahetabbamevāti.
anya-e0401n:364_31: “Taṃ taṃ viññāṇa sampayuttā”ti paṭisandhiviññāṇa pavatti viññāṇasampayuttā.
anya-e0401n:365_10: Sukhavedanā visesato taṇhāya paccayo hotīti vuttaṃ “sukhavedanāsadiso”tiādi.
anya-e0401n:365_11: Domanassānaṃ pana tassā paccayabhāvo parato pariyeṭṭhitaṇhāyaṃ pākaṭo bhavissati.
anya-e0401n:365_12: Upekkhā vedanāpi dukkhena pīḷitassa sukhaṭhāne tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0401n:365_17: “Attano ārammaṇesū”ti atta jīva lokādīsu diṭṭhiyāgahitā rammaṇesu.
anya-e0401n:365_18: “Assādana khamanarocanabhūtāyā”ti sādhuvatāyaṃ mamadassananti evaṃ rajjana tussana kantibhūtāya.
anya-e0401n:366_2: Yathā upādānaṃti disvā upādārūpaṃti pade ādāsaddo viññāyati.
anya-e0401n:366_14: Itarathā issaranimmānadiṭṭhi ahetuka diṭṭhīnaṃ okāso siyāti.
anya-e0401n:366_19: “Ahetū apaccayā sattā pavattantī”ti pubbaheturahitā pubbapaccayarahitā hutvā imesattā pavattanti.
anya-e0401n:366_20: “Avijjādīhi sādhetabbo na hotī”ti bhavaparamparāsu nicco hutvā sandhāvantassa avijjādīhi kattabba kiccaṃ na hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:366_21: “Kesañci na sambhavantiyevā”ti anāgāmīnaṃ arahantānañca na sambhavantiyeva.
anya-e0401n:366_25: “Tadavinābhāvibhāvalakkhaṇenā”ti ettha tena tena paccayena avinābhāvīnaṃ bhāvo,
anya-e0401n:366_32: “Pathamena dutīyassā”ti pathamasaṅkhepena saddhiṃ dutīyassa saṅkhepassa ekā sandhītiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:366_33: “Lokassa pākaṭa vohārenā”ti kilesadhammā kammadhammā ca loke hetūti pākaṭā honti.
anya-e0401n:366_50: “Āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayacetanā bhavo nāmā”ti idaṃ uddesapāḷiyaṃ yathādiṭṭhapāṭhavaseneva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:366_51: Tathā purimakammabhavasmiṃ idha paṭisandhiyā paccayacetanā saṅkhārā nāmāti idañca.
anya-e0401n:366_52: Idha pana pubbeyeva dvīsuhetupañcakesu dvinnaṃ saṅkhāra kammabhavānaṃ saṅgahitattā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva
anya-e0401n:366_57: “Dhammavibhāgarakkhaṇatthaṃ”ti vibhaṅge bhavapade upapattibhavassapi vibhattattā evaṃ vibhattassa dhammavibhāgassa rakkhaṇatthaṃ.
anya-e0401n:366_58: Phalapañcakato anaññaṃpi upapattibhavaṃ aññaṃviya katvā ‘upapattibhavasaṅkhāto bhavekadeso’ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:366_59: So ca upapattibhavo nāma paccuppannahetūhi nibbattattā catutthe phalapañcake eva saṅgahito.
anya-e0401n:366_60: Tasmā tena upapattibhavasaddena catuttha pañcakameva gahitanti yuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:366_61: Itarathā dve phalapañcakāni vipākavaṭṭanti vutte siddhameva hoti.
anya-e0401n:366_62: Evañcasati avasesā cāti ettha dutīyaphalapañcakameva avasiṭṭhaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:366_64: so ca akusala mūla”ntiādi abhidhamme mūlayamake mūlanāmena āgatattā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:366_65: Dvīsupanabhava cakkesu purimacakke avijjā ādi hoti.
anya-e0401n:366_67: Ādi ca nāma mūlanti ca sīsanti ca vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti pariyāyaṃ dassetuṃ “athavā”tiādi vuttaṃ.“Āgamanasambhāresū”ti
anya-e0401n:366_69: Taṇhā eva sīsaṃ katvā vuttāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:366_78: Paṭilomapaṭiccasamuppādo nāma avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodhoti evaṃ pavatto paṭiccasamuppādo.
anya-e0401n:366_79: “Jarāmaraṇamucchayātiādi navattabbaṃ siyā”ti jarāmaraṇamucchāyātiādivacanaṃ anulomapaṭiccasamuppāda sambandha vacananti katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:366_80: “Uparivaṭṭamūla dhammappaṭipādakānaṃ”ti upari dutiyānāgatabhāvādīsu avijjātaṇhā saṅkhātānaṃ vaṭṭamūladhammānaṃ niyojakānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:366_100: Tadubhayaṃ vipākaṃ etassāti katvā dukkhaṃ sammohavepakkanti ca pariyeṭṭhivepakkanti ca vuccatīti yojanā. Api ca,
anya-e0401n:366_116: Jātiyā vuttāya sabbāni tassā nidānāni vuttāni eva hontīti katvā “jātiyā eva vā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:366_118: Tattha avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārātiādinā nayena paṭṭhapesi mahāmunīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:366_121: Idhapi tameva sambandhaṃ gahetvā yojeti “iccevaṃ ābandhanti. La.
anya-e0401n:366_124: Tasmā sā sayaṃ ahetu apaccayā hutvā vaṭṭassa ādipaccayabhūtā hotīti codanā.
anya-e0401n:366_128: Jānantehi tāsaṃ pakāsanatthāya paṭiccasamuppādakathānāma vaṭṭakathā ekantena kathetabbā hoti.
anya-e0401n:366_129: Kathentehi ca vaṭṭadhammānaṃ majjhe katamassa dhammassa kiccaṃ vaṭṭappavattatthāya padhānataraṃ hotīti jānitabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:366_130: Tadā kiccavasena padhānataraṃ ekaṃ dhammaṃ mūlaṃ sīsaṃ katvā vaṭṭakathā kathetabbāti.
anya-e0401n:366_135: Na ca paññā cakkhussa andhabhāvakaraṇa sadisaṃ aññaṃ vaṭṭassa pavattatthāya padhānakiccaṃ nāma atthi.
anya-e0401n:366_136: Tasmā avijjā evettha sabbappadhāna kiccattā vaṭṭakathāya sīsabhūtā hoti.
anya-e0401n:366_137: Evaṃ vaṭṭakathāya sīsabhūtattā sā ādimhi vuttāti.
anya-e0401n:366_143: “Aññāya avijjāya evā”ti atītabhavatopi purimabhave siddhāya aññāya avijjāya eva.
anya-e0401n:366_146: “Padhāna paccayabhūtattā”ti pubbe vuttanayena andhabhāvakaraṇa kiccattā vaṭṭappavattiyā padhāna paccayabhūtā hoti.
anya-e0401n:366_148: “Tassa tassāti niṭṭhānameva na paññāyeyyā”ti tassa paccayassa paccayo vattabbo.
anya-e0401n:366_149: Tassapi paccayassa paccayo vattabboti evaṃ vassasatampi vassasahassaṃpi niṭṭhānameva na paññāyeyya.
anya-e0401n:366_151: “Pañcanīvaraṇātissavacanīyaṃ”ti pañcanīvaraṇa dhammā avijjāya āhāroti vacanīyaṃ bhaveyya.
anya-e0401n:368_2: “Hetu ca so paccayo cā”ti ettha lobho hetujātikattā hetu ca hoti.
anya-e0401n:368_3: Ārammaṇānantarādi paccayena aññadhammassa paccayo ca hotīti atthassa sambhavato “hetu hutvā paccayo”ti vaṇṇeti.
anya-e0401n:368_4: Evaṃ vaṇṇitepi “hetu hutvā paccayo”ti hetu honto paccayoti atthe sati,
anya-e0401n:368_5: so yevattho sambhavatīti “puna hetubhāvena paccayo”ti vaṇṇeti.
anya-e0401n:368_7: hetu ca so paccayo cāti ettha pada dvayaṃ ekadhammādhikaraṇattā tulyādhikaraṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:368_8: Hetubhāvena paccayoti ettha pana padadvayaṃ tulyādhikaraṇaṃ na hoti.
anya-e0401n:368_11: Evaṃ sante tulyādhikaraṇaṃ vākyaṃ bhinnādhikaraṇaṃ katvā vaṇṇetīti na yuttametanti.
anya-e0401n:368_25: Patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānassa patiṭṭhitakāraṇassa vā thāmabalasampannattāti dassetuṃ “ārammaṇe daḷhanipātinā thāmabalasampannenā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:368_27: Ārammaṇe daḷhanipātimhi thāmabalasampanne ettha dhammetipi yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:368_31: Nanu upakāraka saddo kattāraṃ vā kāretāraṃ vā vadatīti.
anya-e0401n:368_33: Dhammato pana kattā vā kāretā vā natthīti dassetuṃ “na hi sabhāva dhammesū”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:368_35: Kasmā upakārakoti vuccatīti āha “tathā upaladdhiyaṃ panā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:370_2: “Sāmino viya dāse”ti sāmino attanodāse attanovase vattayamānā viya.
anya-e0401n:370_3: Sahajātādhipati pana heṭṭhā samuccaya saṅgahe vuttoti idha na vutto.
anya-e0401n:371_8: “Purimapacchimabhāgappavattānaṃ”ti nirodhassa asaññībhavassa ca purimabhāge ca pacchimabhāge ca pavattānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:371_9: “Cittuppādānaṃ pī”ti nirodhassa pubbabhāge nevasaññānāsaññāyatana kusala kriya cittuppādānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:371_13: Tesu pana kathaṃ anantaraṃ nāma siyā.
anya-e0401n:371_14: Dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ purimabhāga pacchima bhāgānaṃ majjhe acittakassa kālassa acittakassa rūpasantānassa ca antarikattāti codanā.
anya-e0401n:371_17: Rūpadhammo antaraṃ na ca karoti nāma.
anya-e0401n:371_19: “Tathāpavattana samatthatā”ti ekībhūtānaṃ viya attano anantare dhammantaraṃ uppādane samatthatā.
anya-e0401n:372_0: Sahajātapaccaye. “Ye pana dhammā”ti paccayuppanna dhammā. “Attanī”ti paccaya dhammo vuccati.
anya-e0401n:373_0: “Aññamaññaṃ upatthambhantaṃ tidaṇḍaṃ viyā”ti bhūmiyaṃ aññamaññaṃ nissāya ussitā tayodaṇḍā aññamaññaṃ upatthambhantā viya.
anya-e0401n:374_8: Karaṇañca attano santāne suṭṭhuuppādanañca suṭṭhuupasevanañca daṭṭhabbanti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:375_0: “Nissayārammaṇa dhammā evā”ti nissaya paccaya dhamma ārammaṇa paccaya dhammā eva.
anya-e0401n:375_1: “Purejātatāmattavisiṭṭhā”ti ettha mattasaddena nissayārammaṇasattito visuṃ purejātasatti nāma natthīti dasseti.
anya-e0401n:375_4: Ettha pañcavatthūni ca pañcārammaṇāni ca purejātattā eva suṭṭhubalavatāya pañcaviññāṇānaṃ vatthu kicca ārammaṇa kiccāni sādhenti.
anya-e0401n:375_5: Tathā hadayavatthu ca manodhātu manoviññāṇadhātū nanti.
anya-e0401n:375_6: Ayaṃ visuṃ purejātasatti visesoti vadeyya. Saccaṃ.
anya-e0401n:375_7: Suddhamano dvārepana idha ṭhatvā nirayesu evarūpāni nirayaggirūpāni atthi.
anya-e0401n:375_8: Idāni devesu ca evarūpāni dibbarūpāni atthīti cintayantānampi,
anya-e0401n:375_10: tesu anāgate evarūpāni uppajjissantīti vā cintayantānaṃpitāni rūpāni nibbisesāni hutvā manoviññāṇānaṃ ārammaṇa paccayattaṃ gacchanti.
anya-e0401n:375_11: Tattha pure jātāni hutvā tadā vijjamānāni paccuppannarūpāni ārammaṇa purejātapaccayo.
anya-e0401n:375_13: Na cettha purejātānaṃ paccuppannarūpānaṃ purejātattena viseso atthi.
anya-e0401n:375_14: Na ca tāni purejātapaccayo na honti.
anya-e0401n:375_16: Tāni purejātapaccayo nāma na bhaveyyuṃ. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:375_21: pañcadvāresu pana pubbe vuttanayena visuṃ purejātasattiviseso dissatīti.
anya-e0401n:375_23: So pana bahuvidhānaṃ nissaya paccaya ārammaṇapaccayānaṃ majjhe nissaya sattiviseso eva,
anya-e0401n:375_25: Api ca visuṃ purejāta sattiviseso nāma natthīti idaṃ yathāvutte suddhamanodvāre tabbisesābhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:375_26: Visuṃ purejāta sattiviseso nāma atthīti idaṃ pañcadvāresu tabbisesassa atthibhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttanti.
anya-e0401n:376_1: “Rukkhapotakānaṃ viyā”ti pacchā āsiñciyamānaṃ udakaṃ rukkhapotakānaṃ vuddhaviruḷhabhāvaṃ pāpetvā upatthambhanavasena upakārako viyāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:376_5: Sā pana āhārāsā cetanā upatthambhati yevāti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:377_0: Āsevanti taṃ paccaya dhammaṃ paccayuppannā dhammāti āsevanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:377_1: Etena bhuso paccayuppanna dhammehi āsevitabbattā āsevananti vuccatīti dassetīti.
anya-e0401n:377_6: Kathañca taṃ tebhajantīti āha “suṭṭhusevamānā viya bhajamānā viya pavattantī”ti.
anya-e0401n:377_7: Viya saddena loke kiñcijanaṃ kecijanā kenaci atthena suṭṭhusevantā viyāti dasseti.
anya-e0401n:377_8: Kathaṃ suṭṭhuseviyamānā viya hontīti āha “tassa purimassā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:377_10: “Sabbaparipūraṃ ākāraṃ”ti javavegasahitehi vijānana phusanādīhi sāvajjāna vajjādīhi ca sabbehi javanaguṇehi paripūraṃ ākāraṃ.
anya-e0401n:377_11: “Āsevetī”ti maṃ suṭṭhu sevathāti niyojentaṃ viya hoti.
anya-e0401n:377_15: Etena yathā loke eko paresaṃ yathicchitaṃ deti.
anya-e0401n:377_18: Evameva idhapi suṭṭhuvāsadānameva bhajāpanaṃ nāmāti dasseti.
anya-e0401n:377_19: “Vaḍḍheti vā”ti etena āsevanā bhāvanā vaḍḍhanāti imaṃpariyāyatthaṃ vadati.
anya-e0401n:377_20: Purimābhiyogo nāma ādito paṭṭhāya sajjhāyanādikammesu yathāsatti yathābalaṃ vā yāmakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:377_21: Tathā karontassa taṃ uggahaṇa kammaṃ uparūpari paguṇabhāvaṃ gacchatīti.
anya-e0401n:378_6: “Tadabhisaṅkharaṇavegajanitaṃ”ti tassa kāyaṅgādikassa abhisaṅkharaṇavegena janitaṃ kiriyāvisesa nidhānakiccanti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:379_1: Nirussāha santabhāvo nāma kusalā kusalānaṃ viya kāyaṅgavācaṅgābhisaṅkharaṇa kiccesu ca āyatiṃ vipaccana kiccesu ca nirussāhabhāvena santabhāvo.
anya-e0401n:379_3: Cittābhisaṅkharaṇa kiccesupana sampayuttacetanāvasena yathopaṭṭhitesu ārammaṇesu sampayuttadhammānaṃ ekato sannipātagamanussāhamattaṃ atthi.
anya-e0401n:379_4: Tatoparaṃ pana supina dassana kiccaṃpi natthīti.
anya-e0401n:379_6: Kiñcijānana cittaṃ nāma kammādi ārammaṇaṃ appamattakaṃpi jānanaṃ vīthicittaṃ.
anya-e0401n:381_4: Nanu itthiliṅgādīnaṃ pavattikāraṇattā idha gahetabbamevāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:381_10: Na indriya paccayattena indriyaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0401n:381_11: Yathāhi eko rājā attano vijite gehāni karonti.
anya-e0401n:381_15: Tattha rājā gehuppattiyā ca gehaṭṭhitiyā ca kiñci kiccaṃ na karoti.
anya-e0401n:381_17: Karontā pana raññā paṭṭhapitaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ anatikkamitvāva karonti.
anya-e0401n:382_2: Evañcasati tāni kathaṃ maggapaccayattaṃ gacchantīti āha “ettha cā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:382_8: Evañcasati sahetukā vipāka kriyā byākatadhammāpi tenevaṭṭhena sabbaso kusalasadisā siyunti. Na siyuṃ,
anya-e0401n:382_10: Vipākābyākatāhi kammavegena santāne patitamattattā nirussāhasantasabhāvato taṃ sampayuttā cetanā nānakkhaṇika kammapaccayattaṃ na gacchati.
anya-e0401n:382_11: Kiriyābyākatā ca niranusayasantāne uppannattā taṃ sampayuttacetanāpi tappaccayattaṃ na gacchatiyeva.
anya-e0401n:382_12: Tasmā tesu vipāka kriyābyākatesu sammādiṭṭhādīnipi sugati sampāpakaṭṭhaṃ na sādhenti.
anya-e0401n:382_13: Kilesappahāna kiccassa abhāvato nibbāna sampāpakaṭṭhampi nasādhenti.
anya-e0401n:382_16: Indriya dhammesu arūpindriyānaṃ ādhippacca kiccaṃ arūpadhamme sveva pharati.
anya-e0401n:382_17: Rūpadhammā pana taṃ samuṭṭhitattā eva tappaccayuppannesu vuttā.
anya-e0401n:383_0: “Sampayuttāsaṅkā sambhavatī”ti sahajātā nāmadhammā taṃ samuṭṭhāna rūpehi,
anya-e0401n:383_2: vatthu dhammā ca tannissitanāmadhammehi kālato ca ṭhānato ca eka sambandhattā tesu sampayuttāsaṅkā sambhavati.
anya-e0401n:383_3: “Vippayuttapaccayappasaṅgo natthī”ti ārammaṇānantarādipaccayāpi attano paccayuppannehi sampayuttā na honti.
anya-e0401n:383_4: Tasmā tepi vippayuttapaccaya bhāvena vattabbāti evarūpo vippayuttapaccayappasaṅgo tesu ārammaṇa paccayādīsu natthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:384_0: “Heṭṭhāvuttappakāresu evā”ti ettha evasaddena paccayantaraṃ na hotīti dasseti.
anya-e0401n:384_7: So kassa paccayo bhavituṃ arahatīti evarūpassa micchābhinivesassa pahānato.
anya-e0401n:384_9: loke kecidhammā sayaṃ atthikāle eva aññesaṃ paccayā honti,
anya-e0401n:384_11: Keci dhammā sayaṃ natthikāle eva aññesaṃ paccayā honti,
anya-e0401n:384_12: no atthikāleti ayañcavibhāgo avassaṃ icchitabbo yevāti.
anya-e0401n:385_1: atthīti aya meko antoti sattānaṃ seṭṭhasārabhūto attānāma anamatagge saṃsāre niccakālaṃ atthi.
anya-e0401n:385_2: Ucchedo vā vimokkho vā sabbaso natthi.
anya-e0401n:385_7: Ayaṃ ucchedavādo nāma dutīyo visamanto dutīyāvisamakoṭi.
anya-e0401n:385_8: Ime paṭicca samuppādaṃ ajānantānaṃ ubhovisamantā nāma.
anya-e0401n:385_10: yo atthīti vā natthīti vā vattabbo bhaveyya.
anya-e0401n:385_12: Tassa ca yāva avijjā appahīnā hoti,
anya-e0401n:385_14: Avijjāya pana pahīnāya tatoparaṃ na pavattati.
anya-e0401n:385_18: Vaṇṇentānaṃpi tesaṃ bahu payojanaṃ natthi yevāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:387_7: Yo koci cittuppādo aviruddhassa yassa kassaci cittuppādassa paccayo na na hotīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:387_9: “Purimāni javanānī”ti ettha maggo gotrabhuto āsevana paccayaṃ labhati.
anya-e0401n:387_10: Phalassa pana so bhinnajātikattā āsevana paccayo na hoti.
anya-e0401n:387_11: Phalaṃ pana sabbaso āsevana muttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:387_12: Tasmā tadubhayaṃ idha purimajavanasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchatīti vuttaṃ “magga phalajavanavajjānī”ti.
anya-e0401n:387_26: So eva āyatiṃ vipākadhammarāsi hutvā pātubbhavati.
anya-e0401n:387_31: Tasmā kammacetanā uppajjamānā cittasantāne tassa bījassa nidhānatthāya uppajjati,
anya-e0401n:387_32: nirujjhamānā ca nidahitvā eva nirujjhatīti vuttaṃ “attano pavattākārasaṅkhāta bījanidhānañcā”ti.
anya-e0401n:387_42: Vividhena ākārena pharaṇaṃ kālantara desantara gamanaṃ vipphāro.
anya-e0401n:387_50: “Vaḍḍhanapakkhe ṭhitaṃ vā”ti tato pacchā yāva aṭṭhama cittakkhaṇā vaḍḍhanapakkhe ṭhitaṃ vā.
anya-e0401n:387_58: Arūpabhave maraṇāsannakāle kassaci gatinimittu paṭṭhānaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu vuttameva.
anya-e0401n:387_63: vatthu purejātapaccayassa tattha aladdhabbattāti iminā adhippāyena “āruppeviyā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:387_64: Ettha ca paṭṭhāne arūpabhave dvepi purejātapaccayā paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0401n:387_65: tasmā sabbepi arūpa puggalā sabbaṃpi rūpadhammaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na karontītipi vadanti.
anya-e0401n:387_66: Evañca katvā ārammaṇa saṅgahadīpaniyaṃ ‘asaññībhavato cutānaṃ viya arūpabhavato cutānaṃpi gatinimittabhūtaṃ
anya-e0401n:387_71: Te pana akusalā dhammā kathaṃ catubhūmika kusalānaṃ upanissaya paccayā hontīti āha “tattha ānantariya vajjānī”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:387_72: Tattha ānantariya kammakatānaṃ kilesāvaraṇa kammāvaraṇehi samannāgatattā jhānamaggappaṭilābho nāma natthīti vuttaṃ “ānantariya vajjānī”ti.
anya-e0401n:387_73: “Tānī”ti rāgādīni akusalāni catubhūmika kusalānaṃ uppattiyā balavanissayā hontīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:387_74: “Samatikkamamukhenā”ti paṭṭhāne akusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa upanissaya paccayena paccayoti etassa
anya-e0401n:387_75: pañhassa vibhaṅge pāṇaṃ hantvā tassa paṭighā tatthāya dānaṃ deti,
anya-e0401n:387_81: Tattha “tassa paṭighātatthāyā”ti tassa pāṇātipātakammassa paṭihananatthāya pahānatthāya samatikkamanatthāyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:387_82: So ce pāṇātipātī puggalo puna saṃvegaṃ āpajjitvā tassa kammassa samatikkamanatthāya dānaṃ deti,
anya-e0401n:387_85: Tadā taṃ pāṇāti pātakammaṃ taṃ puggalaṃ dānakammeniyojeti nāma.
anya-e0401n:387_87: Yathāhi rājā evaṃ vadeyya imasmiṃ divase yo uposathaṃ nupavasati,
anya-e0401n:387_93: Uposatha kamma kusalāni viya tassa dānasīla uposatha kamma kusalānīti.
anya-e0401n:387_97: Evaṃ samatikkamamukhena ekaṃpi akusalaṃ sabbāni catubhūmika kusalāni upanissaya sattiyā janeti pavattetīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:387_98: “Tāniyeva sabbānī”ti ānantariya kammasahitānisabbāni akusalāniyeva sabbesaṃ akusalānaṃ abyākata dhammānaṃ uppattiyā balavanissayā hontīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:387_105: Tattha pathavīrasa āporasavassodaka bījāni rukkhatiṇādīnaṃ balavanissayā honti.
anya-e0401n:387_106: Mūlabhesajjādīni ajjhattaṃ santānaṃ balavanissayā hontīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:387_108: “Na evaṃ rūpasantānenā”ti evaṃ rūpasantānena uppāditā upasevitā dhammā natthi.
anya-e0401n:387_116: Attano ca uppannā rāgādayo parassa ca santāne parassa ca uppannā rāgādayo attano ca santāneti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:387_118: Manopadosikadevā aññamaññaṃ disvā attano manaṃ padūsenti.
anya-e0401n:387_121: Tesaṃ dve issādhammā aññamaññassa balavanissayā hontīti.
anya-e0401n:387_124: Jhāna magga phala vipassanādibhedaṃ ālambaṇaṃ paccavekkhana assādanādi dhamme attādhīne karotīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:387_126: Paṭṭhāne pañhavāre dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃsamādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati.
anya-e0401n:387_127: Pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṃ katvā paccavekkhantītiādinā āgatattādāna sīla. La.
anya-e0401n:387_131: cakkhuṃ garuṃ katvā assādentītiādinā ca āgatattā “rāga diṭṭhi cakkhu sotādīnicā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:387_135: Mahābhūte kiñci upatthambhetuṃ na sakkontīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:387_136: Nanu āhāra rūpaṃ mahābhūte upatthambhetuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0401n:387_147: avigato cā,ti chasupaccayesu ghaṭitesu tīṇi visajjanāni labbhantīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:387_148: Tīṇi visajjanāni nāma vatthu kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ cha hi paccayehi paccayo.
anya-e0401n:387_151: Ettha ca attano ajjhattaṃ vatthuṃ ārabbha vatthu me aniccantiādinā sammasantassa vatthurūpaṃ kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ chahi paccayehi paccayo.
anya-e0401n:387_154: eso me attā,ti upādiyantassa vatthu rūpaṃ akusalānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:387_156: Arahato pana taṃ aniccantiādinā sammasantassa kriyābyākatānaṃ khandhānanti.
anya-e0401n:387_159: Adhiṭṭhānavidhāne pana ākāsa gamane rūpakāyaṃ ārabbhacittaṃ viya kāyaṃ lahukaṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa tappariyāpannaṃ
anya-e0401n:387_161: “Aniṭṭheṭhāne”ti javanacittassa āvajjanena vinā uppajjanaṃ nāma katthaci icchitabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:387_172: aññaṃ javanānanti evaṃ javanāni āvajjanena bhinnārammaṇāni vā.
anya-e0401n:387_183: “Duvidhenā”ti rūpajanana kiccaṃ rūpūpatthambhana kiccanti evaṃ duvidhena.
anya-e0401n:387_184: Athavā “duvidhenā”ti ajjhattāhārassa upatthambhanaṃ bahiddhāhārassa upatthambhananti evaṃ duvidhena.
anya-e0401n:387_194: Sahajananaṃ nāma attanā saha janentassa sahajananaṃ.
anya-e0401n:387_195: Tañca kammacittādīnaṃ viya visuṃ jananakiccaṃ na hoti.
anya-e0401n:387_196: Attani uppajjante eva itarāni rūpāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0401n:387_197: Anuppajjante na uppajjantīti evarūpaṃ jananakiccaṃ veditabbaṃ.“Vināva sahuppādanakiccenā”ti attanā sahuppādanakicce
anya-e0401n:387_199: Teneva sahajātāni upatthambhantopi sahajātapaccayattaṃ na gacchatīti.
anya-e0401n:387_202: “Tīsū”ti ārammaṇañca upanissayo ca atthicāti imesu tīsu.
anya-e0401n:387_204: So purejātatthi paccayo evāti atthipaccaye saṅgahito.
anya-e0401n:387_205: “Tasmiṃ kate pavattamānānaṃ”ti tasmiṃ kamme kate tassa katattā eva pavattamānānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:387_211: Tasmā āgametabbassa āyatikālassa abhāvā akālikoti vuccati.
anya-e0401n:387_215: “Phalahetū pacārenā”ti phalabhūtāya sabbalokappavattiyā hetubhūtassa kammassa nāmaṃ phalamhi āropetvā
anya-e0401n:387_216: vohārena sabbepi tevīsatipaccayā kammasabhāvaṃ nātivattantīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:387_220: “Viruddhamevā”ti ārammaṇa paccayabhūtā sabbe pathavī pabbata nadīsamudda ajaṭākāsādayo ca sabbāpaññattiyo
anya-e0401n:387_221: ca nibbānañca kammasaṅkhyaṃ gacchantīti vadanto ca,
anya-e0401n:387_222: sabbe atītānāgata dhammā atthipaccayā evāti vadanto ca,
anya-e0401n:387_228: Na hi paramattha dhamma bhūtāpi atītānāgatadhammā idha atthi saṅkhyaṃ gacchanti.
anya-e0401n:387_234: “Bījato viya mahārukkhassā”ti bījapaccayā kaḷīraṅkurādikassa mahārukkhasantānassa nibbattiviya.
anya-e0401n:387_258: Bahiddhā utupana asatipi purimuppannāya rūpappaveṇiyā rūpaṃ na janetīti na vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:387_267: “Yathā vā tathā vā”ti aniyamatoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:387_277: Dhanañca dhaññañca tato avasesā sabbeupabhogaparibhogācāti viggaho.
anya-e0401n:387_278: Vijjā ca sippañca nānābahussutañca pariyatti cāti dvando.
anya-e0401n:387_281: Tattha dhanadhaññabhogānaṃ paṭilābhatthāya pubbayogakaraṇaṃ nāma kasikamma vāṇijjakammādīnaṃ karaṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:387_282: Tattha kasikamme tāva dhanadhaññabhogānaṃ paṭilābhatthāya kasikammakaraṇe dhanadhaññabhogā anāgatūpanissaya paccayo.
anya-e0401n:387_284: Dhanadhañña bhogānaṃ paṭilābhaparibhogakālesu kasikammakaraṇaṃ atītūpanissaya paccayo.
anya-e0401n:387_285: Tesaṃ paṭilābho ca paribhogo ca tassa paccayuppanno.
anya-e0401n:387_287: meghavuṭṭhiyo ca naṅgalādīni kasibhaṇḍāni ca gomahiṃsā ca kammakāraka purisā ca paccuppannūpanissayo.
anya-e0401n:387_289: Kammasādhikassa mātāpitādayo pubbapurisā tassa kammassa atītūpanissaya paccayo.
anya-e0401n:388_3: likkhādīni upādāya sabbesaṃ rūpasaṇṭhānānaṃ bhāvo saṇṭhānattaṃ.
anya-e0401n:388_5: “Pavatti hetū”ti ca paramattha rūpa dhammā eva.
anya-e0401n:388_11: ayaṃ phassonāmātiādinā kathentānaṃ santikā nāmābhidhānaṃ sutvā tadanurūpassa sabhāvatthassa jānanavasena ñāṇena gahetabbabhāvo.
anya-e0401n:388_12: Nāma paññattānusārena jānitabbattā nāmanti vuccatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:388_14: Ārammaṇika dhammā vā ettha namantīti nāmantipi yujjati.
anya-e0401n:389_0: Imasmiṃ paccayasaṅgahe paccayadhammesu paññattīnaṃpi saṅgahitattā paññatti saṅgahopi therena idha nikkhitto.
anya-e0401n:389_2: Tañcaṭhapanaṃ dvīhikāraṇehi sijjhati vadantānaṃ vohārena ca,
anya-e0401n:389_5: tathā pacchima janaparamparāhi voharīyatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:389_11: Adhimattabhāvappakāro nāma pathavīpabbatādīsu pathavīdhātuyā adhimatta bhāvaviseso.
anya-e0401n:389_15: Vividhena pakārena pariṇamanaṃ vipariṇāmoti āha tathā tathā vipariṇāmākāranti.
anya-e0401n:389_16: Pathavīpabbatādivohāro saṇṭhitākāraṃ nissāya pavatto na hoti.
anya-e0401n:389_18: pabbato nāma evaṃ saṇṭhānoti saṇṭhānaniyamo natthi.
anya-e0401n:389_19: Paṃsusilānaṃ rāsipuñjappavattimattena vohāro siddhoti vuttaṃ “na hi idha saṇṭhānaṃ padhānaṃ”ti.
anya-e0401n:389_20: “Kaṭṭhādayo eva vuccantī”ti te evasaṇṭhānanānattaṃ paṭicca nānāvohārena vuccanti.
anya-e0401n:389_21: Pathavī pabbata nadī samuddādīsu viya bhūtānaṃ pavattivisesākārenāti vuttaṃ “na hi idha samūho padhānaṃ”ti.
anya-e0401n:389_22: “Upādāpaññattī”ti pañcakkhandha dhamme upādāya tehi anaññaṃ ekībhūtaṃ katvā paññatti.
anya-e0401n:389_23: Na ākāsa paññatti disādesapaññattiyo viya tehi khandhehi muñcitvā paññatti.
anya-e0401n:389_27: Uddhumātakādīni ‘uddhumātakaṃ paṭikūlaṃ’tiādinā paṭikūlavasena manasikarontassapi nimittaṃ upaṭṭhahantaṃ
anya-e0401n:389_39: Soyeva samūhākārādi nimitta mattattā atthacchāyākāroti vuccatīti imamatthaṃ dasseti “saddābhidheyya saṅkhātenā”tiādinā.
anya-e0401n:389_44: “Imechā”ti ime chasaddapaññatti vohārā nāma nāmakammādi nāma.
anya-e0401n:389_46: Attha visayaṃ eva hutvā pavattati bhāsaññūnanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:389_48: padasamūho vākyanti evaṃ vutte nāmapade vijjamāne sati.
anya-e0401n:389_49: “Taduggaṇhantānaṃ”ti taṃ taṃ nāmapadaṃ vācuggatakaraṇa vasena uggaṇhantānaṃ janānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:389_52: Etena attani atthassa nāmanaṃ nāma atthajotana kiccamevāti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n:389_55: “Taṃ taṃ atthābhimukhaṃ nāmetī”ti ārammaṇa karaṇavasena nāmeti.
anya-e0401n:389_56: “Nāmaggahaṇa vasenā”ti ayaṃ asukonāma hotūti evaṃ nāmaggahaṇavasena.
anya-e0401n:389_62: “Kathīyatī”ti taṃ sutakāle vadantena suṇantassa ācikkhīyati jānāpīyati.
anya-e0401n:389_74: So hi dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ paññattidukaniddese mūlaṭīkāyaṃ tathā vadati.
anya-e0401n:389_81: ayamattho imassa nāmassa atthoti evaṃ puretaraṃ lokasaññāṇa jānanakaññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:389_82: “Atīta saddamattārammaṇā”ti sotaviññāṇa vīthiyā ārammaṇaṃ hutvā niruddhaṃ atīta saddamattaṃ kurumānā.
anya-e0401n:389_83: “Tena vuttavacane”ti tena sikkhaṃ paccakkhantena bhikkhunā sikkhaṃ paccakkhāmīti vuttavacane.
anya-e0401n:389_87: “Ayaṃ akkhara samūho”ti idaṃ nāmapadanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:389_93: “Pubbabhāge”ti yaṃ kiñci atthaṃ paresaṃ vattukāmo vadanto tassa tassa atthassa nāmaṃ pathamaṃ manodvāravīthiyā niyametvā eva vadati,
anya-e0401n:389_94: taṃ nāmaṃ pubbabhāge vadantena manasā vavatthāpitā nāmapaññattīti vuccati.
anya-e0401n:390_5: So eva rakārassa lakāraṃ katvā pakāre ca saralopaṃ katvā plutoti vuccati.
anya-e0401n:390_8: “Anekakoṭisatasahassāni cittānī”ti javanavīthīnaṃ antarantarā bhavaṅgacittehi saddhiṃ anekakoṭisatasahassāni cittāni.
anya-e0401n:394_2: Vidito viññāto nāmarūpa vibhāgo yenāti viggaho.
anya-e0401n:394_10: Kathaṃ kasiṇabhāvanādikaṃ yogakammaṃ attāva attano ṭhānaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “ādimajjhapariyosānānaṃhī”tiādi.
anya-e0401n:394_12: “Padaṭṭhānatāyā”ti etena tiṭṭhati anivattamānaṃ pavattati etenāti ṭhānanti atthena padaṭṭhānameva ṭhānanti vuccatīti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n:394_14: “Dasakasiṇānī”tiādīsu mukhyato vā upacārato vā dvidhāpi atthaṃ dassetuṃ “dasakasiṇānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:394_21: “Sabbāyapi appanāyā”ti jhānappanāya ca maggappanāya ca phalappanāya ca.
anya-e0401n:394_28: Tathāhi visuddhimagge vāyokasiṇa vidhāne caturaṅgulappamāṇaṃ sīsaṃ vātena pahariyamānaṃ disvāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:394_30: “Kataṃ vā”ti nīlādivaṇṇavisesarahitaṃ aruṇavaṇṇaṃ mattikakkhaṇḍaṃ udakena madditvā cakkamaṇḍalaṃ viya
anya-e0401n:394_33: “Akataṃ vā”ti katthaci bhūmibhāge kenaci akataṃ sayaṃ jātaṃ vā.
anya-e0401n:395_0: Buddhoti kittayantassa, kāye bhavati yā pīti;
anya-e0401n:397_1: Tattha jambudīpassa kasiṇato sāpītivarā evāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:397_3: Sakalassa jambudīpamaṇḍalassa issariyādhipatito pīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:397_5: “Saṇṭhāna paññattī”ti maṇḍalasaṇṭhānena upaṭṭhitā nimittapaññatti eva vuccati.
anya-e0401n:397_8: Candasūriyānaṃ aggissa ca obhāsena visiṭṭhāti samāso.
anya-e0401n:398_10: “Tadeva puna paccitvā”ti vinīlakasarīrameva puna kālātikkame paccitvā.
anya-e0401n:398_16: “Apakaḍḍhitvā”ti khaṇḍāni sarīrato mocetvā taṃ taṃ padesaṃ kaḍḍhitvā.
anya-e0401n:399_1: Guṇino dabbassa nāmena guṇānaṃ gahetabbattāti vuttaṃ “buddhaguṇassa anussati buddhānussatī”ti.
anya-e0401n:399_4: Vigatāni dussilyādi malāni ca maccherañca yassa taṃ vigatamalamaccheraṃ.
anya-e0401n:399_6: “Attanā adhigatanibbānañcā”ti etena ariyapuggalānaṃ kilesānaṃ accantavūpasamo vutto.
anya-e0401n:399_8: Hitūpasaṃhāro nāma ayaṃ puggalo avero hotu,
anya-e0401n:399_9: abyāpajjo hotūtiādinā averatādīni hitasukhāni tasmiṃ puggale cittena upasaṃharaṇaṃ. Karuṇā, muditā,
anya-e0401n:399_11: Hitūpasaṃhāro ca hitamodanā ca ahitāpanayanañcāti dvando.
anya-e0401n:399_15: Tattha paraṃ hitasukhasampannaṃ disvā tena parahitena attani pītipāmojjavaḍḍhanaṃ hitamodanā nāma.
anya-e0401n:399_16: Paraṃ dukkhitaṃ disvā ayaṃ imamhādukkhā muccatu,
anya-e0401n:399_17: mākilamatūti evaṃ cittena parasmiṃ ahitassa dukkhassa apanayanaṃ ahitāpanayanaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:399_21: Attanā katakammaṃ eva sakaṃ yesaṃ te kammassakā.
anya-e0401n:399_25: “Sīmasambhedo”ti attā ca piyapuggalo ca majjhattapuggalo ca veripuggalo cāti catasso sīmā.
anya-e0401n:399_30: sabbepurisātiādinā odhiso paricchedato pharaṇaṃ odhisopharaṇaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:399_33: sabbebhūtātiādinā anodhiso aparicchedato pharaṇaṃ anodhisopharaṇaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:399_34: Puratthimāyadisāya sabbesattā averāhontūtiādinā disāvibhāgavasena pharaṇaṃ disāpharaṇaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:399_35: “Taṃ samaṅgīno cā”ti tāhi appamaññāhi samaṅgīno puggalā.
anya-e0401n:399_37: Brahmasaddo vā seṭṭhapariyāyo ‘brahmaṃ puññaṃ pasavatī’tiādīsu viya.
anya-e0401n:399_47: Catubbidhopi hi āhāro bhājanesu vā hatthamukhādīsu vā yattha yattha sammakkheti, laggati, limpati.
anya-e0401n:399_50: Āsayato paṭikūlatā nāma tassa ajjhoharīyamānassa kaṇṭhādīsu ṭhitehi pittasemhādīhi āsayehi sammissanavasena paṭikūlatā.
anya-e0401n:399_53: Pakkato paṭikūlatā nāma tassa nidhānagatassa paripakkakāle gūthamuttādibhāvapattito paṭikūlatā.
anya-e0401n:399_54: Apakkato paṭikūlatā nāma tasmiṃ aparipakke ajiṇṇe sati sarīre nānāroguppattivasena paṭikūlatā.
anya-e0401n:399_55: Phalato paṭikūlatā nāma tassa paripakkakālato paṭṭhāya sarīre kesalomādīnaṃ paṭikūlarāsīnaṃ vaḍḍhanavasena paṭikūlatā.
anya-e0401n:399_56: Nissandato paṭikūlatā nāma tassa na vahidvārehi vā lomakūpehivā aññehi nānāvaṇamukhehi vā uggharaṇa paggharaṇādivasena paṭikūlatā.
anya-e0401n:399_58: “Nikantippahānasaññā”ti kantāramagge mātāpitūnaṃ kantāranittaraṇatthāya putta maṃsakhādane viya ati manuññepi
anya-e0401n:399_63: Tattha karaṇatthetāva “rāgena caratī”ti catūsu iriyāpathesu yebhūyyena rāgacittena carati.
anya-e0401n:399_65: Itthambhūta lakkhaṇe pana “rāgena caratī”ti tesu rāgaketu rāgadhajo hutvā vicaratīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:399_71: Muditā bhāvetabbā aratiyā pahānāyāti imaṃ pāḷisesaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0401n:399_74: Nissaraṇañhetaṃ aratiyā yadidaṃ muditā ceto vimuttīti evaṃ nissaraṇa bhāvavacanato ca.
anya-e0401n:399_77: “Dosa vatthuttābhāvato cā”ti dosuppattiyā vatthu bhāvassakaraṇa bhāvassa abhāvato ca.
anya-e0401n:399_78: Nīlādīni cattāri kasiṇāni dosa caritassāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:399_79: Kasmāpanettha dosa caritassa upekkhā sappāyakāraṇaṃ visuṃ na vuttanti.
anya-e0401n:399_86: Visuddhi magge pana evaṃ vuttaṃ natthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:399_90: Buddhivisayabhūtāni maraṇa upasamasaññā vavatthānānipi mohacaritassa sappāyāni siyunti vuttaṃ “evañhisatī”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:399_93: Evaṃsati vaṇṇakasiṇānaṃ puthulakhuddakatāpi ettha saṅgahitā hotīti.
anya-e0401n:399_98: Atha buddhicaritassa pana asappāyaṃ nāma natthīti aṭṭhakathāvacanena virujjheyyāti iminā adhippāyena “khuddakanti padeyujjatī”ti vuttaṃ. Athavā,
anya-e0401n:399_102: buddhicaritādīnaṃ pana puthulaṃpi khuddakaṃpi anuññātaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:399_105: Vitakka carite ca atisappāyatāya saddhābuddhi caritesūti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:400_1: Guṇānaṃ”ti ettha guṇasaddo pubbapadesu yojetabbo buddhaguṇānañca dhammaguṇānañcātiādinā.
anya-e0401n:400_7: Saṃvejaniyo dhammo yassāti saṃvejaniya dhammaṃ. Maraṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:400_14: Na te kadāci somanassena vinā appanaṃ pāpuṇanti.
anya-e0401n:400_15: Byāpādavihiṃsā aratīnaṃ dūribhāvena somanassuppattiyā atisukarattā pañcamajjhāne viya sukhasomanassānañca avikkhambhanato.
anya-e0401n:400_19: Nimittaṃ daḷhavibhūtaṃ katvā gahaṇaṃ daḷha vibhūtaggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:400_21: “Paṭibhāganimittaṃ”ti ettha paṭibhāgasaddo tassa dise pavattoti āha “tādise”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:400_22: “Taṃsaṇṭhāne”ti etena pathavimaṇḍalādīsu viya saṇṭhānākārena ṭhitesu sabhāva dhamma puñjesu eva tassadisaṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ nāma sijjhatīti dasseti.
anya-e0401n:400_25: “Uggahakosallaṃ”ti bhāvanākammaṃ ārabhitukāmena bhikkhunā ācariyassa santike sabbassa kammaṭṭhāna vidhānassa uggahaṇaṃ uggaho.
anya-e0401n:400_28: Sabbaṃ uggahituṃ asakkontena yaṃ attanā ārabhissati.
anya-e0401n:400_31: “Gahaṇaṃ”ti ca yathā citte avinassamānaṃ hutvā labbhati,
anya-e0401n:400_32: tathā katvā cittena gahaṇanti dassetuṃ “uparūparī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:400_35: Tasmiṃ nimittaggahaṇakamme yaṃ yaṃ kattabbavidhānaṃ atthi,
anya-e0401n:400_36: taṃ taṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā gahaṇanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:400_39: Uggaha nimitte saṇṭhānaṃ gaṇhantopi vaṇṇarūpādinā sabhāva dhammena saheva gaṇhāti.
anya-e0401n:400_40: Paṭibhāganimitte pana sabhāvadhammaṃ muñcitvā tassa disaṃ nimitta paññatti saṅkhātaṃ suddhasaṇṭhānameva gaṇhāti.
anya-e0401n:400_42: paṭibhāganimittepi vaṇṇo nāma sandissati yevāti. Saccaṃ.
anya-e0401n:400_47: “Pavesitaṃ”ti bhāvanācittassa abbhantare pakkhittaṃ viya hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:400_55: “Nimittarakkhaṇavidhānaṃ”ti samuppannassa nimittassa anassanatthāya sattavidhehi palibodha dhammehi rakkhaṇatthaṃ.
anya-e0401n:400_58: Visuddhi magge eva te vuttāti dassetuṃ gāthamāha.
anya-e0401n:400_85: “Vitakkādikaṃ oḷārikaṅgaṃ pahānāyā”ti ettha kassa balena pahānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:400_86: Taṃ taṃ virāga bhāvanā balena pahānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:400_87: Kāca taṃ taṃ virāgabhāvanā nāma hoti.
anya-e0401n:400_88: Ajjhāsaya visesa pariggahitā upacārabhāvanā evāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “pathamajjhānaṃ tāvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:400_89: “Ātāpavīriyaṃ”ti yenavīriyena yogino attānaṃ vā kilesa dhamme vā ātāpenti paritāpenti.
anya-e0401n:400_92: Taṃ ārabbha uparijhānantaruppattiyā bhāvanaṃ karontassapi punappunaṃ tameva pañcamajjhānaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0401n:400_93: Ārammaṇe ca anatikkante jhānaṃpi anatikkantameva hotīti.
anya-e0401n:400_101: upacāro ca sampajjatīti yojanā tikkhapaññānaṃ pana puthujjanānaṃpi sataṃ buddhaguṇādīsupi upacāra sambhavo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttoyeva.
anya-e0401n:400_104: Pubbedānaṃ datvā iminā puññena āyatiṃ jhānābhiññāyo vā maggaphalāni vā paṭilabhissāmīti patthanaṃ katvā āgatopi katādhikāro evātipi vadanti.
anya-e0401n:400_107: navavidhesu pañcakanayavasena vuttoti tesaṃ vādīnaṃ sādhakavacanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:400_109: Ākāsa kasiṇena vinā arūpajjhānāni labhitvā puna abhiññatthāya parikammekate ākāsakasiṇepi kattabbattā
anya-e0401n:400_110: tassa abhiññāpādakatā sambhavo vuttoti atthassa sambhavato.
anya-e0401n:400_111: Pubbe abhāvita bhāvanoti ca akatādhikāroti ca atthato ekaṃ.
anya-e0401n:400_113: “Tādisānaṃ”ti pubbe akatādhikārānaṃ abhāvitabhāvanānaṃ idāni iddhivikubbanaṃ karissāmīti ārabhantānaṃ abhiññākamme ādikammikakulaputtānanti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:400_115: Dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ savanaṃ karissāmītiādikaṃpi gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:400_117: Abhiññāsu vasipattānampi taṃ pañcamajjhānaṃ chasuārammaṇesu yathārahaṃ appetiyeva.
anya-e0401n:400_118: “Adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ”ti yathicchita nipphattatthāya sataṃ hotu sahassaṃ hotūtiādinā cittena abhividhātabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:400_121: sahassaṃ homīti vā”ti attānaṃ sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā nimminanavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:400_130: Duvidhaṃhi adhiṭṭhānaṃ parikammena adhiṭṭhānaṃ abhiññāya adhiṭṭhānanti.
anya-e0401n:400_137: “Sesābhiññāsupi yathārahaṃ vattabbo”ti dibbasotaparikamme tenevaparikamma samādhiññāṇasotena āsanne dibbavisayaṃpi saddaṃ suṇātītiādinā vattabbo.
anya-e0401n:400_140: “Idha nagahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ”ti therassa matena daṭṭhabbanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:400_141: Idha pana ādikammikavidhānappadhānattā pacchimaṃpi pādakajjhāna samāpajjanaṃ vattabbamevāti.
anya-e0401n:400_142: “Kāyagatikaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā”ti ayaṃ kāyo viya idaṃ cittaṃpi dandhagamanaṃ hotūti evaṃ cittaṃ kāyagatikaṃ karaṇena adhiṭṭhahitvā.
anya-e0401n:400_143: “Dissamānena kāyenā”ti dandhagamanena gacchantattā bahujanānampi dissamānena rūpakāyena.
anya-e0401n:400_147: Itaraṃ pana hadaya vatthurūpaṃ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:400_148: Paracitta vijānanaṭṭhāne aṭṭhakathāṭīkācariyānaṃ vicāraṇā atthīti taṃ dassetuṃ “ettha ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tāvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:400_157: “Itarathā”ti aññathā santati addhāvasena vuttanti gahite sati.
anya-e0401n:400_168: Atīte parinibbutānaṃ maggaphalāni anussaraṇakāle tesaṃ ārammaṇabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃpi anussaratiyeva.
anya-e0401n:400_169: Tattha tesaṃ maggaphalānaṃ atītattā nibbānaṃpi pubbenivutthaṃ nāma hotīti.
anya-e0401n:401_0: “Yaṃ yaṃ adhiṭṭhātī”ti yaṃ yaṃ satādikaṃ saṃvidhāti.
anya-e0401n:401_1: “Yathā yathā adhiṭṭhātī”ti yena yena āvibhāvādikena pakārena saṃvidhāti.
anya-e0401n:401_5: “Ārammaṇa sampaṭicchana samatthaṃ”ti ārammaṇassa upaṭṭhānaṃ sampaṭicchana samatthaṃ.
anya-e0401n:401_12: Anāgate sattadivasato orimā cittacetasika dhammā cetopariyaññāṇassa visayoti katvā anāgate sattadivasatoti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:401_14: Imasmiṃ divase ca anāgatapakkhe sabbaṃpi ārammaṇaṃ pakatiñāṇassa visayoti katvā “dutīyadivasato paṭṭhāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:401_16: “Yathā cetaṃ”ti yathā ca etaṃ imasmiṃ bhave anāgata dhamme jānāti.
anya-e0401n:403_4: Sattanimittañhi paññatti dhammattā khaṇekhaṇe khayavayabhedābhāvato so evagacchati so eva tiṭṭhatītiādinā niccākārasaṇṭhitaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0401n:403_8: “Sukhanimittaṃ”ti khaṇekhaṇe khayavayabheda dukkhānaṃ abhāvato sukhito niddukkho nibbhayotiādinā sukhākārasaṇṭhitaṃ sattanimittameva.
anya-e0401n:403_10: ṭhātuṃ icchanto tiṭṭhatītiādinā vasavattanākāra saṇṭhitaṃ sattanimittameva.
anya-e0401n:404_3: Tattha niccasīlameva uparijhānādivisesānaṃ adhiṭṭhāna kiccasādhakattā idha adhippetanti vuttaṃ “niccasīlamevā”ti.
anya-e0401n:404_15: “Soḷasavidhaṃ kaṅkhaṃ”ti ahosiṃ nu kho aha matītamaddhānantiādinā suttanteāgataṃ soḷasavidhaṃ vicikicchaṃ.
anya-e0401n:404_16: “Aṭṭhavidhaṃ vā kaṅkhaṃ”ti sattharikaṅkhatītiādinā abhidhamme āgataṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ vicikicchaṃ.
anya-e0401n:404_17: Visamahetudiṭṭhi nāma sattānaṃ uppattiyā akāraṇameva kāraṇaṃ katvā gahaṇadiṭṭhi.
anya-e0401n:404_27: ñāṇanti vutte siddhe katvā dassanasaddena saha ñāṇadassananti vuttanti āha “etthacā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:404_29: Tattha yathāsutassa pāḷidhammassa atthamattajānanaṃ sutamayaññāṇaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:404_30: Atthaṃ ñatvā atthānurūpassa sabhāvalakkhaṇassa cintanāvasena uppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ cintāmayaññāṇaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:404_34: Ettha ca dasasu vipassanāñāṇesupi vipassanā vacanena paccakkhadassanameva adhippetanti katvā sabbatthaggahaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:404_37: Yato cakkhunā passantasseva suṭṭhu paccakkhato dassanatthāya punappunaṃ bhāvanā kammaṃ nāma tattha icchitabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:405_2: Aniccānaṃ vā saṅkhata dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇanti aniccalakkhaṇantipi yujjati.
anya-e0401n:405_3: “Abhiṇhasampaṭippīḷanākāro”ti yathā sīghasotāyaṃ nadiyaṃ nāvāya uddhaṃ gacchantaṃ sānāvā abhisaṅkharaṇadukkhena abhiṇhaṃ suṭṭhu paṭippīḷeti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:405_7: Evamevaṃ sīghasote saṃsāre attabhāvena uddhaṃ khaṇato khaṇaṃ divasato divasaṃ gacchantaṃ puggalaṃ ayaṃ
anya-e0401n:405_8: attabhāvo abhisaṅkharaṇa dukkhena abhiṇhaṃ suṭṭhu paṭippīḷeti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:405_15: Ettha ca saṃsārassa sīghasotatā nāma attabhāvapariyāpannānaṃ nāma rūpadhammānaṃ pavattinivatti sīghatā vuccati.
anya-e0401n:405_16: Ettha ca maraṇaṃ duvidhaṃ sammuti maraṇañca paramattha maraṇañca.
anya-e0401n:405_17: Tattha sammuti maraṇaṃ nāma sammuti saccabhūtassa sattassa maraṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:405_19: Paramattha maraṇaṃ nāma paramattha saccabhūtānaṃ nāmarūpa dhammānaṃ maraṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:405_23: Imasmiṃ vipassanā kamme idaṃ paramattha maraṇaṃ eva aniccatāti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n:405_24: Dhammānaṃ susānakkhettanti ca susānabhūmīti ca vuccatīti.
anya-e0401n:405_25: Sā ca susānabhūmināma sattānaṃ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya santānaṃ anubandhatiyeva.
anya-e0401n:405_26: Anubandhattā ca sattānaṃ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya so nāma samayo natthi,
anya-e0401n:405_29: Tesaṃ sabbiriyāpathesu jīvitassa ca aṅgapaccaṅgānañca kāyavacīmano kammānañca sambādhapattito.
anya-e0401n:405_30: Avasavattanākāro pana abhisaṅkhāra dukkhaṃ abhiṇhaṃ paccanubhavantānaṃ pākaṭoyeva.
anya-e0401n:405_34: Lokasmiñhi sabbaṃpi abhisaṅkhāra kiccaṃ nāma antamaso assāsanapassāsana kiccaṃ upādāya dhammānaṃ vasavattanābhāvato karontīti.
anya-e0401n:406_6: Vipassanā kammaṃ patvā khaṇikavasena ekekadhammavibhāgavasena ca anupassanā kiccaṃ natthīti āha “samūha santativasena panā”ti.
anya-e0401n:406_7: Ekekadhammavibhāgavasena anupassanāpi pana pakatiyā supākaṭesu cittavedanādīsu icchitabbāyeva.
anya-e0401n:406_8: “Aniccatāya paramākoṭī”ti tato uttari aniccatā nāma natthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:406_9: Dhammānaṃ tathā tathā bhāyitabbappakāro nāma pañcakkhandhe ‘aniccato, dukkhato, rogato, gaṇḍato, sallato, aghato, ābādhato,
anya-e0401n:406_12: Etena apāyadukkha saṃsāra dukkhabhīrukehi janehi bhāyitabbanti bhayaṃ.
anya-e0401n:406_14: Bhayassa samanu passanāñāṇaṃ bhayañāṇanti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0401n:406_20: “Cattālīsāya ākārehī”ti pañcakkhandhe ‘aniccato, dukkhato, rogato, gaṇḍato, sallato, aghato, ābādhato, parato, palokato, ītito,.
anya-e0401n:406_43: passanto suññato lokaṃ avekkhatīti evaṃ mahāniddese moghapañhaniddese āgatehi cattālīsāya ākārehi.
anya-e0401n:406_46: Sabbepi pañcakkhandhā aniccā evāti passantoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:406_47: Kathaṃ pana aniccato passanto suññato lokaṃ avekkhatīti.
anya-e0401n:406_48: Niccaguṇa suññatāya suññato pañcakkhandhabhūtaṃ lokaṃ avekkhati.
anya-e0401n:406_50: Tattha “aniccā evā”ti paṭisandhikkhaṇato paṭṭhāya yadākadāci maraṇa dhammattā aniccā eva.
anya-e0401n:406_56: Yehi keci loke cakkhu rogādikā anekasahassā rogā nāma sandissanti.
anya-e0401n:406_59: Tasmā te ekantena rogajātikā evāti. Api ca,
anya-e0401n:406_60: dukkhasacca dhammattātīhi dukkhatāhi catūhi dukkhaṭṭhehi ca abhiṇhasampaṭippīḷanato rujjanaṭṭhena rogā eva.
anya-e0401n:406_61: Tattha “tīhi dukkhatāhī”ti dukkhadukkhatā saṅkhāra dukkhatā vipariṇāma dukkhatāti imāhi tīhidukkhatāhi.
anya-e0401n:406_69: Sallaṃ nāma vijjhanaṭṭhena kilesa sallañca dukkhasallañca.
anya-e0401n:406_71: Ime ca khandhā vipattipariyosānattā niratthakā eva honti.
anya-e0401n:406_76: eso me attāti evaṃ vissāsaṃ arahanti.
anya-e0401n:406_77: Tathā vissāsaṃ karontassa nānādukkhehi niccaṃ vihiṃsanato.
anya-e0401n:406_78: Paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya yadākadāci palujjanadhammattā palokadhammā eva.
anya-e0401n:406_80: Khandhā antarāya jātikā evāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:406_81: Ajjhattabhāvaṃ upagantvā dutattā vibādhakattā upaddavā eva.
anya-e0401n:406_83: Anattā eva samānā ajjhattabhāvaṃ upagantvā sajjanato lagganato dummo cayato upasaggā eva.
anya-e0401n:406_87: Jarāmaraṇādito apāyavinipatanādito bhayato tāyati rakkhatīti tāṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:406_88: Te ca khandhā kassacitāṇā na honti.
anya-e0401n:406_91: Bhayato bhīrukā janā līyanti nilīyanti etthāti leṇaṃ.
anya-e0401n:406_99: Niccatādīhi sabbehi sobhaṇaguṇehi sabbaso rahitattā tucchattā suññattārittā eva.
anya-e0401n:406_102: Attā vuccati yassakassaci koci sārabhūto paṭissaraṇo.
anya-e0401n:406_106: Aniccatādīhi ādīnavehi dosehi sampuṇṇattā ādīnavā eva.
anya-e0401n:406_110: Te sayaṃ maraṇa dhammasamaṅgīno hutvā tena maraṇasatthena maraṇāvudhena saṃsāre sattānaṃ niccaṃ mārakattā jīvitindriyupacchedakattā vadhakā eva.
anya-e0401n:406_115: Anicchantasseva sato cakkhurogādibhāvena apāyabhavādibhāvena jātasabhāvattā jātidhammā eva.
anya-e0401n:406_116: Anicchantasseva sato hāyanamaraṇasabhāvattā jarāmaraṇa dhammā eva.
anya-e0401n:406_117: Sokādīnaṃ vatthubhāvena dhāraṇattā sokādi dhammā eva.
anya-e0401n:406_118: Taṇhā saṃkilesa diṭṭhisaṃkilesa duccarita saṃkilesehi niyuttattā saṃkilesika dhammā evāti.
anya-e0401n:407_0: Loke attajīvā nāma sattānaṃ ajjhatta dhammesu sāradhammā honti.
anya-e0401n:407_1: Tesu vigatesu sesadhammā nissatta nijjīvabhāvaṃ patvā pheggubhūtā kacavarabhūtāti lokassa abhimāno.
anya-e0401n:407_2: Te ca attajīvā nāma sabbaso natthīti diṭṭhe khandhesu kacavarabhāvadassanaṃ attajīva suññatā dassanaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:407_5: “Nimittānī”ti vipallāsadhammehi nimmitāni niccanimitta sukhanimitta attanimitta jīvanimittāni.
anya-e0401n:407_6: Satta puggala itthi purisa hattha pāda sīsa gīvādīni nimittāni ca.
anya-e0401n:407_7: Tattha saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇika dhammattā aniccānaṃyeva sataṃ santati ghanena paṭicchannattā hiyyopi so eva,
anya-e0401n:407_8: ajjapi so evātiādinā niccākārena upaṭṭhānaṃ niccanimittaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:407_9: Kilesamalehi pariggahitattā asubhānaṃyeva sataṃ avijjāya paṭicchannattā idaṃ iṭṭhaṃ, kantaṃ, manāpaṃ, piyarūpa,
anya-e0401n:407_11: Bhayaṭṭhena akhemaṭṭhena dukkhānaṃpi sataṃ tāyeva paṭicchannattā idaṃ sukhaṃ,
anya-e0401n:407_14: Paccayā yattavuttikattā paccayena vinā kevalaṃ attano vasāyattavuttitā bhāvato anattānaṃyeva sataṃ attano icchāvasena karoti, katheti, cinteti,
anya-e0401n:407_20: saṃvaccharaṃpi jīvatītiādinā jīvākārena upaṭṭhānaṃ jīvanimittaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:407_21: Nanu cettha attano icchāvasena karotītiādīsu icchānāma taṇhāvāchando vā.
anya-e0401n:407_24: Evañcasati tesaṃ cittavasena pavattattā attano icchāvasena karotīti idaṃ abhidhammaviruddhaṃ na hotīti.
anya-e0401n:407_31: Idha pana tasmiṃ samaye pavattaṃ khandhapañcakameva attāti ca kattāti ca gahetvā attanoti ca karotīti ca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:407_34: Sabhāvato vijjamānāni na hontīti dassanañāṇena vinicchayaṃ pāpetvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:408_0: “Taṃ taṃ ghanavinibbhujjanavasenā”ti samūhasantati ghanādīnaṃ bhindana chindanavasena.
anya-e0401n:408_3: Jīvadiṭṭhi ca nāma sukhumatarā attadiṭṭhi eva vuccati.
anya-e0401n:408_4: Maggakkhaṇaṃ patvā eva tadubhayaṃpi sabbaso samucchindatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:409_16: iriyā patha sannissitañcāti imehi tividhehi kuhanavatthūhi.
anya-e0401n:409_25: Taṃ taṃ payojana mariyādo nāma cīvarapaccaye tāva sītappaṭighātādiko payojanamariyādo.
anya-e0401n:409_26: “Mariyādo”ti ca yāvadevāti padena dassito sītappaṭighātādiko cīvarappayojana paricchedo.
anya-e0401n:409_27: So ca cīvarapaccaye sammohādike sāvajjapakkhe apatanatthāya ṭhapito.
anya-e0401n:409_28: Tena vuttaṃ “sammohassa gedhassa madassa pamādassa pahānatthaṃ”ti.
anya-e0401n:409_31: Idha bhikkhu cīvaraṃ paṭisevati yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāya uṇhassa paṭighātāyātiādīsu yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāya paṭisevati.
anya-e0401n:409_32: Na tato uttari sammohatthāya gedhatthāya madatthāya pamādatthāya paṭisevatītiādi.
anya-e0401n:410_5: Pajjati gacchati pavattati phalaṃ etenāti padaṃ.
anya-e0401n:410_10: Diṭṭhivippayuttā pana saññā citta vipallāsā vikkhambhituṃ sakkotīti na vattabbā.
anya-e0401n:410_11: “Sāsana dhamme”ti anattalakkhaṇa suttantādike suññata dhammappaṭisaṃyutte desanādhamme.
anya-e0401n:410_12: “Diṭṭhivipallāso vikkhambhito”ti tādisaṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā desake satthari ca desite dhamme ca saddhaṃ paṭilabhitvā saccameva bhagavā āha,
anya-e0401n:410_17: Tato paṭṭhāya eso me attāti vadantopi diṭṭhisampayuttacittena na vadati.
anya-e0401n:410_21: Taṃ pana dhammavavatthānaññāṇe siddhe eva sijjhatītipi vadanti.
anya-e0401n:410_22: Catunnaṃ āhārānaṃ vasena catudhā nāmarūpaṃ pariggahetabbameva. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:410_23: cattāro āhāre pariggahetvā tesveva lakkhaṇattayaṃ samanupassantassa ante lokuttaraññāṇadassanappaṭilābhakiccassa siddhattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:410_26: visuṃ visuṃ lakkhaṇa rasādīhi pariggahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā.
anya-e0401n:410_27: Pariggahaṇe sakkontassapi vipassanā kamme visuṃ visuṃ passituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā ca.
anya-e0401n:410_34: Suddhe nāme eva vā rūpe eva vā īhābyāpārānaṃ abhāvadassanatoti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:410_38: tiādi vohārassa sabbhāvato tassa atthabhūto sattapuggalādikopi sabhāvato atthiyeva.
anya-e0401n:410_39: No natthīti evaṃ daḷhaṃ hadaye sannidhānakaraṇa vasena.
anya-e0401n:410_40: “Atidhāvanañcā”ti vohāra paññattimatte aṭṭhatvā taṃ atikkamitvā pañcakkhandhe sattādibhāvena gahaṇañcāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:411_9: Ekassa sattassa anamatagge saṃsāre saṃsarantassa rūpakāyopi atthi nāmakāyopi atthi.
anya-e0401n:411_11: Dve ca kāyā pañcavokāre saṃsarantassa ekato pavattanti.
anya-e0401n:411_13: So eva tattha ekosattoti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0401n:411_14: Arūpe saṃsarantassa nāma kāyo eva pavattati.
anya-e0401n:411_15: So eva tattha eko sattoti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0401n:411_17: Tesu ca kāyesu rūpakāye cuti paṭisandhīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ anantara paccayatā nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n:411_18: Ekamekasmiṃ bhave ekameko hutvā cutikāle bhijjati.
anya-e0401n:411_20: Paṭisandhirūpena saha paccaya paccayuppannatā pabandho nappavattati.
anya-e0401n:411_21: Nāma kāye pana cuti paṭisandhīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ anantarapaccayatā atthi.
anya-e0401n:411_23: Paṭisandhi nāmena saha paccaya paccayuppannatā pabandho pavattatiyeva.
anya-e0401n:411_24: Tattha paṭiccasamuppāda kusalo bhikkhu paṭiccasamuppādaññāṇe ṭhatvā ekasmiṃbhave ekassa sattassa pavattiṃ passanto sattaṃ nāma na passati.
anya-e0401n:411_28: Ahaṃ atītesu bhavesu ahosintipi na passati.
anya-e0401n:411_31: Atha kho avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā pavattanti.
anya-e0401n:411_32: Saṅkhāra paccayā bhavantare viññāṇaṃ pavattatītiādinā nayena nāmarūpa dhammānaṃ hetuphala paramparāvasena avicchedappavattimeva passati.
anya-e0401n:411_34: anamataggesaṃsāre anantesu bhavesu tassa sattassa pavatti diṭṭhā eva hoti tatthapi evameva,
anya-e0401n:411_36: Tadā tassa soḷasavidhā kaṅkhā pahīyatīti imamatthaṃ “dassento anamatagge saṃsāre”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:411_42: Kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhānanti evaṃ pubbante pañcavidhā kaṅkhāvuttā.
anya-e0401n:411_47: Kiṃ hutvā kiṃ bhavissāmi nu kho ahaṃ anāgatamaddhānanti evaṃ aparante pañcavidhā kaṅkhā vuttā.
anya-e0401n:411_52: Ahaṃ nu kho satto kuto āgato.
anya-e0401n:411_53: So kuhiṃ gāmī bhavissāmīti evaṃ paccuppanne chabbidhā kaṅkhā vuttā.
anya-e0401n:411_56: na nu kho ahosinti iminā padadvayena atītakāle attano atthi natthibhāve kaṅkhati.
anya-e0401n:411_61: Ahetu apaccayā vā animmito vā sayaṃjāto ahosinti attho.
anya-e0401n:411_69: Atha tesu apādakādīsu aññataro ahaṃ ahosiṃ.
anya-e0401n:411_71: Pathamabhave kiṃ hutvā dutīya bhavādīsu kiṃ ahosinti idaṃ bhavaparamparāvasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:411_74: no nu kho smī”ti yathā khuddakavatthu vibhaṅge aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritesu.
anya-e0401n:411_78: “Sītasmī”ti ahaṃ ucchinnovā bhavāmīti attho. Yathā ca.
anya-e0401n:411_85: Tathā idhāpi ahaṃ nu kho smi.
anya-e0401n:411_87: Tattha “ahaṃ nu khosmī”ti ayaṃ ahaṃ nāma bhavābhavesu niccakālaṃ asmi nu kho,
anya-e0401n:411_88: mama attānāma sassato hutvā sabbakālaṃ atthi nu khoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:411_89: “No nu kho smī”ti tathā no asmi nu kho.
anya-e0401n:411_90: Mama attā tathā natthi nu khoti attho.
anya-e0401n:411_91: Ettha ca “bhavābhavesū”ti pavattepi paccuppanne vattamānaṃ attānaṃ gahetvā pavattā paccuppanne saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:411_92: “Kiṃ nu kho smī”ti ahaṃ nāma santo jāto kiṃ nu kho asmi.
anya-e0401n:411_93: Kenaci hetunā paccayena vā asmi nu kho.
anya-e0401n:411_94: Kenaci iddhimantena vā nimmito bhavāmi nu kho.
anya-e0401n:411_95: Udāhu ahetu apaccayā vā kenaci animmito vā sayaṃ nu kho bhavāmi nu khoti attho.
anya-e0401n:411_96: “Kathaṃ nu kho smī”ti ettha pana apadādīhi ayojetvā ahaṃ nu kho kiṃ gotto bhavāmi.
anya-e0401n:411_97: Gotamagotto vā vāseṭṭha gotto vā tiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:411_98: Ādi kappakāle tāni gottāni etarahi sambhedaṃ gacchanti.
anya-e0401n:411_100: “Ahaṃ kuto āgato”ti ahaṃ atīte kutobhavato āgato asmi.
anya-e0401n:411_101: “Sokuhiṃgāmī bhavissāmī”ti so ahaṃ āyatiṃ bhave kuhiṃ gāmiko bhavissāmīti kaṅkhati.
anya-e0401n:411_102: “Kaṅkhāya atikkamo”ti so bhikkhu paṭiccasamuppāde avijjādikaṃ atītahetu pañcakaṃ passanto tasmiṃbhave sabbaṃpi paṭiccasamuppādaṃ passatiyeva.
anya-e0401n:411_103: Evaṃ passanto na tattha ahaṃ nāma koci atthi,
anya-e0401n:411_104: yaṃ paṭicca atīta visayā pañcavidhā kaṅkhā uppajjati.
anya-e0401n:411_105: Dhamma mattameva tattha atthīti evaṃ atīte kaṅkhā vatthussa abhāvadassanena pañcavidhāya kaṅkhāya atikkamo hoti.
anya-e0401n:411_106: Nanu tathā passantassapi kathaṃ nu kho smi,
anya-e0401n:411_107: kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosiṃ nu khoti ayaṃ kaṅkhā atthiyeva.
anya-e0401n:411_108: Tathā passantopi hi vinā pubbenivāsaññāṇena atīte bhave ahaṃ dvipādako ahosintivā catuppādako ahosinti
anya-e0401n:411_109: vā tato cuto asukabhave uppannoti vā na jānāti na passatīti. Vuccate.
anya-e0401n:411_110: Sā pana kaṅkhā dhamma mattappavatti dassanato paṭṭhāya antarāyika kaṅkhā na hoti.
anya-e0401n:411_113: Tathā anāgate phalapañcakaṃ passanto aparante pañcavidhaṃ kaṅkhaṃ atikkamati.
anya-e0401n:411_114: Paccuppanne phalapañcakañca hetupañcakañca passanto paccuppanne kaṅkhā chakkaṃ atikkamati.
anya-e0401n:411_116: Aṭṭhavidhāya kaṅkhāya atikkamane pana paṭiccasamuppādaṃ anulomappaṭilomaṃ passanto desanā dhamme ca lokuttara dhammesu ca kaṅkhaṃ atikkamati.
anya-e0401n:411_117: Dhamme kaṅkhātikkamanena saheva desente satthari ca,
anya-e0401n:411_123: paṭiccasamuppādena saha paṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu ca sabbaṃ kaṅkhaṃ atikkamatiyeva.
anya-e0401n:411_125: Tattha “sabhāvadhammappavattiyā cā”ti paccayaparamparāvasena sabhāvadhammānaṃ paramparappavattiyā ca.
anya-e0401n:411_126: Dhammasu dhammatā nāma desanā dhammassa svākkhātatādibhāvena sundara dhammatā.
anya-e0401n:411_128: Buddhasubuddhatā nāma taṃ dhammaṃ desentassa buddhassa sabbaññubuddhatā.
anya-e0401n:412_0: Pariyuṭṭhitānaṃ diṭṭhivicikicchānaṃ vikkhambhanaṃ nāma heṭṭhā dhammavavatthāna vasena paccayapariggahavasena ca sijjhati.
anya-e0401n:412_1: Vipassanā kammaṃ pana anusayabhūtānaṃ diṭṭhivicikicchānaṃ sallikhanatthāya karīyatīti vuttaṃ “anusaya samūhananatthañcā”tiādi.
anya-e0401n:412_5: “Yaṃ dūre santikevā”ti yaṃ dūre pavattaṃ rūpaṃ vā,
anya-e0401n:412_8: “Ñāṇena daḷhaṃ gahetvā”ti dhammavavatthānaññāṇena suṭṭhuvibhūtaṃ katvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:412_11: Puna daḷhaṃ gahitassa rūpassa aniccalakkhaṇaṃ dassetuṃ “sā ca kriyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:412_17: Visuṃ visunti vuttattā tāsaṃ aññamaññañca sahajātesu gahaṇaṃ sambhavatīti vuttaṃ “āpādīnaṃ”ti.
anya-e0401n:412_20: “Tathā tathā kappetvā”ti rūpadhammānaṃ santati parivatti nāma abhikkamantassa evaṃ bhaveyya,
anya-e0401n:412_23: “Sesakhandhesupi taṃ taṃ santati nānattaṃ”ti vedanākkhandhe tāva kāye kāyikasukhasantati dukkhasantatīnaṃ nānattaṃ.
anya-e0401n:412_27: Yadā citte somanassa domanassāni na sandissanti,
anya-e0401n:412_28: tadā idāni upekkhā me vedanā pavattatīti vā,
anya-e0401n:412_30: tadā sā nirujjhatīti vā evaṃ takketvā sammasitabbāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:412_36: kusalā kusalaviññāṇādīnañca vasena santati nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:412_37: Vissāsaṃ karotīti vatvā tadatthaṃ vivarati “etaṃ me”tiādinā.
anya-e0401n:412_51: Vase sabbaso vattanto nāma kevalaṃ vasāyattavuttiko eva siyā,
anya-e0401n:412_54: “Tathāpariggahetabbo”ti eso me attāti evaṃ paramajjhattabhāvena pariggahetabbo.
anya-e0401n:412_55: Tathā hi yo attano vasena vattati,
anya-e0401n:412_58: tasmiṃ rūpādike dhamme attānaṃ sāmikaṃ katvā eso mama attāti pariggaho nāma micchā eva.
anya-e0401n:412_59: Tathā yo ca khaṇika dhammo hoti,
anya-e0401n:412_61: taṃ rūpādikaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ attano sāraṃ katvā tathā pariggahopi micchā eva.
anya-e0401n:412_62: Ettha ca “micchā evā”ti paramattha saccaṃ patvā micchā eva.
anya-e0401n:412_64: “Sukhaṃ viddhaṃsetī”ti kāyikasukhañca cetasika sukhañca viddhaṃseti. Vināseti.
anya-e0401n:412_65: “Nānādukkhaṃ janetī”ti kāyikadukkhañca cetasika dukkhañca janeti uppādeti.
anya-e0401n:412_67: Manussattabhāve ṭhitānaṃ sattānaṃ yathāpavattaṃ manussa sukhaṃ viddhaṃseti,
anya-e0401n:412_70: Sayaṃ apāyattabhāvaṃ gahetvā tesaṃ nānāapāya dukkhaṃ janeti.
anya-e0401n:412_71: Tathā devattabhāve sakkattabhāve brahmattabhāve ṭhitānantiādinā vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:412_72: Tathā manussattabhāve ṭhitānaṃ nānāvipariṇāma kiccehi yathāpavattaṃ sukhaṃ viddhaṃseti,
anya-e0401n:412_75: “Sāronāma thāmabalaviseso vuccatī”ti etena thāmabalavisesena sampannaṃ vatthuṃpi saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0401n:412_77: na sārakaṃ asārakanti imamatthaṃ sandhāya “rūpaṃ pana sayaṃpi evarūpo sāro na hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:412_78: Sattānaṃ attasāro jīvasāro na hotīti attho.
anya-e0401n:412_79: Natthi sāro etassāti asārakanti imamatthaṃ sandhāya “na ca evarūpena sārena yuttaṃ”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:412_81: Tattha purimo attho rūpaṃ attato samanupassatīti idaṃ sandhāya vutto.
anya-e0401n:412_84: rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃti imāni sandhāya vutto.
anya-e0401n:412_88: natthi attā etassāti vā anattāti ca dvidhā attho sijjhati.
anya-e0401n:412_91: Etena anattabhāve siddhe dukkhabhāvopi siddhoti dasseti.
anya-e0401n:412_92: “Tiṇṇaṃ vayānaṃ vasena addhābhedo yojetabbo”ti pathamavaye pavattaṃ rūpaṃ dutīyavayaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
anya-e0401n:412_93: pathamavaye eva nirujjhatītiādinā addhāpaccuppanne antogadhabhedo yojetabbo.
anya-e0401n:412_94: “Sabhāgekasantānavasenā”ti sabhāgānaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāgaṭṭhena ekībhūtā santati sabhāgekasantati.
anya-e0401n:412_95: “Sabhāgānaṃ dhammānaṃ”ti ca cittajesutāva nirantarappavattena lobhasampayuttacittena sahajātā rūpadhammā sabhāgarūpadhammā nāma.
anya-e0401n:412_98: Utujesu nirantarappavattena sītautunā samuṭṭhitā rūpadhammā sabhāgarūpa dhammā nāma.
anya-e0401n:412_103: Evañca katvā heṭṭhā aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenāti pade catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ santati vibhāganayo suṭṭhu dassitoti.
anya-e0401n:412_104: “Aniccalakkhaṇa dassanameva padhānaṃ”ti imasmiṃ ñāṇepi udayabbayaññāṇepi bhaṅgaññāṇepi aniccalakkhaṇa dassanameva padhānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:412_105: Bhayaññāṇe ca ādīnavaññāṇe ca nibbidāñāṇe ca dukkhalakkhaṇa dassanaṃ padhānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:412_106: Upari catūsu ñāṇesu anattalakkhaṇa dassanaṃ padhānanti.
anya-e0401n:412_111: Appahīna vasenāti pāḷipade pana avijjā taṇhā diṭṭhānusayānaṃ appahīnaṭṭhena santāne vijjamānatā eva pamāṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:412_121: Tasmiṃ bhave nirodho nāma bhavantare puna anuppādo yevāti vuttaṃ “bhavantare”tiādi.
anya-e0401n:412_122: “Taṃ santatiyaṃ”ti tasmiṃ paccuppanna bhaveti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:412_123: “Puna anuppādasaṅkhātaṃ nirodhaṃ”ti santati nirodho nāma vutto.
anya-e0401n:412_127: Idāni yathāpavatta santatīsu pariyāpannānaṃ sabbapacchimānaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ khaṇikanirodhavasena atthaṃ
anya-e0401n:412_128: vadanto “yathāpavatta santatiyo vā chijjanti bhijjantī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:412_129: “Udayabbayaṃ samanupassantassa cā”ti ettha katamo udayo nāma,
anya-e0401n:412_131: kathañca tadubhayaṃ samanupassatīti āha “udayabbayaṃ passantassāti ettha yathā nāmā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:412_134: Antara dhāyati.“Udayo”ti uppādo ceva vaḍḍhi ca.
anya-e0401n:413_0: Bojjhaṅga dhammehi sampannattā ārādheti attano cittaṃti āraddho.
anya-e0401n:413_4: Duvidhohi vipassako taruṇa vipassako ca āraddha vipassako ca.
anya-e0401n:413_5: Tattha khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ suṭṭhu apassanto dubbalavipassako taruṇa vipassako nāma.
anya-e0401n:413_6: Khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ suṭṭhu passanto vipassanā kamme ārādhita citto balavavipassako āraddhavipassako nāma.
anya-e0401n:416_0: Amānusī ratī hoti, samma dhammaṃ vipassato,ti ca.
anya-e0401n:419_0: Ekāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo, passato udayabbayaṃ,ti ca.
anya-e0401n:420_3: Paribandhanti nīvārentīti paribandhakāti heṭṭhā vuttameva antarāyika dhammānaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0401n:420_11: Vipassanā kamme okappanākārappavattā saddhāeva adhimuccanaṭṭhena adhimokkho saddhādhimokkho.
anya-e0401n:420_17: “Tatramajjhattupekkhā”ti cittassa līnuddhaccādīhi visamantehi vimuttā tatramajjhattatāsaṅkhātā upekkhā.
anya-e0401n:420_21: “Sukhumā taṇhā”ti kusalehi missakattā idaṃ akusalantipi jānituṃ asakkuṇeyyā sukhumataṇhā.
anya-e0401n:420_32: na ciraṃ pavattituṃ dassāmīti imamatthaṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0401n:420_35: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ nikanti vikkhambhanassa visuṃ vuttattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:420_36: Vipassanāparipāko nāma visesantarappavattena pākaṭoti dassetuṃ “saṅkhārupekkhābhāvaṃ pattā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n:420_42: Yadi evaṃ gotrabhupi vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma siyāti. Na siyā.
anya-e0401n:420_46: “Taṃ samaṅgīpuggalaṃ vā”ti tena maggena samaṅgīpuggalaṃ vā.
anya-e0401n:420_48: aṭṭhama bhavato paṭṭhāya kāmasugati vaṭṭappavattato vā.
anya-e0401n:420_49: Avassaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ gameti sampāpetīti vuṭṭhānagāminīti vacanattho.
anya-e0401n:420_50: “Avassaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ gacchantī”ti idha ṭhitānaṃ vuṭṭhānato nivatti nāma natthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:420_52: Sabbaññu bodhisattā pana pubbabuddhānaṃ sāsane pabbajitvā vipassanā kammaṃ ārabhantā anulomaññāṇaṃ āhacca ṭhapentīti aṭṭhaka thāsu vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:420_53: Tattha “āhaccā”ti idaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇassa matthakapattidassanatthaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:420_54: “Āvajjanaṭṭhāniyaṃ”ti tato pubbabhāge kenaci cittena aggahite nibbānā rammaṇe āvajjanaṭṭhāniyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:420_57: Gottaṃ vā abhisambhuṇāti pāpuṇātīti gotrabhūti vacanattho.
anya-e0401n:420_58: Kathaṃ pana gotrabhu cittaṃ gotrabhuññāṇaṃ puthujjanagottaṃ chindati,
anya-e0401n:420_61: Attani pana chinnattā sayaṃ chindati nāma.
anya-e0401n:420_62: Nibbānassa ca ariyagocarattā taṃ ārammaṇa karaṇavasena ariyagottaṃ pāpuṇāti nāmāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:420_68: Na te dhamme ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena jānanaṃ.
anya-e0401n:420_69: Kathaṃ te dhamme ārammaṇaṃ akaronto maggo te dhamme parijānāti nāmāti.
anya-e0401n:420_71: So hi sammohaṃ pajahanto ārammaṇaṃ karontānipi hi pubbabhāgaññāṇāni tappahānakiccassa asādhakattā dukkha saccaṃ parijānantānīti na vuccanti.
anya-e0401n:420_72: Maggo pana ārammaṇaṃ akarontopi tappahānakiccassa sādhakattātaṃ saccaṃ parijānātīti vuccati. Kasmā.
anya-e0401n:420_73: Tato paṭṭhāya tassapuggalassa sabbakālaṃ tasmiṃsacce parijānana kiccassa siddhattā.
anya-e0401n:420_74: Yathāhi eko puriso cakkhumhi pittasemhādidosehi palibuddhattā andho hoti.
anya-e0401n:420_76: Yadā pana so ekaṃ tejavantaṃ añjanaṃ labhitvā cakkhuṃ añjayanto sabbarattiṃ niddāyati.
anya-e0401n:420_79: Taṅkhaṇato paṭṭhāya so niddāyantopi rūpāni passatīti vuccati. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:420_86: “Puna anuppādadhammatāpattivasena nirodhasaṅkhātaṃ”ti maggakkhaṇe eva tānivaṭṭāni puna anuppādasabhāvaṃ āpajjanti,
anya-e0401n:420_89: “Uppādanasaṅkhātāya bhāvanāyā”ti etena maggassa ekacittakkhaṇikattā vaḍḍhanasaṅkhātāya bhāvanāya okāso natthīti katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:420_90: Ariyamaggaṃ paṭilābhatthāya pana pavattitā pubbabhāgabhāvanāpi maggabhāvanā eva.
anya-e0401n:420_91: Sā ca ariyamaggaṃ patvā matthakapattā hoti.
anya-e0401n:420_92: Tasmā ariyamaggo eva matthakapatto bhāvanānuttaro hotīti imināpariyāyena vaḍḍhana saṅkhātāya bhāvanāyātipi yujjatiyeva.
anya-e0401n:420_95: Tassa ca tatoparaṃ dve vā tīṇi vā phalacittāni pavattantīti iminā sambandho.
anya-e0401n:420_99: Taṃ rūpaṃ tassa pākaṭaṃ na tāva hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:420_101: “Paccavekkhanavāresū”ti ettha pasādacakkhunā diṭṭhe pavattā anubandhaka vīthiyopi saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0401n:421_6: “Aviruddhā hotī”ti visuddhimaggena asamentāpi paccavekkhantānaṃ icchānurūpasambhavatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:421_9: “No laddhuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti aladdhuṃ na vaṭṭatīti attho.
anya-e0401n:421_10: Laddhuṃ no na vaṭṭatīti vā yojanā.
anya-e0401n:422_2: “Kevalaṃ paccayāyatta vuttitāya adiṭṭhattā”ti etena eso me attā,
anya-e0401n:422_3: na parassa attāti evaṃ attānaṃ attassa sāmikaṃ katvā gahaṇakāraṇaṃ vadati.
anya-e0401n:422_4: Tattha kevalasaddena paramattha saccaṃ patvā attasseva abhāvato khandhapañcakassa attanovasāyatta vuttitaṃ nivatteti.
anya-e0401n:422_5: Sammuti saccaṃ pana patvā attassa vijjamānattā mahājano attano khandhapañcakaṃ attano vasāyatta vuttiṃ maññamāno eso me attāti gaṇhāti.
anya-e0401n:422_6: “Khaṇabhaṅgassa ca adiṭṭhattā”ti etena eso me sāraṭṭhena attā.
anya-e0401n:422_9: Yāva vassasataṃpi vassasahassampi etaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ na bhijjati,
anya-e0401n:422_15: Ahañca mama khandhapañcakañca advayaṃ anānattanti evaṃ gahaṇakāraṇaṃ vadati.
anya-e0401n:422_16: Tattha “khaṇabhaṅgassā”ti nāmarūpadhammānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe bhañjanassa bhijjanassa maraṇassa.
anya-e0401n:422_19: Tasmā taṃ apassanto mahājano attano khandhapañcakaṃ attanosāraṃ maññamāno eso me attāti gaṇhātīti.
anya-e0401n:422_20: “Taṃ dvayaṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ katvā”ti khandhapañcakassa kevalaṃ paccayāyatta vuttitañca khaṇabhaṅgañca ñāṇa cakkhunā suṭṭhudiṭṭhaṃ katvā.
anya-e0401n:422_21: Tattha pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ suṭṭhupassanto kevalaṃ paccayāyatta vuttitañca avasāyatta vuttitañca suṭṭhu passati.
anya-e0401n:422_22: Yo ca attano vasāyattavutti na hoti.
anya-e0401n:422_23: So paramatthasaccaṃ patvā eso mama santakantipi vattuṃ nārahati.
anya-e0401n:422_29: Asante ca attasmiṃ ko mama attā nāma bhaveyyāti.
anya-e0401n:422_32: Satto ca nāma ekasmiṃbhave ādimhi sakiṃ eva jāyati.
anya-e0401n:422_34: Antarā vassasataṃpi vassasahassaṃpi maraṇaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n:422_37: Evaṃsante kathaṃ khaṇikadhammā sattassa sāraṭṭhena attānāma bhaveyyunti.
anya-e0401n:422_38: Tasmā te avasavattanaṭṭhena asārakaṭṭhena ca anattā eva.
anya-e0401n:422_39: Apica “avasavattanaṭṭhenā”ti ettha vaso nāma sattasantāne eko padhānadhammo.
anya-e0401n:422_41: So eva padhānabhūtassa vasassapi attā bhaveyya. Evaṃsati, yo vaso, so attā. Yo attā,
anya-e0401n:422_44: rūpaṃ attāti gaṇhanto rūpañca vasañca attānañca ekattaṃ katvā gaṇhāti nāma.
anya-e0401n:422_48: satto ca khandhapañcakañca vaso ca attā ca sabbametaṃ ekattaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0401n:422_50: Na hi imasmiṃ vasavattanaṭṭhe ekassasattassa dve attā tayo attā bahūattāti sakkā bhavituṃ.
anya-e0401n:422_51: Atha yathā yathā sattassa vaso vattati,
anya-e0401n:422_53: Tathā tathā khandhapañcakampi niccakālaṃ sattassavasaṃ anugaccheyya. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:422_54: sattassa ca khandhapañcakassa ca vasassa ca nānattābhāvato.
anya-e0401n:422_60: Na hi dubbaṇṇo durūpo puriso attano rūpakāyaṃ attano vaseneva suvaṇṇaṃ surūpaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0401n:422_69: Ajaraṃ vā amaraṇaṃ vā kātuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0401n:422_71: Patitvā vā tato vimuttaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0401n:422_77: Tathā pana avasānugamanato paramattha saccaṃ patvā khandhapañcake attano sāmikiccaṃ issarakiccaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n:422_81: attānaṃ tassa sāmiṃ issaraṃ katvā rūpaṃ me attāti gahaṇaṃ micchāgahaṇaṃ nāma hotīti.
anya-e0401n:422_82: Loke pana mahājano dhammānaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ na jānanti,
anya-e0401n:422_85: Tesaṃ parampara paccayavasena pavattamāne khandhasantāne sammuti saccavasena nānāvasavattanākārā nāma santi.
anya-e0401n:422_87: Te sammuti saccavasena uppannesu tesu sāmiissarādhipati vohāresu vohāramatte aṭhatvā sabhāvasaccaṃ maññantā micchāgahaṇaṃ gaṇhanti.
anya-e0401n:422_92: Tassa khandhapañcakaṃ tassa vasāyatta vutti eva hotīti. Na hoti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:422_94: Tathāhi gantuṃ icchānāma bahiddhā dhanahetuvā uppajjeyya.
anya-e0401n:422_98: yaṃ yaṃ dukkhaṃ āgaccheyya kāyikaṃ vā cetasikaṃ vā.
anya-e0401n:422_99: Tesaṃ taṃ taṃ dukkhapaccayā dhanicchā nāma uppajjati.
anya-e0401n:422_103: Tathā nānārammaṇānaṃ palobhana dukkhamūlikāsu ca nānāvitakkānaṃ vipphandanamūlikāsu ca icchāsu.
anya-e0401n:422_104: Evaṃ vasopi paccayāyatta vuttiko eva hoti.
anya-e0401n:422_107: Gamanampi tena teneva uppajjati āhārupatthambhanādipaccayena ca.
anya-e0401n:422_108: Vaso pana gamanassa paccayeka desamattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:422_109: So hi tadaññapaccayehi vinā sayaṃ uppajjituṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0401n:422_113: idaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ paccayāyatta vuttikanticceva vattuṃ arahati.
anya-e0401n:422_115: Api ca gantuṃ icchanto gacchatīti paññatti mattabhūto satto gacchati.
anya-e0401n:422_116: Khandhapañcakaṃ pana khaṇika dhammattā na gacchati.
