anya-e0401n:422_123: Gamane ca sampajjamāne khaṇikabhijjanena doso natthīti ce. Atthi.
anya-e0401n:422_126: gacchanto satto yadā kadāci maraṇaṃ vā nigacchati maraṇa mattaṃ vā dukkhanti.
anya-e0401n:422_128: “Vipallāsanimittaṃ”ti ca vipallāsa dhammānaṃ vasena upaṭṭhitaṃ kicca nimittaṃ.
anya-e0401n:422_131: Khandhesu suññatalakkhaṇaṃ nāma ati gambhīraṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:422_133: Suññata dassanañca diṭṭhiyā ujuppaṭipakkhanti āha “saṅkhāresu suññatadassanavasenā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:422_134: Tattha “attha siddhi nāmā”ti maggaphalappaṭilābhasaṅkhātassa atthassa siddhi nāma.
anya-e0401n:422_139: Atthābhiniveso ca so diṭṭhiggāho cāti viggaho.
anya-e0401n:422_147: Unnatilakkhaṇo ca ahaṃ māno khandhesu niccadhuvavipallāsamūlako saddhāya ca paṭipakkhoti āha “aniccadassanavasenā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:422_154: “Tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ”ti paññindriya saddhindriya samādhindriya saṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ indriya dhammānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:422_155: “Vipassanā gamanavasene vā”ti vuṭṭhānagāmini vipassanā saṅkhātassa āgamana kāraṇassa vaseneva.
anya-e0401n:423_0: Idāni pubbe yaṃ vuttaṃ ‘sattaariya puggalavibhāgassa paccayabhāvapattiyā cā’ti.
anya-e0401n:423_2: Dhammānusārī nāmāti ettha “dhammo”ti paññā vuccati ‘saccaṃ, dhammo, dhīti,
anya-e0401n:423_5: Paññābalānusārena ādimhi maggaṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Athavā.
anya-e0401n:423_7: Suññatadassanañca nāma visesato suddhadhamma dassanaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:423_11: Ādito paṭṭhāya parisuddha dassanasampannattā diṭṭhibaleneva sukhena taṃ taṃ maggaphalaṃ pattoti diṭṭhipatto.
anya-e0401n:423_12: Teneva dassana paññābalena kilesabandhanato vimuttoti paññāvimutto.
anya-e0401n:423_13: Saṅkhāra dhammānaṃ khaṇika dhammabhāve suṭṭhu saddahanaṃ aveccappasādo saddhā nāma.
anya-e0401n:423_20: Saddhābaleneva ādimhi ariyamaggaṃ pāpuṇātīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:423_24: Attano kāye eva laddhaṃ sakkhaṃ yassāti kāyasakkhī.
anya-e0401n:423_25: Dukkhānu passī puggalo hi saṃvega bahulo hoti.
anya-e0401n:423_28: Tasmā so saṃvegavasena bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjanto yaṃ yaṃ purisathāmena pattabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:423_30: Pāpuṇanto ca attano kāye eva sakkhaṃ labhati.
anya-e0401n:423_31: Sandiṭṭhaṃ jhānasukhaṃ vā maggaphalasukhaṃ vā labhatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:423_32: “Ubhatobhāga vimutto”ti arūpajjhānehi rūpakāyato arahattamaggaphalehi nāmakāyatoti evaṃ ubhohi kāyabhāgehi vimutto.
anya-e0401n:423_33: Ettha ca tayo ariyapuggalā paññādhiko ca saddhādhiko ca vīriyādhiko ca.
anya-e0401n:423_34: Tattha dhammānusārī ca diṭṭhipatto ca paññāvimutto ca paññādhiko nāma.
anya-e0401n:423_35: Saddhānusārī ca saddhāvimutto ca saddhādhiko nāma.
anya-e0401n:423_36: Kāyasakkhī ca ubhatobhāgavimutto ca vīriyādhiko nāmāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:423_38: Abhidhamme pana puggala paññattiyaṃ saddhāvimutto ca kāyasakkhī ca dvepuggalā sekkhesu eva vuttā.
anya-e0401n:423_39: Arahattaṃ pattā pana ete dvepi paññāvimuttā evāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0401n:423_41: saṅkhāra dhammānaṃ khaṇika dhammabhāve suṭṭhu saddahanaṃ aveccappasādo saddhā nāmāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:423_42: Kiṃ pana tādisena saddhāmattena sotāpatti maggaṃ pāpuṇātīti.
anya-e0401n:423_45: Yathāha mahāvagge okkanta saṃyutte cakkhu bhikkhave aniccaṃ vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī,
anya-e0401n:423_51: So yenakammena apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ uppajjeyya.
anya-e0401n:423_56: Vipariṇāmoti ca khaṇe khaṇe jīraṇatā bhijjanatā vuccati.
anya-e0401n:423_59: Sā eva sotāpattiyaṅgesu buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato, dhamme,
anya-e0401n:423_61: Tattha ñāṇasampayuttasaddhā nāma cakkhādīnaṃ aniccanimitta dassanaññāṇena sampayuttā okappanasaddhā.
anya-e0401n:423_62: Aniccanimittañca nāma rūpaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenātipade vuttanayena cakkhādinissayānaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ santati parivattanādikaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0401n:423_65: Tānipi khaṇe khaṇe ekantena bhijjati yevāti saddhādhimokkhaṃ saddhāvinicchayaṃ paṭilabhatīti attho.
anya-e0401n:423_66: “Buddhe aveccappasādenā”ti ettha pana arahatā sammāsambuddhatādīnaṃ buddhaguṇādīnaṃ dassanaññāṇena sampayutto pasādo aveccappasādo nāma.
anya-e0401n:423_67: Ariyabhūmi nāma diṭṭhānusaya vicikicchānusayehi parisuddhā avatthābhūmi vuccati.
anya-e0401n:423_69: Kathaṃ pana tassa puggalassa puthujjanabhūmiṃ atikkantatā ariyabhūmiṃ okkantatā ca viññāyatīti āha “so yenā”tiādiṃ.
anya-e0401n:423_70: Yo attano jīvitahetupi kiñci kammapathapattaṃ apāyagāmi kammaṃ na karoti.
anya-e0401n:423_74: Aparaṃpi vuttaṃ cakkhu bhikkhave vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī.
anya-e0401n:423_77: Tattha “mattaso nijjhānaṃ khamatī”ti saddhānusārīviya saddahanamatte aṭṭhatvā cakkhādīnaṃ tādisaṃ aniccataṃ
anya-e0401n:423_78: samanupassanto thokaṃ thokaṃ dassanaṃ labhatiyeva. Evaṃsati,
anya-e0401n:423_79: cakkhādīni tassa puggalassa nijjhānaṃ olokanaṃ mattaso khamanti nāma.
anya-e0401n:423_81: Aparaṃpi vuttaṃ cakkhu bhikkhave aniccaṃ vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī.
anya-e0401n:423_84: Tattha “pajānāti passatī”ti dhammānusārīviya mattaso nijjhānakkhamamatte aṭṭhatvā paññāya pajānāti,
anya-e0401n:424_0: “Yathā sakaṃ phalaṃ”ti ettha sassa attano idaṃ sakaṃ.
anya-e0401n:424_1: Yaṃ yaṃ sakaṃ yathāsakanti atthaṃ dasseti sotāpannassātiādinā.
anya-e0401n:424_2: Phalasamāpatti vīthiyaṃ pana anulomajavanāni eva phalānaṃ āsannakāraṇāni,
anya-e0401n:425_4: Idaṃpi vipassanāñāṇaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenāti samanupassitabbā ca hotīti.
anya-e0401n:425_5: Tattha ca abhidhammaṃ patvā sabhāvappadhānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0401n:425_7: Tasmā abhidhamma nayena vipassanā attano nimitta nāmaṃ maggassa dātuṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0401n:425_13: Taṃ puggalaṃ niccanimitta subhanimitta sukhanimitta attanimittāni gāhenti.
anya-e0401n:425_15: Taṃ puggalaṃ ārammaṇesu bhusaṃ nihitaṃ niviṭṭhaṃ karonti.
anya-e0401n:425_17: Te ca maggaphalāni ārammaṇaṃ na karonti.
anya-e0401n:425_19: Evaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇā divasena maggaphalesu tesaṃ abhāvo.
anya-e0401n:425_20: Abhāvattāeva ca tāni maggaphalāni attano dhammatāya tīṇināmāni labhantīti dassetuṃ “ārammaṇa karaṇavasenavā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:426_0: “Attadiṭṭhiyā uppannāya uppajjantī”ti idaṃ tāsaṃ diṭṭhivicikicchānaṃ attadiṭṭhiyā avinābhāvaṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0401n:426_1: Na pana attadiṭṭhiyā tāhi avinābhāvanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:426_5: Diṭṭhivicikicchāsampayuttā akusaladhammā diṭṭhivicikicchāggahaṇena gahitāti āha “diṭṭhivicikicchā vippayuttā”ti.
anya-e0401n:426_26: Vikappatthehi sati dve eva sattakkhattuparamā labbhanti.
anya-e0401n:426_29: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana samuccayatthassa gahitattā eko missakabhavo eva labbhati.
anya-e0401n:426_30: Nanu ca saddo nāma samuccayatthe pākaṭo,
anya-e0401n:426_32: Tasmā samuccayatthova idha yuttoti ce. Na yutto. Kasmā.
anya-e0401n:426_34: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana samuccayatthaṃ gahetvā te dve puggalā imasmiṃ pāṭhe asaṅgahitāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:426_37: Na hi koci sattakkhattu paramo nāma idha asaṅgahitoti yuttoti.
anya-e0401n:426_40: Paramo nāma vutto”ti idaṃ upari ‘ye kāmabhave yevā’tiādinā ‘yediṭṭha dhamme vā’tiādinā ca yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:426_41: So ca sukkhavipassako vā parihīnajjhāno vā daṭṭhabboti sambandho.
anya-e0401n:426_43: “Idha niṭṭhā”ti imasmiṃ kāmaloke āsavakkhayaṃ patvā khandhaparinibbānapatti vasena niṭṭhā.
anya-e0401n:426_47: Ekameva paṭisandhisaṅkhātaṃ bhavabījaṃ assa atthīti ekabījī.
anya-e0401n:426_50: Kena pana tiṇṇaṃ sotāpannānaṃ viseso katoti.
anya-e0401n:426_51: Sattakkhattu paramo tāva kevalaṃ pathamamagga sampayuttehi indriyehi kato.
anya-e0401n:426_52: Itare dve uparimaggatthāya pavattitehi vipassanindriyehi katoti.
anya-e0401n:426_63: Tattha sattakkhattu paramo kevalena pathamamaggānubhāvena siddhattā sabbamuduko hoti.
anya-e0401n:426_64: Itare dvepakatiyā sattakkhattu paramabhāve ṭhatvā uparimaggatthāya vipassanā kammaṃ paṭṭhapenti.
anya-e0401n:426_65: Tadā tesaṃ indriyāni puna visesa pattāni honti, tikkhāni.
anya-e0401n:426_66: Tasmā te sattakkhattu paramato tikkhānāma hontīti.
anya-e0401n:426_67: “Sattavārato oraṃ vā”ti idaṃ kolaṃkola ekabījino sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:426_68: “Upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā niyāmetī”ti idaṃ uparime dvesotāpanne sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0401n:426_70: Tathāhi soyeva saṅgahapāṭhe sarūpato āgato sotāpatti maggaṃ bhāvetvā diṭṭhivicikicchāpahānena pahīnāpāyagamano
anya-e0401n:426_72: Itare pana dve pāḷiyaṃ sotāpanna puggalavibhāgaṭṭhānesveva āgatāti.
anya-e0401n:426_76: Aṅguttarapāṭhe “tenacittappasādenā”ti mahāsahassilokadhātuṃ sarena viññāpetuṃ samatthassa satthuguṇe cittappasādo jāyati.
anya-e0401n:426_78: “Tena pariyāyenā”ti sace so devesu eva saṃsarati.
anya-e0401n:426_79: Sattakkhattuṃ opapātika paṭisandhiyo gaṇhitvā tattheva parinibbāyissati.
anya-e0401n:426_82: Evaṃ desanā vārena cuddasa katvā desitena pariyāyenāti attho.
anya-e0401n:426_83: “Taṃ vīmaṃsitabbaṃ”ti vadantena ṭīkācariyena sayaṃ cuddasapaṭisandhiyova icchatīti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n:426_94: “Abhisaṅkhāra viññāṇassā”ti sattabhavato uddhaṃ kāmabhave paṭisandhijanakassa kusalā kusalakamma viññāṇassa.
anya-e0401n:426_98: Ete nāma rūpadhammā ettha etasmiṃ abhisaṅkhāra viññāṇa nirodhakkhaṇe nirujjhantīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n:426_100: “Tadekaṭṭhamohassā”ti tena rāgena tena dosena ekasmiṃ citte ekato ṭhitassa mohassa.
anya-e0401n:426_111: Adhiccuppatti nāma pubbe yathāpavattaṃ kālaṃ adhicca atikkamma uppatti.
anya-e0401n:426_114: “Methunavatthu samāyogo icchito”ti jāyampatīnaṃ methunakammasamāyogo nāma sakadāgāmīnaṃ atthīti icchito.
anya-e0401n:426_122: Keci imaṃ vatthuṃ disvā mahāaṭṭhakathāvādaṃ na rocenti.
anya-e0401n:426_125: “Sakadāgāmittaṃ byākataṃ”ti tasmiṃ kālaṅkate so brāhmaṇo idha sakadāgāmibhāvaṃ patvā tusitākāyaṃ upapannoti
anya-e0401n:426_126: evaṃ tassa yaṃ sakadāgāmittaṃ bhagavatā byākataṃ.
anya-e0401n:426_128: Na pana abrahmacārino sato adhigamavasenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n:426_129: Maraṇāsannakālepi hi sikkhāpadādhiṭṭhānena saha uparimaggaphalādhigamanaṃ nāma tikkhapaññassa ariyasāvakassa na dukkaranti.
anya-e0401n:426_131: “Sakiṃdeva imaṃlokaṃ āgantvā”ti etena ito paralokaṃ gamanassa ca tato puna idhāgamanassa ca siddhattā
anya-e0401n:426_132: ayaṃ puggalo suddhena magganiyāmena kāmabhave dvikkhattu paramonāma hotīti siddho. Kathaṃ.
anya-e0401n:426_133: Idha patvā tattha nibbattitvā idha parinibbāyī,
anya-e0401n:426_134: tattha patvā idha nibbattitvā tattha parinibbāyīti.
anya-e0401n:426_135: Sesāpana cattāro vipassanāniyāmena siddhā hontīti viññāyati.
anya-e0401n:426_141: Ettha ca tīsu sotāpannesu ekosattakkhattu paramo eva magganiyāmena siddho.
anya-e0401n:426_142: Sesā pana dve sotāpannā vipassanāniyāmena siddhā.
anya-e0401n:426_143: Cha sakadāgāmīsu dve eva magganiyāmena siddhā.
anya-e0401n:426_145: Tattha maggasiddhesu sotāpanna sakadāgāmīsu saṅkaro natthi.
anya-e0401n:426_151: Āgamanasīlo āgamana dhammo hutvā sakadāgāmī nāmāti attho.
anya-e0401n:426_157: Sīlakkhandhādiguṇā nāma sīlakkhandha samādhikkhandha paññākkhandha vimuttikkhandha vimuttiññāṇa dassanakkhandhaguṇā.
anya-e0401n:426_165: Na pana vuttaṃ vīriyavāhī maggaṃ bhāvetīti.
anya-e0401n:426_167: Kasmā pana vīriyavāhī maggaṃ bhāvetīti na vuttanti. Vuccate.
anya-e0401n:426_168: Maggaṃ bhāventassa nāma ādimhi diṭṭhivicikicchānaṃ pahānāya kammaṃ mahantaṃ hoti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n:426_170: Tattha saddhā ca vicikicchā ca dve ujuppaṭipakkhā honti.
anya-e0401n:426_180: Api ca saddhā attano visaye diṭṭhiṃ vidhamatiyeva.
anya-e0401n:426_182: Tasmā āraddha vipassako aniccādīsu aveccappasādamattenapi diṭṭhivicikicchāyo pajahitvā saddhānusāribhāvañca
anya-e0401n:426_184: Paññāya aniccādīni nijjhānakkhamaṃ katvā dhammānusāribhāvañca suṭṭhutaraṃ passitvā diṭṭhipattapaññā vimuttabhāvañca pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0401n:426_185: Vīriyaṃ pana diṭṭhivicikicchānaṃ paṭipakkhamattampi na hoti.
anya-e0401n:426_193: Kutopana attano sabhāvena diṭṭhivicikicchāyo pajahituṃ sakkhissati.
anya-e0401n:426_194: Tasmā imasmiṃ ṭhāne vīriyavāhīti ca vīriyadhuroti ca na vuttoti.
anya-e0401n:426_195: Kāyasakkhimhi pana saddhā ca paññā ca samabalā honti.
anya-e0401n:426_196: Vīriyañca sayaṃ sammappadhānaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā tadubhayaṃ upabrūheti.
anya-e0401n:426_197: So ca puggalo tadubhayabalena diṭṭhivicikicchādayo pajahitvā kāyasakkhibhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0401n:426_198: Aṭṭhavimokkhe vā uppādetvā ubhatobhāga vimuttabhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0401n:426_199: Imesu pana dvīsu puggalesu vīriyassa thāmo suṭṭhu pākaṭo.
anya-e0401n:426_209: “Tayo antarā parinibbāyino”ti ettha āyukappassa pariyantaṃ apatvā antarā eva kilesaparinibbānapattā antarāparinibbāyī nāma.
anya-e0401n:426_218: Vipassanā kammaṃ sasaṅkhāraṃ sappayogaṃ katvā parinibbāyī sasaṅkhāra parinibbāyī.
anya-e0401n:426_219: Saṅkhārarahitena sukhena vipassanā kammena parinibbāyī asaṅkhāra parinibbāyī.
anya-e0401n:426_221: Te eva catūhi paṭipadāhi guṇitā dvādasa.
anya-e0401n:427_5: Āruppesu ca tasso arūpasamāpattiyo eva atthi.
anya-e0401n:427_12: Nānattasaññā nāma kasiṇa nimittato aññesu nānārammaṇesu pavattamanoviññāṇa saññā.
anya-e0401n:427_13: Dutīyajjhāne vitakka vicārānaṃ nirodhotiādinā anupubba nirodho.
anya-e0401n:427_19: “Samāpajjana vuṭṭhāna vipassanāvasenā”ti ettha vasibhāvapattaṃ samāpajjanañca vuṭṭhānañca gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0401n:427_20: Attano sarīrā baddhesu parikkhāresu samāpattibaleneva antarāyābhāvato visuṃ adhiṭṭhātabba kiccaṃ natthīti
anya-e0401n:427_29: Maraṇañhi nāma samāpattibalenapi paṭibāhituṃ na sakkāhoti.
anya-e0401n:427_30: Anto samāpattiyañca maraṇe sati sabrahmacārīsu kattabbavattaṃ na kareyya.
anya-e0401n:427_31: Etañhi vattaṃ yaṃ ariyasāvakānaṃ maraṇāsanne sabrahmacārīnaṃ vā upaṭṭhākānaṃ vā appamādakathānu sāsanikammaṃ.
anya-e0401n:427_35: Yaṃ samāpajjanto asuko bhikkhu maraṇaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0401n:428_4: Tattha ye loke iṭṭha kanta manāpiyā pañcakāmaguṇā nāma atthi.
anya-e0401n:428_8: Yaṃ loke dibbaṃ sukhaṃ mānusakaṃ sukhanti mamāyanti.
anya-e0401n:428_9: Yañca anubhavantaṃ mahājanaṃ sabbāni apāyabhaya vaṭṭabhayāni samparivārenti.
anya-e0401n:428_10: Jhānasukha maggasukha phalasukha nibbānasukhaṃ pana nirāmisasukhaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:428_11: Yaṃ nekkhammasukhanti ca pavivekasukhanti ca upasamasukhanti ca sambodhisukhanti ca vimuttisukhanti ca ariyasukhanti ca anavajjasukhanti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n:428_12: Yañca anubhavantaṃ ariyajanaṃ sabbāni apāyabhaya vaṭṭabhayāni samparivajjanti.
anya-e0401n:428_13: “Assāditabbaṭṭhenā”ti kilesapalibodhehi vimuttattā vipula gambhīra santa paṇītarasattā ca ahosukhaṃ ahosukhanti udāharantenapi assāditabbaṭṭhenāti.
anya-e0401n:431_8: “Abhivuḍḍhānaṃ”ti hānabhāgiya ṭhitibhāgiyabhāvaṃ atikkammavisesabhāgiya nibbedhabhāgiya bhāvapattivasena atissaya vuḍḍhānaṃ.
anya-e0401n:431_13: Nampo iti avhayo assāti nampavhayoti vacanattho.
anya-e0401n:431_19: Kathaṃ nu kho ime janā abhidhammatthesu sukhena ājāneyyunti evaṃ pavatto cittabyāpāro.
anya-e0401n:431_22: “Patthitaṃ”ti vā sādhuvatassa yaṃ thero evarūpaṃ pakaraṇaṃ kareyyāti evaṃ cirakālaṃ patthitaṃ āsiṃsitanti attho.
anya-e0401n:431_27: “Saddo”ti kasmā rājā evarūpaṃ maṅgalahatthiṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0401n:431_28: Netaṃ patirūpaṃ yaṃ raññā katanti evaṃ pavatto amanāpasaddo.
anya-e0401n:431_36: nānābhayupaddavā tasmiṃ nuppajjantīti lokasammato maṅgalahatthī hoti.
anya-e0401n:431_53: Taṃ ādi etissā paññāyāti pariyattivesārajjādi paññā.
anya-e0401n:431_55: Pāpaṃ dhammaṃ garahantiādīnavaṃ kathayanti sīlenāti pāpagarahino.
anya-e0401n:431_61: Loke bahūsu dassanesu ito uttaraṃ aññaṃ dassanaṃ nāma natthīti dassanānuttariyaṃ.
anya-e0401n:431_66: Tesu ratanattayādīsu saddhā paṭilābho lābhānuttariyaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:431_68: Ratanattaye catūhi paccayehi vā vattappaṭivattakaraṇena vā paricaraṇaṃ pāricariyānuttariyaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:431_69: Buddhapaññattāsu tīsu sikkhāsu samādāya sikkhanaṃ sikkhānuttariyaṃ nāma.
anya-e0401n:431_70: Tādise paññāvadātaguṇasobhādike guṇe avassaṃ bhajanti pāpuṇantīti tādisaguṇabhāgino.
anya-e0401n:433_10: āgate aññattha gantuṃ na detīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0401n:433_12: “Sāke”ti sākanāmena raññā puna saṅkhatattā imaṃ kaliyugaṃ sākanti vuccati.
anya-e0401n:433_14: Sākarājā ca nāma uttarāpathesu eko gandhārarājā.
anya-e0401n:433_15: Yaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā bhinnaladdhikā vajjībhikkhū imaṃ dhamma vinayaṃ mahāsaṅghīkaṃ nāma saṅgahaṃ āropenti.
anya-e0401n:433_26: “La tī”ti sālikkhettānaṃ sodhanaṭṭhānattā evaṃ mrammadesavohārena laddhanāmaṃ araññaṃ.
anya-e0401n:433_27: Taṃ pana muṃrvānagarassa esanne pañcadhanusatike padese jātaṃ.
anya-e0401n:433_29: Sārañca asārañca vivecenti vicāretvā jānantisīlenāti sārāsāra vivekinoti vacanatthoti.
anya-e0401n:435_0: 1. Paramatthadīpanī nāma, yena therena sā katā.
anya-e0401n:436_0: Teneve sā katā hoti, ayaṃ tassānu dīpanī.
anya-e0401n:438_0: Kāḷe navamiyaṃ divā, majjhanhike niṭṭhaṃ gatā.
